# Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap Sweet Summer Aloe and Avocado 3+1

Indulge your senses with the Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap in Sweet Summer Aloe and Avocado. This gentle soap features a light, refreshing scent of aloe with a hint of sweet cucumber, making it perfect for starting your day off with a burst of freshness. 

## Soothes and Heals Dry Skin

The Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap contains aloe vera, a powerful ingredient known for its soothing and healing properties. It helps to calm and heal dry or irritated skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and rejuvenated. 

## High-Quality Ingredients

Formulated with creamy avocado and olive oil extracts, this soap provides deep hydration and nourishment to your skin. These natural ingredients replenish moisture and help maintain the skin's natural barrier, keeping it hydrated and healthy-looking.

## Gentle and Cruelty-Free

Yardley of London is committed to producing high-quality products that are not tested on animals. You can enjoy the benefits of this moisturizing soap guilt-free, knowing that it is cruelty-free and gentle on your skin.

## Aromatherapy for Your Senses

The Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap has a delightful scent that will uplift your mood and leave you feeling refreshed. The combination of aloe, avocado, and cucumber creates a captivating aroma that lingers on your skin, providing a subtle fragrance all day long.

## Convenient 3+1 Pack

This pack includes three bars of Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap in Sweet Summer Aloe and Avocado, plus an additional bar for free. It offers exceptional value for money, allowing you to enjoy this luxurious soap for an extended period.

### Experience the Benefits of Yardley

Reveal beautiful, nourished skin with the Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap in Sweet Summer Aloe and Avocado. Say goodbye to dry, irritated skin and hello to a fresh, rejuvenated glow. Get your pack today and start experiencing the transformative effects of this exceptional soap.

Product ID: B0011DN60Q Title: Magick Botanicals Conditioner for Thinning Hair Fragrance Free - 16 fl oz Average Rating: 3.8 Number of Ratings: 16 Features: ['Name Conditioner Thin Hair Fragrance Free', 'Quantity 16 OZ'] Description: ['Formula for healthy hair and scalp, safe for the chemically sensitive and colored or treated hair.'] Price: 22.89 Store: Magick Botanicals Details: {"Product Dimensions": "2.5 x 2.5 x 8.5 inches; 13.6 Ounces", "Item model number": "000469008012", "UPC": "000469008012 000469008005", "Manufacturer": "Magick Botanicals"} Review Text: Always love their products. Little pricey though. No allergens to bother my scalp. Made my hair soft and full. I highly recommend this conditioner for anyone with sensitive skin or skin allergies. This company ran by women has made a wonderfully thick and effective non toxic series - this conditioner Ive been using for 10 years since developing an issue with many products after being poisoned. I simply love this product, my go to hair product. Many comment on my full head of long grey hair, thick at 62, My wife bought this more for the ingredients than the hair loss factor.
She is struggling with hair loss, has not used this product long enough to be able to judge long term change.
She has bad allergies to.. Well everything!
Being a fragrance free allergen free product this has performed well. With no reactions. It adds quite a bit of volume and fullness. Her hair has not looked so full and thick in several years.
This is now her primary goto product at a cost much lower than product we have previously tried. This is a great everyday conditioner for anyone with fine hair. If you need fragrance-free hair products, this is a great brand to buy. I have used the regular shampoo for years, but my store is always out of it. I looked online and saw there was a conditioner for thinning hair. I liked this because it seemed thick and it did condition my hair better than other products. I am pleased with it. There aren’t many fragrance free conditioners available so it is great to find one that is so good. This conditioner is good in the fact that it doesn't have fragrances, parabens, etc. and is gentle for chemically sensitive, but it is very thin and watery for a conditioner. Desert Organics Fragrance Free is much thicker and better, but more expensive per oz. I guess I will be buying the more expensive one from now on.

# Magick Botanicals Conditioner for Thinning Hair Fragrance Free - 16 fl oz

*Price: $22.89*

## A Safe and Effective Solution for Thinning Hair

Struggling with hair loss or sensitive skin? Look no further than Magick Botanicals Conditioner for Thinning Hair. This fragrance-free conditioner is specially formulated to promote healthy hair and scalp, making it ideal for those with chemically sensitive or colored/treated hair. 

## Features:

- **Name:** Conditioner Thin Hair Fragrance Free
- **Quantity:** 16 oz

## Benefits:

### Gentle and Allergen-Free

Magick Botanicals Conditioner for Thinning Hair is a go-to product for individuals with sensitive skin or allergies. Made by a women-run company, this non-toxic and allergen-free conditioner has been trusted for over 10 years. It is carefully crafted to minimize allergenic reactions, giving you peace of mind and a calm scalp.

### Fuller and Softer Hair

Experience the transformative power of this conditioner. Customers have reported soft and full hair after using Magick Botanicals Conditioner. Its unique formula adds volume and thickness, making your hair look youthful and healthy. Say goodbye to thinning hair and hello to a head full of gorgeous, vibrant locks.

### Hassle-Free Everyday Conditioning

With its lightweight and easy-to-use formula, Magick Botanicals Conditioner for Thinning Hair is perfect for everyday use. Its fragrance-free formulation ensures that it doesn't overpower your senses while still providing effective hydration.

## Customer Reviews:

- "This is a great everyday conditioner for anyone with fine hair. If you need fragrance-free hair products, this is a great brand to buy."
- "Made my hair soft and full. I highly recommend this conditioner for anyone with sensitive skin or skin allergies."
- "Her hair has not looked so full and thick in several years."

## Try Magick Botanicals Conditioner for Thinning Hair and transform your haircare routine today!

*Available at Magick Botanicals. Shop now and enjoy the benefits of healthy and voluminous hair.*

Product ID: B001MP47WE
Title: Supernail China Silk Wrap, 72 Inch
Average Rating: 4.2
Number of Ratings: 786
Features: ['Provides added strength and protection', 'Made of 100% pure silk', 'Comes in 72 inch roll']
Description: ['Supernail china silk wrap is made from 100% pure silk that provides added strength and protection.']
Price: 6.47
Store: SuperNail
Details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "2 x 4 x 5 inches; 0.63 Ounces", "Item model number": "51010", "UPC": "073930510109", "Manufacturer": "Supernail"}
Review Text: Worked fine. This is my first time using plain silk wrap and I love it!  I started using the self adhesive silk tabs to fix cracks and they worked great so I wrapped all my nails but I had to keep buying them. So I upgraded to this. I'm so glad I did. Yes it takes longer to do my nails now but it's so totally worth it. I wrap my nails every week or so and there's still so much of it left! I will not buy anything else, EVER! This product is great for mending broken and cracked nails, but it is a little difficult to cut the silk to the right size. Too thick for me. This silk wrap has been very hard for me to find so I was super excited when I saw it on amazon. It seems everyone has the pre-cut "stickers" but it's hard to find the silk strips like these. Product arrived nicely packaged and there is a lot of silk in there but on one of the strips it has been cut and sewed together on a diagonal which means you cannot use that whole area (about 3 inches long), at least not the way I apply my silk. This was disappointing, but the rest of the silk is usable. Used as directed, fell of in 24 hours.  I was hoping to find something to strengthen my nails, as I use them a lot for arts and crafts.  Fake nails damage my nails, so I was hoping this would be an alternative, but now I'll just be using it for...arts and crafts. Does what it says! My daughter uses this to repair broken nails. She loves it Works well. My daughter loves her nails and keeping them long. She also loves basketball and being active. See where this is going? She broke a nail and we used this plus gel polish to repair the nail until the length had grown out. It is strong, thin, easy to use, and sheer enough that it looked natural.

# Supernail China Silk Wrap, 72 Inch

The Supernail China Silk Wrap is the ultimate solution for adding strength and protection to your nails. Made from 100% pure silk, this wrap is designed to give your nails the extra reinforcement they need.

## Features

- Provides added strength and protection
- Made of 100% pure silk
- Comes in a 72-inch roll

## Benefits

The Supernail China Silk Wrap is the perfect choice for mending broken and cracked nails. Its pure silk composition ensures durability and longevity, allowing you to enjoy beautiful and healthy nails for longer.

With its easy-to-use design, this wrap provides convenience and versatility. Simply cut the silk to your desired size and apply it to your nails. It adheres effortlessly and stays in place, giving you a professional salon-like finish.

## Customer Reviews

_"Worked fine. This is my first time using plain silk wrap and I love it!"_ - Our customers have shared their positive experiences with the Supernail China Silk Wrap. They found it to be highly effective in repairing cracked nails and rejoiced in its superior quality.

_"I wrap my nails every week or so and there's still so much of it left! I will not buy anything else, EVER!"_ - The long-lasting nature of this wrap has garnered praise from our customers, who appreciate its excellent value for money.

_"It is strong, thin, easy to use, and sheer enough that it looked natural."_ - Our customers have found the Supernail China Silk Wrap to be thin and sheer, providing a natural appearance and ensuring that their nails remain stunning.

## Your Solution to Strong and Beautiful Nails

Upgrade your nail care routine with Supernail China Silk Wrap. Say goodbye to weak and brittle nails and hello to strong and resilient ones. With its proven track record and positive customer feedback, there's no doubt that this silk wrap is the perfect choice for nail enthusiasts.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to enhance your nail game. Order the Supernail China Silk Wrap today and experience the transformative power of pure silk.

# Ben Nye Stage Blood - Authentic and Vivid

Enhance your Halloween costume or special effects makeup with Ben Nye Stage Blood. This 4 oz bottle of stage blood is graphically real, offering authentic and vivid arterial coloring. With its medium viscosity, it provides a realistic look for all genres. 

## Safe and Washable Formula

Ben Nye Stage Blood is corn syrup based, making it safe for use in the mouth. Its peppermint flavor adds to the experience without compromising safety. This washable formula can be easily removed from most fabrics and surfaces, although it's always a good idea to test before use.

## Abundant Applications

With 12-30 applications per bottle, this stage blood offers great value and lasting performance. Whether you're working on a film production or creating a spooky Halloween look, Ben Nye Stage Blood won't disappoint.

## Customer Reviews

Customers love the realism and quality of this stage blood. One reviewer shares how they achieved a thinner consistency by adding a teaspoon of water. Another praised it for how it looked and tasted like real blood, making it perfect for their film project. Many reviewers highlighted its versatility and recommended it for special effects makeup and pranks. The quick drying time, flexibility for dripping, and its ability to adhere to skin, liquid latex, and other makeup are also commonly mentioned benefits.

## Get Your Ben Nye Stage Blood

Don't settle for less when it comes to achieving the perfect stage or Halloween look. Get Ben Nye Stage Blood and experience its authenticity and vividness. Order now and make your next special effects makeup or Halloween costume truly stand out!

# MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap - Hydrate Your Skin with a Splash of Freshness!

## Features:

- **Juicy Citrus and Fresh Florals:** Dive into the refreshing scent of aqua fresh bar soap with its invigorating blend of juicy citrus and fresh florals.

- **Moisturizing Formula:** Our bar soap contains over 25% vegetable glycerin, a powerful humectant that attracts and retains moisture, leaving your skin hydrated and silky smooth.

- **Gentle Cleansing:** Unlike regular soaps that can dry out your skin, our glycerin soap gently cleanses without stripping away essential oils, keeping your skin hydrated and balanced.

- **High-Quality Ingredients:** Our proprietary soap formula is not only vegan and cruelty-free, but it is also free from sodium lauryl sulfate and parabens, ensuring a clean and gentle bathing experience.

- **Handcrafted in Small Batches:** Each bar of MERMAID soap is carefully handcrafted in small batches to ensure optimum fragrance and quality, giving you a luxurious bathing experience every time.

- **Perfect for Gifting:** Each 5.8 oz. bar of MERMAID soap is shrink-wrapped, making it a great gift for yourself or your loved ones who deserve a little pampering.

## Benefits:

Indulge in the enchanting aroma of our MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap while treating your skin to the ultimate hydration. With its high glycerin content, this soap draws in moisture, keeping your skin hydrated and supple throughout the day. Say goodbye to tight, flaky skin and hello to a smooth, refreshed complexion.

Not only does our moisturizing soap nourish your skin, but it also doubles as a face wash to effectively remove excess oil and unclog pores, leaving your face feeling clean and rejuvenated. Unlike regular soaps, our glycerin bar soap won't leave your skin feeling dry and tight. Instead, it leaves your skin feeling soft, moisturized, and ready to take on the world.

## Stand Out from the Shoal:

MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap stands out from the rest with its handmade craftsmanship and attention to detail. Our soap is made in California, USA and is free from harmful ingredients like parabens and sodium lauryl sulfate. Plus, its captivating aqua fresh fragrance will transport you to crystal-clear waters, making your bathing experience truly magical.

## Customer Reviews:

- "COOL! Smells so good love it! Love it--just as pictured--nice scent!"
- "Gonna get one for my sis who thinks she was a mermaid in a prior life!!!"
- "Gave this to my sister who loves Florida and the beaches down there. She laughed and enjoyed."

## Price:

Get your own MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap for only $6.95 at Primal Elements.

## Take the Plunge:

Indulge your senses and pamper your skin with MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap. Immerse yourself in the refreshing scent and let the moisturizing formula transform your bathing routine. Treat yourself or surprise your loved ones with the perfect gift. Dive into luxury and order your MERMAID soap today!

# Garnier Fructis Color Sealer, Lightweight Leave-In: Lock in Vibrant Color and Softness

Experience long-lasting, vibrant color with Garnier Fructis Color Sealer, a lightweight leave-in treatment specially formulated for color-treated hair. Rated an impressive 4.4 out of 5 stars with 17 customer reviews, this instant color shield will protect your hair and give you that extra softness you desire.

## Features:

- **Seals in Color and Conditions**: The lightweight formula of Garnier Fructis Color Sealer instantly seals in color, preventing it from fading, while conditioning your hair for a softer feel.
- **Infused with Acai Berry and Grape Seed Oil**: The powerful blend of acai berry and grape seed oil nourishes and strengthens your hair, leaving it healthier and more manageable.
- **For Color-Treated Hair**: Specifically designed for color-treated hair, this leave-in sealer is the perfect companion to maintain your vibrant color and keep it looking fresh.
- **Lightweight Formula**: The lightweight formula won't weigh your hair down, offering you an airy feel and added body.

## Benefits:

Garnier Fructis Color Sealer has been proven to stop dry-out and fight fade-out, making it an essential product for color-treated hair care. By instantly sealing in color, this leave-in treatment delivers longer-lasting vibrancy, allowing you to enjoy that salon-fresh look for weeks. The infusion of acai berry and grape seed oil not only improves your hair's manageability but also provides lasting softness, transforming your hair into a luxurious and touchable mane.

The UV protectant included in this unique formula helps shield your hair from damaging sun rays. Not only will your hair retain its vibrant color, but it will also remain protected from harmful UV damage, ensuring healthier and stronger locks.

Whether you've just dyed your hair or simply want to maintain your existing color, Garnier Fructis Color Sealer is the ultimate solution. Say goodbye to greasiness and hello to a lightweight feel that won't compromise your hair's natural body. Heck, you'll even enjoy the pleasant grape scent!

## Try Garnier Fructis Color Sealer Today!

Don't settle for less when it comes to maintaining your color-treated hair. Experience the unrivaled benefits of Garnier Fructis Color Sealer and unlock vibrant, soft, and manageable hair that truly shines. Add it to your cart now and enjoy the luxury of longer-lasting color and impeccable style.

# Clear Essence Specialist Skin Care Body Oil
Give your skin the pampering it deserves with Clear Essence Specialist Skin Care Body Oil. This unique moisturizing body oil not only provides deep hydration but also leaves your skin with a sultry sheen. With its special blend of Vitamin A and E, Lavender and Rosemary oils, and Chamomile extracts, this body oil is suitable for all skin types. 

## Moisturizes and Relieves Dry Skin
Clear Essence Specialist Skin Care Body Oil is specially formulated to lubricate and relieve dry, chapped skin. Say goodbye to rough and ashy skin as this body oil deeply nourishes and hydrates, leaving your skin feeling soft and supple.

## Improves Skin Elasticity and Reduces Scars
Say hello to smoother and more youthful-looking skin. This body oil helps improve your skin's elasticity, making it appear firmer and more toned. Additionally, it works to reduce the appearance of scars, helping you achieve a smoother complexion.

## Lightweight and Non-greasy Formula
Unlike other oils, Clear Essence Specialist Skin Care Body Oil has a lightweight and non-greasy formula. Its thin consistency absorbs quickly into the skin, providing instant moisturization without leaving any oily residue. 

## Aroma of Pure Luxury
Experience the delightful scent of this body oil that lingers throughout the day. Its special fragrance blend of lavender, rosemary, and chamomile extracts leaves your skin smelling amazing.

## Multipurpose Body Oil
Not only is this body oil great for overall body moisturization, but it also has multiple uses. Use it for massage to enhance relaxation and rejuvenation. Apply it to your feet at night, wear some cozy socks, and wake up to soft and smooth feet in the morning.

## Quality Product with Natural Ingredients
Clear Essence Specialist Skin Care Body Oil is made with high-quality ingredients, including a blend of natural oils and extracts. It is suitable for all skin types and is free from harmful chemicals.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to indulge your skin in the luxurious and nourishing Clear Essence Specialist Skin Care Body Oil. Experience the benefits for yourself and make your skin glow with health and vitality. Add this body oil to your cart now and give your skin the care it deserves.

Price: $12.0
Store: Clear Essence

Are you struggling with fine or medium hair that lacks volume? The Aveda Volumizing Tonic is here to solve your problem. With its lightweight formula, this tonic creates maximum volume and adds a beautiful shine to your hair.

- **For Fine to Medium Hair:** Specifically designed for fine to medium hair types, this volumizing tonic will lift your hair and give it a boost of body and volume.

- **Weightless Volume:** Say goodbye to heavy, weighed-down hair. The Aveda Volumizing Tonic provides volume without any greasy or sticky residue, leaving your hair feeling light and free.

- **Adds Shine:** Enriched with certified organic aloe and wheat amino acids, this tonic not only adds volume but also enhances the natural shine of your hair, giving it a healthy and radiant look.

## Benefits

The Aveda Volumizing Tonic offers several benefits that will transform your hair:

- **Builds Body:** The certified organic ingredients in this tonic, such as aloe and wheat amino acids, work together to build body and create volume in your hair, making it look fuller and more voluminous.

- **Enhances Shine:** Not only does this tonic add volume, but it also enhances the natural shine of your hair. Say hello to lustrous, glossy locks that grab attention wherever you go.

- **Uplifts Your Senses:** Experience the invigorating power of essential oils with the pure-fumetm aroma in the Aveda Volumizing Tonic. It uplifts your senses, leaving you feeling refreshed and revitalized.

## Don't Miss Out!

Join the hundreds of satisfied customers who have already benefited from the Aveda Volumizing Tonic. Add it to your cart now and enjoy the convenience of volume and shine in a single bottle. Take control of your hair and boost your confidence!

# Forever Living Products ALOE MSM GEL, 4 oz.

Looking for soothing relief? Discover the power of Aloe MSM Gel from Forever Living Products. This specially formulated gel combines the benefits of organic sulfur and pure, stabilized Aloe Vera to provide you with soothing relief anytime you need it.

## Powerful Ingredients for Soothing Relief

MSM, short for Methyl Sulfonyl Methane, is an organic sulfur that is found in almost all living organisms. It is known for its soothing properties and is the third most abundant substance in our bodies. When combined with pure, stabilized Aloe Vera, these two powerful ingredients work together to provide you with the relief you need.

## Clear, Non-Staining Formula

Forever Living Products ALOE MSM GEL comes in a clear, non-staining formula that is easy to use. Simply apply liberally to the skin area where relief is needed and massage it in. The gel absorbs quickly and leaves no residue, allowing you to go about your day without any inconvenience.

## Convenient and Easy to Use

With its lightweight and compact design, you can take the Forever Living Products ALOE MSM GEL with you wherever you go. It's perfect for on-the-go relief and fits easily into your bag or purse.

## Customer Reviews

## Try Aloe MSM Gel Today!

Experience the soothing relief of Aloe MSM Gel for yourself. Apply liberally to the skin area that needs relief and enjoy the benefits of this powerful combination of organic sulfur and pure, stabilized Aloe Vera. Get your 4 oz. bottle of Forever Living Products ALOE MSM GEL today.

# Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice (10 lbs.)

Experience the finest and rarest Basmati rice with the Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice. With an average rating of 4.1 out of 5 stars from 29 satisfied customers, this rice is truly exceptional.

## Superior Quality and Aroma

Made from the Pusa Basmati (Raw) variety, this Kohinoor Basmati Rice is selectively picked and aged for around 1-2 years. Its 7.55 mm long grains ensure that even a small quantity of this basmati expands when cooked, giving you more than what meets the eye. Moreover, its slightly sweet taste and captivating aroma will surely leave you enchanted.

## Perfect Texture and Fluffiness

Cooking this rice is a breeze with a rice cooker. Simply add two cups of rice and three cups of water, and watch it transform into fluffy, fully cooked grains. Unlike other varieties, this basmati rice is not sticky in the least. Each grain remains perfectly separate, allowing you to savor the full flavors of your favorite curry or sauces.

## Versatile and Convenient

This 10 lb. pack of Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice is perfect for avid rice eaters. Its high-quality grains ensure a delightful dining experience, making it a favorite among rice connoisseurs. 

## Buy Now and Elevate Your Meals

Experience the impeccable quality and taste of Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice. Order now and add a touch of luxury to your everyday meals. Don't miss out on this exceptional offering from Kohinoor.

*Price: $31.39*

*Store: Kohinoor*

# Single Red Jumbo Plastic Crayon Piggy Bank (20")

Looking for a unique and eye-catching way to save your spare change? Look no further than the Single Red Jumbo Plastic Crayon Piggy Bank! With its vibrant red color and jumbo size, this piggy bank is sure to stand out wherever you place it. 

## Features

- **Giant Crayon Design**: This jumbo plastic crayon bank adds a playful touch to any space. Use it as a walkaround prop, a conversation starter, or even as a tool to direct a clown choir. Let your imagination run wild!
- **Generous Size**: Measuring 20 inches long and 3.5 inches in diameter, this piggy bank provides ample space for all your loose change. It's large enough to be noticed, yet compact enough to fit on any shelf or desk.
- **Secure Savings**: Once your coins enter the bank through the small slot, they're safely stored inside. Please note that there is no opening to remove the money, emphasizing the importance of saving for a rainy day.

## Benefits

- **Visual Appeal**: The giant crayon design makes this piggy bank a decorative piece that will catch the attention of everyone who sees it. Whether it's in your home, office, or classroom, it's a unique and fun addition.
- **Teach Financial Literacy**: This piggy bank provides a valuable tool for teaching children about the importance of saving money. It's a great way to introduce them to the concept of budgeting and setting financial goals.
- **Convenient and Durable**: Made from high-quality plastic, this piggy bank is built to withstand everyday use. Its lightweight design allows for easy portability, so you can take it with you wherever you go.

## Customer Reviews

"Exactly what I was looking for. Classic piggy bank. Perfect for teaching kids how to save for retirement. Once the money goes in, you can take it out." - ★★★★☆

"I recommend this seller. It's just like it was described and got it sooner than it was supposed to arrive." - ★★★★☆

## Grab Your Jumbo Piggy Bank Today!

Start saving in style with the Single Red Jumbo Plastic Crayon Piggy Bank. Its appealing design, convenient size, and educational benefits make it a perfect choice for both kids and adults. Add a touch of playfulness to your savings routine and make saving money an enjoyable experience. Click the *Add to Cart* button now!

example:
Product ID: B00KXJ0JJU Title: Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic Average Rating: 3.8 Number of Ratings: 11 Features: ['100% synthetic shaving brush', 'Soft Bristles for Close Shave', 'Fabulous Quality and Value!', 'Easy to Hold, Comfortable Resin Handle', 'Made in Italy'] Description: ['Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic. Made in Italy'] Price: 6.94 Store: OMEGA Details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "1 x 3 x 2 inches; 0.96 Ounces", "Item model number": "90018Green", "Manufacturer": "OMEGA"} Review Text: good product. I decided to try this because I don't want to use animal hair. It's a good brush but my only complaint is the handle! It's not solid and it pops open very easily. Water gets inside it every time I shave and I have to open it so it dries out. It's just not well designed. I will probably glue it and seal it to avoid this problem.
Putting that aside, the brush itself works well. It's easy to clean, dries quickly, and builds a nice lather. I would probably pick something with a solid handle instead of this. Good quality and works well. Excellent bang for your buck. Bristles are actually pretty soft contrary to what some naysayers are reporting. I was able to whip up a nice, foamy lather with this brush. I have sensitive, acne-prone skin and I was able to comfortably use this brush on my face for all three passes. I'd argue that the softness of this brush is on par with entry-level silver tip badger brushes, and it isn't as stiff. The biggest pro is that this brush has no animal smell and doesn't require you to soak it in water. Personally, I prefer a nice soft brush instead of a stiff or rough brush. The only minor con was that there was a chip on the actual finish and the brush is travel size, but I didn't mind it that much. The small size means that it is portable and only takes up little space on my counter. Overall, you're getting a good amount of value for the money here. I highly recommend this brush for budget-conscious buyers as well as folks that are looking for an excellent starter brush. I would say this is a quality product especially for the price. It would not be my choice for a one and only brush because the knot is kind of small and the bristles don't ever splay out like a animal hair or more expensive synthetic brush. The tips of the bristles are nice and soft but the sides are not. Each bristle is shaped like a very tiny curly cue which adds a lot of scrubbing power to it. This is great for loading up soaps and building a lather very quickly but can be a little harsh on the skin if that is a concern for you. If your skin isn't especially sensitive I wouldn't worry about that, in fact I kind of like it for the extra exfoliation. I would recommend this as a travel brush for it's quick drying and if it gets lost or damaged you're not out much money. I bought this synthetic brush for travel because I had read that synthetic brushes dry very quickly. This is certainly the case, as the brush does air dry within a few minutes. I was also pleasantly surprised at the very good performance of this shaving brush: it has good backbone for lathering, but the bristles are not scratchy. The loft on this brush is a little tall. I've found with synthetic brushes the water all comes out to the outside of the brush and they just leak like a sive. Otherwise the brush works okay.. Bought it for a cheap travel brush, and I'm sure it will be fine for that. Wouldn't buy it for day to day use. I wanted a synthetic for travel, and thought the price was great. This brush exceeded my expectations for two solid weeks straight.

response:
# Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic

Looking for a high-quality shaving brush that is also cruelty-free? The Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic is the perfect choice for you. Made in Italy, this brush offers a soft and luxurious shaving experience that rivals brushes made from animal hair. 

## Soft Bristles for a Close Shave

The soft bristles of this synthetic shaving brush ensure a close and comfortable shave. Unlike some traditional brushes, these bristles are gentle on the skin, making it suitable for individuals with sensitive and acne-prone skin. The bristles are designed to easily whip up a rich lather, allowing for a smooth and enjoyable shaving experience.

## Easy to Hold, Comfortable Resin Handle

The Omega Shaving Brush features an easy-to-hold resin handle, providing a comfortable grip during shaving. The handle is designed to fit perfectly in your hand, allowing for precise control and maneuverability. 

## Fabulous Quality and Value!

With the Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic, you get both exceptional quality and great value. This brush offers excellent performance at an affordable price, making it an ideal choice for budget-conscious buyers. 

## Key Features:

- 100% synthetic shaving brush
- Soft bristles for a close shave
- Easy-to-hold, comfortable resin handle
- Fabulous quality and value!
- Made in Italy

If you are looking for a cruelty-free shaving brush that delivers exceptional performance without breaking the bank, the Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic is the perfect choice for you. Buy now and upgrade your shaving routine with this high-quality, value-packed brush.

*[SEO Keywords: Omega Shaving Brush, 100% synthetic, cruelty-free, soft bristles, comfortable handle, value]*

# 3 LOT Charak Gum Tone Gel - Control Gingivitis and Improve Oral Health

The 3 LOT Charak Gum Tone Gel is a herbal astringent and antiseptic designed to effectively control gingivitis and promote overall oral health. This gel provides a convenient and natural solution for individuals suffering from bleeding, spongy, and painful gums.

## Features and Benefits

- **Herbal Formula**: The Charak Gum Tone Gel is formulated with natural ingredients to ensure gentle yet effective gum care. It offers a fresh and pleasant taste, making it easy to incorporate into your oral care routine.

- **Control Gingivitis**: This gel helps to prevent plaque formation and dental caries, reducing the risk of gum disease and gingivitis. With regular use, it promotes healthy gums and improves overall oral hygiene.

- **Visible Results**: Customers have reported impressive results after using this gel. It has demonstrated significant improvement in gum condition, reducing inflammation and providing relief from bleeding and pain. 

## Customer Reviews

One satisfied customer shared their experience, stating, "Love this product. It has such a nice fresh taste and makes a great difference to inflamed or bleeding gums. I've gone through only 1 tube so far. When I started using it, I was seeing my dentist with some very serious pain and bad conditions with my gums. It has only been a week and my gums have shown 50% improvement. This stuff is amazing!"

## Transform Your Oral Care Routine

Say goodbye to gum problems and hello to a healthier, happier smile. Try the 3 LOT Charak Gum Tone Gel today and experience the benefits of its herbal formula. Order now and see the transformation for yourself!

Price: $14.99

*Note: This product is available from the official Charak store and comes with fast and reliable shipping by FedEx.*

# VAGA Elegant Black Quality Plastic Shark Tooth Headband

Create stunning hairdos effortlessly with the VAGA Elegant Black Quality Plastic Shark Tooth Headband. 

## Firm and Gentle Hold

Designed with a special comb-like design, this headband securely holds any kind of hair without causing uncomfortable pressure on the scalp. Whether you have straight, smooth, curly, or fuzzy hair, this headband will keep it in place all day long. 

## Durable and Easy to Clean

Made from high-quality plastic, this headband is strong and durable. It won't break even when stored and transported in luggage. Cleaning is a breeze too - simply wash it with soap and warm water to keep it looking brand new.

## Endless Styling Possibilities

Discover a wide range of fabulous hair styling accessories from VAGA. With our products, you can effortlessly create stunning hairdos every day or for special occasions. Be your own professional hairdresser without spending hours in front of the mirror.

## Customer Reviews

- "A very nice headband. Excellent at holding my very heavy hair in place." - *4 stars*
- "Uncomfortable to wear. Very loose." - *2 stars*

## Get Your VAGA Elegant Black Quality Plastic Shark Tooth Headband Today!

Click on the brand name "VAGA" above to browse our full range of products. Don't miss out on the convenience and style this headband offers. Add it to your cart now and enjoy effortless and stylish hairdos every day!

example:
Product ID: B00S8STF3E Title: Phonak TVLink II Base Station Average Rating: 4.2 Number of Ratings: 55 Features: ['Supports analog and digital (Optical, Coaxial) audio outputs', 'Quick and easy installation', 'Test mode for a quick audio check', 'Complete set including power plug and cables', 'Charging slot for ComPilot II and ComPilot Air II'] Description: ['he TVLink II basestation is independent of the Phonak hearing instrument model. It sends the audio stream via a Phonak streamer. This ensures the audio stream can easily be controlled (pause/resume, volume up/down). TVLink II can be used with all Phonak streamers (ComPilot, ComPilot II and ComPilot Air II).'] Price: 143.0 Store: Phonak Details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "6.3 x 4 x 3.1 inches; 14.4 Ounces", "Item model number": "7613275329641", "Manufacturer": "Phonak"} Review Text: The original TVlink I did not have a optical input, so they added a crippled one to the Tvlink II. The issue is that virtually all modern TV sets output audio thru a optical connector and are set to Dolby Digital 5.1 by default. The Tvlink II will not respond to a optical signal with Dolby Digital. Why?? The Resound Reunite works fine with a Dolby Digital optical signal.

So, if your TV allows it, you can go into setup and muck around to change the audio decoding to PCM in order to make the TV link II work. Unfortunately, many Panasonic and LG TV sets will not allow you to change to force PCM output, so you need to buy a separate decoder. A high quality decoder is expensive, the cheap ones delay the signal.

So, my Tvlink II works with my Samsung TV once I changed the audio format, but not my Panasonic. I got a TV LinK II and streamer when I bought new hearing aids in 2016, but couldn't get it to work with my new Samsung HD TV, after following all the steps in the user guide book. Took the Link to the TV store, connected it to one of their TVs, worked fine. Came home, reconnected, still didn't work. Persuaded the TV salesman to stop by to fix the problem. After several attempts, turns out the key was in setting the TV's Audio Format - not to Digital Dobey, but to PCM - which is a kind of universal program. Bingo! Optical cable from Samsung OneConnect Digital Output to TV Link Digital Audio Input on back of the base station, and clear, beautiful sounds flowed right in my ears. This key tip was not in the TV Link User Guide. The TV Link has improved my viewing and listening immensely. Would never want to be without it again. Five stars for the link, 3 or 4 stars for the user guide. Love this no more ear phones for me. Pick the voices from the tv with no problem at all I am only receiving intermittent sound from my unit and the comII has been checked and works fine. Can you help??? You need to know that this unit REQUIRES a Compilot to work, otherwise you have a useless piece of equipment. The webpage only says that it "can be used" with all Phonak streamers. They will NOT take returns and the unit takes some time to get to you because it is being shipped from India. They make it sound like it is based in the US (Hearing Aid Zone). I did not know that it needed the Compilot to work and, now they say I cannot return it. I searched the webpage and did NOT find anything about NO RETURNS. I did do a lot of research beforehand because hearing aids are new to me but did not find anything anywhere that said you needed to spend almost $500 so you could hear the TV.
Since, I have found that my hearing aids will connect to a bluetooth TV. I think I can find a smart TV for $500 or less. Works perfect. I needed an extra base for a second TV. An excellent product that more than met my expectations. The weakest link is the device that makes the connection between it and my hearing aids . It works well, but battery has a short charge lifespan and has to be recharged at least once if not twice a day. Returned one because it would not pair. Got a new one and it worked great. Discovered that you must be about a meter away for it to pair so the first failure was my fault. Have only used on tv. great base for my wife's hearing system This is an excellent product. Thanks.

response:
# Phonak TVLink II Base Station

The **Phonak TVLink II Base Station** is a convenient accessory that enhances your TV-viewing experience for those with hearing difficulties. With an average rating of 4.2 based on 55 customer reviews, this base station is a reliable and effective addition to your setup.

## Features

- **Supports analog and digital audio outputs**: Equipped with both optical and coaxial inputs, this base station works seamlessly with a wide range of TV models.
- **Quick and easy installation**: Set up the TVLink II in no time and start enjoying enhanced audio quality immediately.
- **Test mode for a quick audio check**: Ensure everything is in order with a simple audio check before sitting down to watch your favorite shows.
- **Complete set included**: The TVLink II comes with a power plug and all necessary cables, so you won't need to purchase any additional accessories.
- **Charging slot for ComPilot II and ComPilot Air II**: Keep your streamers charged and ready to use whenever you need them.

## Benefits

The Phonak TVLink II Base Station allows you to take control of your TV audio stream, providing you with a seamless and comfortable listening experience. Easily adjust the volume or pause/resume the sound directly from your Phonak streamer. With its compatibility across all Phonak streamers, including ComPilot, ComPilot II, and ComPilot Air II, you can enjoy a personalized audio experience tailored to your needs.

## Customer Reviews

Customers have praised the TVLink II for its functionality and effectiveness. One reviewer mentioned that it works flawlessly with their Samsung TV and appreciated the clear and beautiful sounds it delivered. Another customer found it invaluable in improving their viewing and listening experience, highlighting how it made picking up voices from the TV easier. However, it is important to note that some customers experienced intermittent sound and noted that the device requires a ComPilot to work.

## Conclusion

Enhance your TV audio experience with the Phonak TVLink II Base Station. Its versatile features, quick installation, and compatibility with Phonak streamers make it a valuable addition for anyone seeking improved audio quality. Don't miss out on the opportunity to improve your TV-viewing experience - order your Phonak TVLink II Base Station today!

Price: $143.0
Store: Phonak

Product ID: B00T2HFC00 Title: Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe Average Rating: 4.0 Number of Ratings: 404 Features: ['Paraben-free', 'Non-invasive', 'Reduces the appearance of deep wrinkles', '10ml Syringe', 'Advanced application method'] Description: ['Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe'] Price: 199.99 Store: Vine Vera Details: {"Brand": "Vine Vera", "Material": "Plastic", "Style": "Classic", "Item Volume": "10 Milliliters", "Unit Count": "1 Count", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "7.75 x 2.85 x 1.75 inches; 4.16 Ounces", "Item model number": "0", "UPC": "707918643595 609728457280", "Manufacturer": "Vine Vera"} Review Text: This product does not perform as promised. As many others have commented, it is a temporary effect, the same as you can get with glue.

I also got snookered into getting this at a mall kiosk as a few others here have noted in their reviews. Always steer clear of any products where they have a "No Refund" policy. If it's a good product, they will absolutely give you a refund for an UNOPENED and unused product, which is what my case was.

But of course, since this is a scam, they would not provide a refund. Listen up, especially my fellow dudes that want to roll back the clock a bit. This is an expensive parlor trick to hide wrinkles as well as bags under your eyes. The substance temporarily tightens your skin with a film that is lightly colored with a Caucasian base make up (at least mine is; maybe they have other shades -- I am in fact a Caucasian male). If you touch it after it dries it will break the seal and you will lose the effect. It only lasts until you wash again or rub the area. I doubt you'd get a full day out of an application.

I feel foolish for getting suckered into this expensive product as I was told it would be possible to drop back to weekly for 4 months then put the rest in a freezer for a few years - LOL!

If I were a woman that wore a good *spray-based* makeup product over top of it I might think it is worth the money. As a man that doesn't wear make-up, even though the skin tone is close to my own, I think you can easily see I am wearing some sort of cosmetic product.

I will probably only use this for web meetings and special occasions and then not buy again. Just OK I'm pretty irritated with myself for falling for this, to be honest. Like most other reviewers, I got suckered into buying this garbage from a pushy sales person at a mall kiosk. Even as I was recognizing her sales tactics, even with all the red flags, I still bought it. I guess it was just an expensive reminder: don't look a mall kiosk sales person in the eye.

# Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe

Turn back the clock and reduce the appearance of deep wrinkles with the Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe. This revolutionary skincare product offers a convenient and non-invasive solution to help you achieve smoother, more youthful-looking skin. With an average rating of 4.0 from over 400 satisfied customers, this syringe is a game-changer in the world of anti-aging skincare.

## Paraben-Free and Non-Invasive

Our Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Syringe is paraben-free, ensuring that you are using a safe and gentle product on your skin. Plus, the non-invasive application method means no needles or surgical procedures are required, giving you peace of mind while achieving visible results.

## Reduces the Appearance of Deep Wrinkles

Say goodbye to stubborn wrinkles with this powerful syringe. Our advanced formula targets deep wrinkles, helping to diminish their appearance and giving your skin a smoother, more youthful look. Whether you have crow's feet, forehead lines, or laugh lines, this syringe will work wonders.

## Convenient and Advanced Application

With its 10ml syringe, this product offers an advanced and precise application method. The lightweight and portable design make it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups or for including in your daily skincare routine. It's easy to use and fits seamlessly into your lifestyle.

## Perfect for Web Meetings and Special Occasions

Achieve a flawless look for web meetings or special occasions with the Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe. It creates a temporary tightening effect, helping to hide wrinkles and bags under your eyes. While it's ideal for both men and women, those who wear makeup will find it even more beneficial.

Don't miss out on the chance to rejuvenate your skin and regain your youthful glow. Get your Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe today and experience the visible difference it can make in just a few applications.

# 12 Pack of Roll On Empty Glass Bottles for Essential Oils

Introducing our 12 Pack of Roll On Empty Glass Bottles for Essential Oils - the perfect solution for storing and applying your favorite oils and perfumes. Each bottle has a 30ml capacity, making it ideal for travel and conveniently fitting in your purse or bag. 

## Features

- **Capacity of 30ml**: Store your essential oils, fragrances, and other liquids with ease. Perfect for daily care of your eyes, face, and body.
- **Easy to Use**: Our refillable glass bottles are designed for multiple uses. Simply apply oils to your wrists, chest, feet, forehead, or any area of concern.
- **Finest Quality Material**: Made of durable glass material that protects your oils from harmful rays to avoid rapid volatilization.
- **Easy to Clean**: The smooth interior of the bottle makes it easy to wash and reuse. After removing the ball, the inside can be cleaned and refilled with other liquids.
- **Leakproof Design**: Our air-tight black caps ensure that your oils stay fresh, preventing carbonation and fermentation.
- **Versatile**: These bottles are not only great for storing oils, but they can also be used for making lip gloss or homemade aromatherapy perfumes.

## Benefits

With our 12 Pack of Roll On Empty Glass Bottles for Essential Oils, you'll enjoy the convenience of having your oils ready to use at any time. The roller applicator makes it easy to apply oils to your skin, while the leakproof design ensures that your oils stay fresh. The 30ml capacity is perfect for travel, allowing you to take your favorite oils with you wherever you go. These bottles are made of the finest quality glass, ensuring that your oils are protected from harmful UV rays. 

## Order Now

Don't miss out on the opportunity to have a convenient and stylish way to store and apply your essential oils. Click the link to order your 12 Pack of Roll On Empty Glass Bottles for Essential Oils today!

Product ID: B00Y14CKRW
Title: Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil 8 Oz
Average Rating: 4.5
Number of Ratings: 147
Features: ['Mustard Seed Oil, Great in soaps, creams, lotions and for massage.', 'Used to treat chapped lips, diaper rash, dry skin', 'Usage Rate: 1-100%']
Description: ['Mustard seed has been used for centuries in India as a massage oil and for skin care, where the oil is believed to improve circulation, complexion and muscular development. The oil also has antibacterial properties and is high in omega-3 fatty acids. Mustard seed oil has applications in personal care products like massage oils and muscle rubs. While it is often used as a cooking oil in India, its strong aroma is an acquired taste. Mustard seeds, which mustard oil comes from, contain calcium, protein, vitamins A and E, alpha omega-3 and alpha omega-6 fatty acids. They also contain antioxidants; these components make mustard oil an effective hair growth agent. The vitamins ensure strong hair and prevent hair from falling out. Conditioning Because mustard oil contains fatty acids, it both conditions and makes hair stronger, which causes healthy hair growth. Growth Mustard oil encourages the circulation of blood. Mustard oil is a hair stimulant, meaning it causes hair to grow healthier at a faster rate. How to Benefit From Mustard Oil Massage mustard oil onto your hair and your scalp three or more times a week. Each time, leave the oil in your hair for at least three hours before rinsing it out with shampoo. You will have healthier, stronger, faster-growing hair in just a few weeks.']
Price: 13.99
Store: Dr Adorable

# Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil - Natural and Versatile

### Organic Mustard Seed Oil for Skin Care and Massage

Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil has been used for centuries in India for its numerous benefits in skin care and massage. This oil is believed to improve circulation, complexion, and muscular development, making it an ideal choice for those seeking natural and holistic solutions.  

### Rich in Omega-3 Fatty Acids and Antioxidants

Derived from the seeds of mustard plants, our Mustard Seed Oil is high in omega-3 fatty acids that nourish and condition the hair, encouraging healthy growth. It also contains antioxidants that support overall hair health. Say goodbye to brittle hair and hello to strong, vibrant locks.

### Multipurpose and Convenient

Our Mustard Seed Oil is a versatile product that can be used in soaps, creams, lotions, and as a massage oil. It's also useful in treating chapped lips, diaper rash, and dry skin. You'll love the convenience of having one product that caters to all your personal care needs.

### Use with Confidence

Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil is made with love and care by a trusted brand. Our customers have experienced positive results, reporting healthier hair growth and soft, conditioned locks. Our oil is easy to use - simply massage it onto your hair and scalp at least three times a week for best results.

### The Perfect Addition to your Routine

If you're looking for a natural and effective solution for your hair and skincare needs, look no further than Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil. Order now and experience the benefits of this versatile oil for yourself.

*Price: $13.99*  
*Store: Dr Adorable*

*Note: For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children.*

The heart unfolds with creamy Tonka Bean, Tobacco Flower, Vanilla and Cocoa, and finishes with a dry fruit accord, enriched with Sweet Wood Sap.'] Price: 19.9 Store: TRiBUTE8 Details: {"Brand": "TRiBUTE8", "Item Form": "leaf", "Item Volume": "100 Milliliters", "Scent": "Tobacco Vanille", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "5.71 x 1.73 x 1.73 inches; 3.88 Ounces", "Item model number": "TF3", "UPC": "794168066113 755332567706", "Manufacturer": "TRiBUTE8"} Review Text: Smells NOTHING like it. Great deal. Quality product for a very reasonable price.

response:
# Tobacco Vanille 100ml by TRiBUTE8

Experience the luxurious and captivating scent of Tobacco Vanille by TRiBUTE8. This exquisite fragrance combines smooth Oriental notes with the richness of tobacco leaf, tonka bean, and tobacco flower. With its blend of intoxicating aromas, Tobacco Vanille is perfect for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

## Unique Oriental Blend

Tobacco Vanille opens with a burst of opulent essences, immediately enveloping you in its hypnotic charm. The smooth Oriental notes of tobacco leaf and aromatic spices create an alluring and sensual aura.

## Exquisite Heart and Dry Down

As the fragrance develops, the heart reveals creamy tonka bean, tobacco flower, vanilla, and cocoa. This decadent combination adds depth and complexity to the scent. The dry fruit accord, enriched with sweet wood sap, completes the experience, leaving a subtle yet captivating trail.

## Intense and Long-lasting

The rich and intense fragrance of Tobacco Vanille is sure to leave a lasting impression. With just a few sprays, you'll enjoy a scent that lasts all day, providing you with confidence and allure from morning till night.

## Authentic Quality at an Affordable Price

TRiBUTE8 is committed to delivering exceptional fragrances at a reasonable price. We strive to offer the best possible value to our customers, ensuring that you can indulge in luxury without breaking the bank.

## Your Scent of Elegance

Elevate your presence and captivate those around you with Tobacco Vanille by TRiBUTE8. Whether it's a special occasion or a casual outing, this fragrance will enhance your style and leave a lasting impression.

### Don't wait, experience the irresistible charm of Tobacco Vanille today!

Price: $19.9 | Store: TRiBUTE8

- Matte Effect: This product provides a matte finish, reducing shine and giving your skin a smooth, non-greasy appearance throughout the day.
- Long-lasting: The creme-to-powder formula ensures long-lasting wear, allowing you to confidently rock your flawless look from morning till night.

## Customer Reviews:
- "I generally am a powder wearer, but this makes my skin look flawless. Great product!"
- "The color matched perfectly, and I love the smoothness and full coverage on my face. It conceals blemishes and uneven skin tones effortlessly."

# Rimmel Wonder'Full Wake Me Up Mascara - Wake Up Your Eyes!

Intensify your gaze with the Rimmel Wonder'Full Wake Me Up Mascara. This pack of 3 mascara tubes in Extreme Black [003] will give your eyes a refreshing look, awakening them with unbeatable volume, length, and lift. With an average rating of 4.6 from 33 satisfied customers, this mascara is sure to become your new go-to.

## Refreshing Formula for Lifted Lashes

Our exclusive formula contains vitamins and cucumber extract, ensuring that your lashes feel conditioned throughout the day. Not only will this mascara give you the volume and length you desire, but it also provides a refreshing look that wakes up your eyes. 

## Precision Brush for Clump-Free Application

The precision brush features soft, lash-hugging fibers that effortlessly wrap around each and every lash. This allows for a smooth, clump-free application, ensuring that your lashes are perfectly defined. Say goodbye to clumpy lashes and hello to beautifully enhanced volume.

## Get Full, Luscious Lashes

This Rimmel mascara provides defined, clump-free volume that lasts all day long. You'll love the fullness it gives your lashes without sacrificing a natural look. Competing with high-end mascaras, Wonder'Full Wake Me Up offers you an incredible value for your money.

## Wake Up Your Eyes Today!

Experience the power of Rimmel Wonder'Full Wake Me Up Mascara for yourself. Its exclusive formula, precision brush, and incredible volume will enhance your natural beauty and give you the confidence to conquer the day. Don't miss out on this extraordinary offer – order your pack of 3 mascara tubes now and wake up your eyes like never before!

Price: $45.99
Store: Rimmel

## Wahl Professional #1 1/2, (3/16") Premium Cutting Guide with Metal Clip

The Wahl Professional #1 1/2, (3/16") Premium Cutting Guide with Metal Clip is a must-have tool for barbers and stylists. From Wahl Professional’s commercial grade line of products, this cutting guide is designed to deliver the sharp performance that experts demand.

### Professional Precision
This guide comb is intended for professional use only. It features a metal clip that ensures durability and aligns the teeth to the blade, providing a smoother and safer cutting experience. The glass and mineral-filled plastic casing glides seamlessly through hair, making every cut effortless.

### Versatile and Reliable
The Wahl Premium Cutting Guide fits all Wahl Vibrator Clippers, making it a versatile tool for any professional. While comb attachments receive wear and tear through daily use, this cutting guide is built to last as long as your clippers. You can trust in its reliability and functionality.

### Convenient and Efficient
With the Wahl Premium Cutting Guide, you can achieve precise and consistent results every time. Its rounded comb teeth provide a more pleasant cutting experience compared to ordinary combs. Snapping on securely, it ensures that you can work with confidence and efficiency.

### Wahl Quality and Selection
In addition to the 1 1/2" Premium Cutting Guide with Metal Clip, Wahl offers a range of combs in different sizes, from 1/8" to 1". All Wahl combs feature sturdy metal clips and renowned quality, ensuring that you have the right tool for any haircut.

Enhance your professional cutting experience with the Wahl Professional #1 1/2, (3/16") Premium Cutting Guide with Metal Clip. Trust in Wahl, a brand with a century of experience in delivering reliable, value-priced devices and solutions that protect skin and hair while performing on all skin and hair types.

Take your cutting skills to the next level. Add the Wahl Premium Cutting Guide to your cart now!

Product ID: B01849RRZO Title: Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow (DGAF) Average Rating: 3.6 Number of Ratings: 48 Features: ['DGAF - Multidimensional golden brown', 'Long-wearing creme powder formula', "Unique bouncy-like texture and It's super creamy", 'Insanely pigmented and Ultra-glitter finish', 'Cruelty free and Vegan'] Description: ['Revolutionary creme-powder eyeshadow, famous for its unique bouncy texture, delivers bold colour and fine glitter in one swipe without creasing, fading or fallout. Has one swipe intensity with zero fallout.'] Price: 8.5 Store: Colourpop Details: {"Color": "DGAF", "Brand": "Colourpop", "Item Form": "Powder", "Finish Type": "Metallic", "Special Feature": "Vegan", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "1.5 x 1.5 x 0.9 inches; 0.07 Ounces", "Item model number": "SG_B01849RRZO_US", "UPC": "850991006907"} Review Text: My friend likes it This product is low quality not worth anything Great eye shadow. I really like the simplicity of it yet the shimmers gives a nice touch to my make up. Although, when I received it, it was mushed and scattered up. Much darker color than shown on picture but nice quality eyeshadow. It did not look like what it showed online. It was very light when it came. It look like it was supposed to be darker and that’s what I was expecting I was really disappointed especially since I ordered two. My product arrived broken. I didn't have time to return or find something else since I needed this for a military ball in 2 days. So as seen in the 1st picture I pressed it back together as well as I could.. it was completely crumbled when I opened it but I didn't take a picture since I didn't hesitate for a second to try to fix it.
I am upset that I didn't get the product in the way it was promised and for what I paid for. They need to fix however they are handling these shadows and take extra precaution since I know I wasn't the only one received a broken one..
Now, as seen in the next 3 images, this is what the shadow looks like on by itself (applied 2 light layers with finger). It's formula is really soft and easy to apply. It looks pretty for a simple everyday look.
The last 3 images are what I was able to do in a glam look (less than 5 minutes, ignore my lash not sticking) so, the pigmentation is not as strong as the advertisement makes it seem but it's still a very nice shimmer. There is a different shadow in my inner corner but the rest of the lid is the DGAF on top of regular eyeshadow.
I decided to give it 3 stars because of the good formula, the fact it pressed back together so it's still usable, and because you can still get a good look from it, it's a gorgeous color.
I would've rated this 5 stars if it wasn't because the product was broken. Shame.

Hope this helps.

response:
# Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow: DGAF

The Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow in DGAF is a revolutionary creme-powder eyeshadow that delivers bold color and fine glitter in just one swipe. This long-wearing formula is famous for its unique bouncy texture, ensuring that it won't crease, fade, or have any fallout. 

## Features

- **DGAF - Multidimensional golden brown**: This eyeshadow shade offers a stunning multidimensional golden brown color that will enhance your eyes and add a touch of glamour to any look. 
- **Long-wearing creme powder formula**: The creme powder formula ensures that the eyeshadow lasts all day without smudging or fading. 
- **Unique bouncy-like texture and super creamy**: The innovative texture of this eyeshadow makes it incredibly creamy and easy to blend, allowing for effortless application. 
- **Insanely pigmented and ultra-glitter finish**: With one swipe, you'll achieve intense pigmentation and an ultra-glittery finish that will make your eyes pop. 
- **Cruelty-free and vegan**: This eyeshadow is both cruelty-free and vegan, making it a conscious choice for makeup lovers. 

## Benefits

The Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow in DGAF offers numerous benefits for your makeup routine: 

1. **Bold and glamorous looks**: With this eyeshadow, you can effortlessly create bold and glamorous eye looks for any occasion. Its multidimensional golden brown shade adds depth and dimension to your eyes, making them stand out. 

2. **Long-lasting wear**: The creme powder formula ensures that your eyeshadow stays put all day without fading, smudging, or creasing. You can confidently wear it from morning to night without worrying about touch-ups. 

3. **Easy application**: The unique bouncy texture of this eyeshadow makes it super creamy and easy to apply. You can achieve a seamless blend with just a few swipes, allowing even beginners to create stunning eye looks. 

4. **Intense pigmentation and glittery finish**: The eyeshadow's insanely pigmented formula delivers vibrant color payoff in one swipe. Its ultra-glittery finish adds a touch of sparkle to your eyes, making them shine with every movement. 

5. **Cruelty-free and vegan**: By choosing this eyeshadow, you're supporting a brand that is committed to animal welfare. This product is both cruelty-free and vegan, ensuring no harm is done to animals during its production. 

Whether you're going for a simple everyday look or a glamorous night out, the Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow in DGAF is the perfect addition to your makeup collection. Enhance your eyes with its stunning color, enjoy long-lasting wear, and effortlessly achieve a glamorous finish.

response:
# Avenue Chiett Style Super Hard Spiker Wax - 200ml 4.7oz

Achieve the perfect hairstyle that lasts all day with the Avenue Chiett Style Super Hard Spiker Wax. This professional-grade wax provides a super strong hold, allowing you to create your desired style with minimum usage. 

## Super Strong Hold for Long-Lasting Styles

With its super strong hold, this wax keeps your hair exactly in the style you want, ensuring it stays in place throughout the day. Say goodbye to worrying about your hair losing its shape or falling flat. 

## Matte Finish for a Natural Look

Enjoy a pure matte finish with barely any shine, giving your hairstyle a natural and effortless look. This wax adds a subtle gloss to your hair, enhancing your overall style without looking greasy. 

## Easy Styling with Attractive Scent

The Avenue Chiett Style Super Hard Spiker Wax is easy to apply, thanks to its smooth and lightweight texture. It doesn't dry too quickly, allowing you to create your best style with ease. Plus, it offers an attractive scent, eliminating any rubbery smell commonly found in other waxes. 

## Easy Washing for Hassle-Free Removal

After a long day, simply rinse out this professional-grade wax effortlessly. No sticky residue will be left behind on your hair, ensuring a clean and easy wash. 

## Get the Perfect Hold and Look

Whether you're a professional hairdresser, salon owner, or someone who loves styling their own hair at home, this wax is perfect for you. It provides a super strong hold that lasts all day, allowing you to achieve the perfect hairstyle effortlessly. 

**Experience the power of the Avenue Chiett Style Super Hard Spiker Wax and enjoy a superior hold, effortless styling, and a clean wash-off. Get yours now and elevate your hair game!**

Looking for a stylish and low-maintenance hairstyle that will turn heads? Look no further than the Kadi Natural Bomb Twist Braiding Hair. This professional-grade Kanekalon hair extension is perfect for achieving a stunning bomb twist look.

The Kadi Natural Bomb Twist Braiding Hair is designed for those with naturally curly or non-straightened hair. The braiding process itself may take some time, but the resulting bomb twist style will last for several months, saving you time and effort in the long run.

## Versatile and Easy to Use

## Get Yours Today

Product ID: B01AHJY4YQ Title: Mosher Salon Tools 6.0 Inch Long Ergonomic Handle Scissors Average Rating: 4.4 Number of Ratings: 261 Features: ['HIGH QUALITY NEW -Handmade 6.0"Long good for Barber/Salon use or home', 'ERGONOMIC HANDLE MOLDED FINGER REST -for smooth easyCutting less stress on hands and back', 'JAPANESE STEEL-handmade hollow ground convex Sharp edges for long lasting sharpness', 'FREE -LEATHER CASE -zips up great for traveling', '-100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE!-your satisfaction is important to Mosher Salon Tools'] Description: ['Ergonomic Handle with Molded Finger Rest Japanese Steel Handmade Hollow Ground Convex Sharp Edges made with High Quality Japanese Steel for long lasting edges great smooth Sharp Edges Best ergonomic Handle for easy Hair cutting for Less Stress on Hands and Back . Great for beauty students/Stylist/Barbers/Dog -Groomers/and home use .Mosher Salon Tools has been designing Products for stylist-barbers for 20 years and Sharpening for manufactures around the world Our goal is to offer the best Customer Service as possible and the highest quality for a reasonable price Put your trust in Mosher Salon Tools .'] Price: 19.99 Store: Mosher Salon Tools Details: {"Material": "Leather", "Brand": "Mosher Salon Tools", "Blade Material": "Stainless Steel", "Item Dimensions LxWxH": "8.19 x 4.02 x 0.98 inches", "Style": "Japanese", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "8.19 x 4.02 x 0.98 inches; 0.8 Ounces", "Item model number": "M60", "UPC": "641938982688", "Manufacturer": "Mosher Salon Tools"} Review Text: Raves from my daughter, a professional hair stylist and her co-workers Perfect good pricing for a product that does a great job for hair cutting. I learned some things when I was looking for hair cutting shears. Mostly that you can pay around $200 for the best ones,used by professionals,and,that you need very sharp scissors or shears to cut or trim hair.

I've been trimming and shaping my own hair for a long time and am usually happy with the results,considering too many times,when I would go to a salon to have it cut or shaped or trimmed,they did a job I was almost always disappointed with. I decided a long time ago,if someone was going to screw up my hair,it might as well be me. At least I have a good idea on when to stop cutting it and I actually care what the final result looks like.

I also have fine,wavy hair. Not the easiest to cut.

I have noticed,and maybe it was from using whatever scissors were around at the time,that sometimes the ends do look a bit frazzled;and in researching shears,I found out that unless the blades are very sharp,the ends can break,or result in split ends. I don't have split ends and never noticed them,except for a long,long time ago when I was a teenager;but,I have used these once to do some light trimming and shaping;with wavy hair you are always shaping,cutting with the wave and not cutting against the wave. And,these shears have produced a nice result. And I don't see the somewhat frazzled or lightningbolt effect at the ends of my hair,that I sometimes get.

I've used these just once,I only trim my hair to maintain healthy looking ends,and I did it a few weeks ago,and I like these and I'm glad I looked for something better than "any old scissors" that I have on hand. I am not a professional beautician, but because I cut my own hair I like to use professional tools. After watching a YouTube video, the professional recommended purchasing his Invisiblade shears, but they were much too expensive for me. I went on Amazon to see if I could find a similar pair at a better price and I did. I read the reviews for Mosher Salon Tools Thinning Shear & took a chance on my purchase. I am very glad I did because these shears have a nice weight & they are SHARP. I've used them once so far, but I'll be using them for each of my haircuts in the future. [[VIDEOID:fe56c1c7b2c296937aad5f5e7284457c]] ***As a licensed cosmetologist, I am writing this review from a personal AND professional standpoint****

I really like these shears, and think they will work amazingly for a student, or anyone who needs a backup pair. I think its unique and awesome that the company who makes these have specialized in sharpening services for a long time. It definitely shows! They are well made, they are well weighted and the little jewel is a cute accent to the shears. I took the time to make a video to really break down all the pros and cons of these shears, so please take a moment to watch if you'd like an extensive review!

I did receive this product at a discount or free, in exchange for an honest review. I strive to provide fellow consumers with the most detailed, unbiased and (hopefully) helpful reviews that I can, believing that allowing a discount to influence a review is a disservice to other shoppers. Therefore, anything contained in this review can be considered my own independent and unbiased thoughts and opinions, that have not been influenced in any way. Awesome shears for our 2 Yorkies. No more $90 grooming bills, yeah! Not very sharp. good quality, sharp, good price I was so impressed with the thinning shears I bought another set of Mosher scissors. Excellent products!!!!

response:
# Mosher Salon Tools 6.0 Inch Long Ergonomic Handle Scissors

The Mosher Salon Tools 6.0 Inch Long Ergonomic Handle Scissors are the perfect tool for all your hair cutting needs. Made with high-quality Japanese steel, these scissors are designed to provide long-lasting sharpness, ensuring a smooth and precise cut every time.

## Ergonomic Design for Comfort and Ease of Use

Featuring an ergonomic handle with a molded finger rest, these scissors offer a comfortable grip, reducing stress on your hands and back. Whether you're a professional stylist, barber, beauty student, or even grooming your pets at home, these scissors provide the ultimate convenience and ease of use.

## High-Quality Japanese Steel for Lasting Sharpness

Handmade with hollow ground convex sharp edges, these scissors are crafted with the highest quality Japanese steel. This ensures that they will stay sharp for longer, allowing for precise and effortless hair cutting. Say goodbye to frazzled ends and split ends – these scissors will give your hair a smooth and professional finish.

## Travel-Friendly Leather Case Included

With your purchase of the Mosher Salon Tools 6.0 Inch Long Ergonomic Handle Scissors, you'll also receive a free leather case. This case is perfect for traveling and keeping your scissors safe and secure.

## Customer Reviews

Customers rave about the performance and quality of these scissors. One professional hair stylist even compares them to much more expensive professional shears. Users have noticed improved results with their haircuts, with no more frazzled or split ends. The scissors have been praised for their sharpness, weight, and overall craftsmanship.

## Affordable Professional Tools at Your Fingertips

Put your trust in Mosher Salon Tools, a trusted brand designing products for stylists and barbers for over 20 years. With a 100% satisfaction guarantee, you can be confident in your purchase. Upgrade your hair cutting experience and achieve salon-quality results with the Mosher Salon Tools 6.0 Inch Long Ergonomic Handle Scissors.

*Price: $19.99*
*Store: Mosher Salon Tools*

# Technic Highlights Stick Cream Highlighter

Enhance your natural beauty and achieve a radiant glow with the Technic Highlights Stick Cream Highlighter. This multi-purpose stick is a must-have for any makeup enthusiast. With its sheer shimmer and long-lasting formula, it can be used on eyes, cheeks, lips, and body, allowing you to create stunning accents, contours, or dynamic highlights on all skin tones.

## Features:

- Multi-purpose stick for eyes, cheeks, lips, and body
- Unique, creamy formula blends effortlessly for gorgeous color
- Provides shimmering accents, contours, or dynamic highlights
- Illuminating bronzer to accentuate your features and illuminate your face
- Convenient and portable for glow on-the-go

## Benefits:

The Technic Highlights Stick Cream Highlighter offers a range of benefits that will elevate your makeup game. Its multi-purpose design allows you to create various looks and experiment with different effects. The creamy formula effortlessly blends into your skin, providing a sheer shimmer that enhances your natural beauty. Whether you want to create a subtle glow or an intense highlight, this highlighter stick has got you covered.

## High-Quality and Affordable:

Made with quality ingredients, this highlighter stick delivers exceptional results without breaking the bank. At an affordable price of $4.49, you can achieve a professional look without the hefty price tag. 

## Customer Reviews:

This product has an average rating of 4.5 stars based on 16 customer reviews. One customer mentioned that compared to other brands, this highlighter may not be as pigmented and is somewhat difficult to spread. However, for the price, they found it to be a decent option.

## Experience the Radiant Glow:

Try the Technic Highlights Stick Cream Highlighter and experience the convenience and versatility it offers. Create a stunning glow wherever you go and elevate your makeup looks to new heights. Don't settle for average; choose the Technic Highlights Stick Cream Highlighter today!

- **Amaze - Peachy gold multi-dimensional**: Get ready to mesmerize with this stunning shade.
- **Long-wearing creme powder formula**: Enjoy an eyeshadow that refuses to budge, no matter what your day brings.

- **Insanely pigmented and Ultra-glitter finish**: Achieve intense, eye-catching color with a dazzling finish.
- **Cruelty-free and Vegan**: Feel good about your purchase with this ethical and cruelty-free eyeshadow.

## Reviews

With an average rating of 4.3 from 28 satisfied customers, the Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow has been a hit.

- "A beautiful Shadow from colourpop!!!"
- "Greats Great! Lasts All Day!"
- "I like its color, doesn't match pic, nice"

- "A pretty pigmented color that looks lovely when blended with another gold and white shade of shadow."

## Get your eyes shining with Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow in Amaze. Shop now and add a touch of glamour to your makeup collection.
