Product ID: B01F6BEV2A Title: Emjoi Micro-Pedi with Extra Rollers Average Rating: 4.8 Number of Ratings: 14 Features: ['Micro Pedi Tornado is a super powerful, innovative rechargeable device created to smooth dry, rough and calloused skin on the feet.', 'Unique roller with micro-mineral particles pulverizes dead skin in an instant', 'Groundbreaking device takes the chore out of smoothing skin on the feet', 'Unique roller spins 360 degrees, at an amazing 30 times a second to gently and effectively buff away hard skin', 'Salon quality results at home in seconds!'] Description: ['Included items: Micro-Pedi Tornado Rechargeable Travel pouch Cleaning brush Instruction booklet 2 Regular blue rollers (one preinstalled on unit ) 3 Precision cone rollers (for calluses between toes and in hard to reach areas) 1 Extra gentle roller'] Price: 29.95 Store: Emjoi Details: {"Brand": "Emjoi", "Item Dimensions LxWxH": "6 x 2.5 x 1 inches", "Is Electric": "Yes", "Item Form": "Roller", "Unit Count": "16.0 Ounce", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "6 x 2.5 x 1 inches; 12.8 Ounces", "Item model number": "AP-3RP", "UPC": "655003984064"} Review Text: Good product, liked it because it is rechargeable, however, it does not have as high RPM as a battery operated one. I've been using the battery operated one for many many years I got tired of the batteries not lasting long or operating as long as they should...Huge improvement would highly recommend A must for anyone who wants smooth skin and perfect toenails. My sister just got one of these Emjoi Micro-Pedis from Amazon, and told me about it. Love it!

I have included a photo of my actual feet's results. Note that my "before" is NOT me neglecting my feet. On the contrary, it was taken just days after I spent half an hour on my tiring old razor, Ped-Egg, rasp, pumice stone routine. (And sometimes I would rasp off too much, then it would hurt to walk a few days. Ouch!)

This product seems designed to prevent removing too much skin. If you push too hard the machine will basically stop. So, I find it best to let the machine do the work for me, just let it spin and spin, and I only apply gentle pressure…just enough pressure that the spinning slows slightly. It's so easy to use that I can do it almost without looking while watching TV.

I like the extension handle, particularly because it catches the powdered skin that comes out the holes on the device's underside. I just empty it into a small garbage can periodically as I go. The handle also makes it nice to reach around the far side of my foot since I am definitely not a contortionist. Make sure you firmly snap the device under the ridge that holds it into the extension handle: then it holds it nice and snug.

Overall, a nice little device. Reasonable price, too. I had seen this demonstrated several years ago, so when I had need for one, I tried it. It takes your old tired rough feet and makes them smooth as a baby's butt. Worth every penny.

response:
# Emjoi Micro-Pedi with Extra Rollers

The Emjoi Micro-Pedi with Extra Rollers is a super powerful and innovative rechargeable device that is designed to smooth dry, rough, and calloused skin on the feet. With its unique roller featuring micro-mineral particles, this groundbreaking device instantly pulverizes dead skin, giving you salon-quality results at home in seconds!

## Key Features

- Micro Pedi Tornado is a rechargeable device that saves you the hassle of constantly changing batteries. 
- The unique roller spins 360 degrees, at an amazing 30 times a second, to gently and effectively buff away hard skin.
- Comes with a travel pouch, cleaning brush, instruction booklet, 2 regular blue rollers (one preinstalled on unit), 3 precision cone rollers (for calluses between toes and hard-to-reach areas), and 1 extra gentle roller.

## Get Smooth Feet in Minutes

Say goodbye to tiring old razors, Ped-Egg, rasp, and pumice stone routines. The Emjoi Micro-Pedi is designed to prevent removing too much skin. With just gentle pressure, it effortlessly removes dead skin, leaving you with smooth, beautiful feet.

## Effortless and Easy to Use

The Emjoi Micro-Pedi is incredibly easy to use. Simply let it spin and spin while applying gentle pressure. Its extension handle allows you to reach every corner of your foot effortlessly. The handle also catches the powdered skin, ensuring a mess-free experience.

## Real Results and Satisfied Customers

Don't just take our word for it. Check out the impressive before-and-after results shared by our satisfied customers. This device is a game-changer for achieving smooth skin and perfect toenails. 

## Take the First Step Towards Beautiful Feet

Invest in the Emjoi Micro-Pedi with Extra Rollers and transform your tired, rough feet into baby-soft skin. With its reasonable price and exceptional performance, this device is a must-have for anyone who wants to step out with confidence.

[Shop Now](https://www.example.com/product/B01F6BEV2A) and experience the Emjoi Micro-Pedi difference today!

response:
# AJOY Hair Bun Maker Donut – Create Beautiful and Neat Hairstyles

Achieve the perfect bun effortlessly with the AJOY Hair Bun Maker Donut. This set includes 3 different sizes (Small, Medium, and Large) to cater to your desired look. Crafted with flexible elastic and tight construction, these bun makers can keep your hair up all day, offering you convenience and confidence in your hairstyle.

## Easy to Use, Stylishly Elegant

Creating beautiful hairstyles has never been so easy. With the AJOY Hair Bun Maker Donut, you can style your hair in just a few minutes, saving you time and money. Simply pull your ponytail through the donut and pin your hair to achieve the desired look. The result is a stunning and elegant hairstyle that will turn heads wherever you go.

## Versatile and Shareable

This set of bun makers offers you the ability to create various styles. Whether you're a goody holder, crown former, roller sponge-shaped stuffer, or in need of a mesh hairnet, the AJOY Hair Bun Maker Donut has got you covered. Share these bun makers with your family to experiment and discover your favorite hairstyles together.

## Quality and Precision

Each AJOY Hair Bun Maker Donut is hand-picked for quality assurance. While there may be a little error due to the manual measurement, rest assured that you'll receive a flexible and reliable product.

Don't miss the opportunity to enhance your hairstyling routine with the AJOY Hair Bun Maker Donut. Buy now and enjoy the convenience of creating beautiful and neat hairstyles effortlessly!

response:
# Gillette Mach 3-16 Count (2 x 8 Pack)

The Gillette Mach 3-16 Count (2 x 8 Pack) is the perfect choice for men who value a close shave without compromising on comfort. With its 3-Blade technology and exchangeable blades, the original MACH3 continues to deliver exceptional performance that Gillette is known for. 

## Close and Comfortable Shave

The MACH3 features a comfort guard with 5 microfins that effortlessly glide over your skin, providing a close and comfortable shave every time. Say goodbye to nicks and irritations, as this razor has been designed to follow the contours of your face with precision.

## Long-Lasting Durability

Thanks to its exchangeable blades, the MACH3 offers longevity that other razors simply can't match. The indicator lubrication strip fades to white, indicating when it's time to replace your blade for an optimal shave. 

## Trusted Choice

The MACH3 has been a trusted choice for men worldwide who want to start their day with a smooth and clean shave. Its superior performance and reliability make it an essential grooming tool for any man.

## Customer Reviews

Customers love the MACH3 for its amazing close shave and long-lasting blades. One reviewer mentioned that they were able to get multiple shaves from a single blade without any nicks. Another customer with tough facial hair praised the MACH3 for its ability to provide a close shave without any discomfort.

## Upgrade Your Shaving Routine

Don't settle for less when it comes to your shaving experience. Grab the Gillette Mach 3-16 Count (2 x 8 Pack) today and enjoy a close, comfortable shave that will leave you feeling fresh and confident.

## Almay Clear Complexion Pressed Powder: Flawless, Shine-free Skin at Your Fingertips

Almay Clear Complexion Pressed Powder is the ultimate solution for flawless, shine-free skin. Specially formulated for oily, combination, and acne-prone skin, this finely-milled face powder absorbs excess oil without caking or making your skin look dry. With its powerful dose of acne-fighting salicylic acid (the maximum amount possible!), it not only helps shrink blemishes but also prevents new ones from appearing.

### Benefits:

- Flawless, shine-free complexion: This pressed powder effectively absorbs oil, leaving your skin looking flawless and shine-free all day long. Say goodbye to the mid-day shine and hello to a fresh, matte finish.

- Blemish control: Infused with salicylic acid, this powder not only covers imperfections but also helps clear and prevent blemishes. Enjoy healthier, clearer skin with every use.

- Sheer-to-light coverage: Available in 6 seamless shades, this powder delivers sheer-to-light coverage with a natural finish. Achieve a beautiful, even complexion without the heavy, cakey look.

- Skin purification: Enriched with meadowsweet, this powder helps purify and clear your skin. Experience the benefits of clean, healthy skin with every application.

### The Almay Promise:

As always, Almay Clear Complexion Pressed Powder is dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, fragrance-free, clean, and cruelty-free. It is perfect for those with sensitive skin, ensuring that your skin remains healthy and happy.

Don't wait any longer to achieve the flawless, shine-free skin you deserve. Add Almay Clear Complexion Pressed Powder to your beauty routine and experience the transformation firsthand.

[Buy now](https://www.almay.com/clear-complexion-pressed-powder) and embrace a new level of confidence and radiance!

Product ID: B072JG9WW8 Title: LA Splash Cosmetics Soft Liquid Matte Blood Red Lipstick - LIP COUTURE (Poison Apple) Average Rating: 4.2 Number of Ratings: 207 Features: ['🌸 Made in USA. Matte Waterproof color that lasts all day long.', '✨ What It Is - Lip Couture with rich waterproof shades will leave a velvety, matte finish that never transfers and fades.', '🍀 What It Does - Experiment with our boldest high pigmented shades -- from neutral to solid black. It glides on as liquid and dries matte, you are sure to turn heads!', '🎉 How To Use - Exfoliate and moisturize lips 15-20 minutes prior to application. Wipe off excess moisture on lips. Apply a thin clean coat and let dry completely before rubbing lips together.', '📝 Care Recommendation: Liquid to matte lipsticks contain a drying agent to deliver the liquid to matte effect. To extend the life of your lippies it is recommended to close tightly after each use, keep away from direct sunlight and store in a cool/room temp area.'] Description: ['Product Description', '🔴', 'What it is:', 'Lip Couture with rich waterproof shades will leave a velvety, matte finish that never transfers and fades. 🔴', 'What it does:', 'Experiment with our boldest high pigmented shades -- from neutral to solid black. It glides on as liquid and dries matte, you are sure to turn heads! 🔴', 'Made in USA. Net weight: 0.10 Fl Oz/3 ml.', 'Ingredients', "🔶 C9-C11 Isoparaffin, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Quaternium — 18 Bentonite, Propylparaben, Parfum, D—Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Citral, Geraniol, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance. 🔶 Main contain: MICA (CI77019), CI77891, CI15850, CI45410, CI77492, CI77499, CI77491. 🔶 Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer's discretion. For a complete and most up-to-date list of ingredients, please refer to the product's packaging.", 'How To Use', '🔻 Exfoliate and moisturize lips 15-20 minutes prior to application. 🔻 Wipe off excess moisture on lips. 🔻 Apply a thin clean coat and let dry completely before rubbing lips together.', "What's In The Package", '🎁 1x LA Splash Cosmetics Soft Liquid Matte Lipstick - LIP COUTURE, Color: Poison Apple.'] Price: 14.0 Store: LA Splash Details: {"Brand": "LA Splash", "Color": "Poison Apple", "Skin Type": "All", "Item Form": "Liquid", "Finish Type": "Matte", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.29 x 0.79 x 0.79 inches; 0.63 Ounces", "UPC": "818947021480", "Manufacturer": "Jon Davler, Inc."} Review Text: I've tried a lot of matte lipsticks and this one is the BEST. The Latte Confession color is a bit darker and redder (I was hoping for a clay / pink) but it is an amazing product. Stay power is wonderful even with drinking and eating. I only need to reapply once after the initial application. Pigmentation is strong also. You truly get a great product for the value. I purchased rose garden (the color is a bit brighter and neon pinker than I wanted) and just ordered innocent vixen too. This is HUGE because I can never buy more than one of a lipstick because I don't truly love it. Just a small note: it is a matte lipstick so it does dry my lips out a little. I moisturize at night and I'm good to go. It's also very easy to take off at the end of the day (no scrubbing or rubbing). I like it, but even if you apply a small amount your teeth will be brown la Splash lipsticks are great. Found out about them on YouTube Like the company, I personally did not like the shade. Too bright pink for a middle-aged​ lady. I love the formula of these. They are comfortable and long-wearing, which is a rarity in liquid mattes. The smell is pretty horrid (like paint) but goes away once it dries. This particular color (latte) is a very grey-toned, pale nude which is unfortunately unflattering on me in natural light. I am very fair-skinned with pink undertones and my boyfriend legitimately thought I was having breathing problems because my lips looked blue. Even though this shade didn't work for me I would absolutely try others in this line. This lipstick in Retro Bettie is a MUST HAVE for my beauty regimen as a jazz singer. I have to put my face on about an hour before I get to a gig, which is an hour before it starts, and it lasts 3 hours: so I need a lipstick that can last a minimum of 5 hours. THIS IS THAT LIPSTICK!

It goes on smooth, and the tip is like a typical lip gloss applicator. But it is not forgiving (it will temporarily stain your regular skin if you're not careful!), it is forever. Once you put it on just hang out with your mouth open for 30 seconds for it to seal in, and then you're good to go, with drinks and everything, for at least my usual 5-hour stint.

At the end of the day, this lipstick does smudge off, or even wash off: it flakes off. Which is kind of amazing since I don't use makeup remover: I just rub my lips against each other, or rub them with a paper towel or washclothes and the whole thing comes off easily.

NOTE: Your lips will feel dry by the end of the night because they will be, but you CANNOT add a lip gloss or chapstick atop this lipstick or it will completely lose its efficacy as a stay-put product: it will move around and stain everything—I learned this the hard way.

Almost every pic on my Instagram (@ojanmarie) has me wearing this excellent shade, which is a true red, on the slightly blue-red side, but not bright like a tomato, much deeper and more saturated than that. It will go on your lips a lighter shade and will dry darker, just FYI.

Good luck using my fav product!!! I love it, although it does smear if it gets wet. This is a great product, works as advertised, and the color is wonderful. It stays on really well. I am very happy about that. It is a little dull though and makes your lips look a little dry. Other than that it was pretty good I love LA Splash lipsticks. They last and you only need one swipe of the wand to get full coverage color. They can feel very dry on the lips, but I don't mind that.

## Introducing LA Splash Cosmetics Soft Liquid Matte Lipstick - LIP COUTURE (Poison Apple)

![LA Splash Cosmetics Soft Liquid Matte Blood Red Lipstick](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/41niIvP-TwL._AC_UL200_SR200,200_.jpg)

### Rich Waterproof Shades for a Head-Turning Finish

Lip Couture with rich waterproof shades will leave a velvety, matte finish that never transfers and fades. Experiment with our boldest high-pigmented shades, from neutral to solid black. Gliding on as a liquid and drying matte, this lipstick ensures that you'll turn heads wherever you go.

### Long-lasting, High Pigmentation

With the LA Splash Cosmetics Soft Liquid Matte Lipstick, you can have confidence that your lip color will last all day, even through eating and drinking. Many customers have shared that they only needed to reapply once after the initial application. The pigmentation is strong, delivering vibrant, eye-catching color.

### Comfortable Wear and Easy Removal

Despite its long-lasting formula, this lipstick is surprisingly comfortable to wear. However, since it is a matte lipstick, it may dry out your lips slightly. Customers have reported that moisturizing their lips before application helped combat this issue. Plus, at the end of the day, you can easily remove the lipstick without any scrubbing or rubbing.

### Authentic LA Splash Quality

LA Splash is proud to manufacture this product in the USA. Each lipstick contains 0.10 Fl Oz/3 ml of high-quality product. You can trust that LA Splash prioritizes both performance and safety, as the brand provides a complete and up-to-date list of ingredients on the product's packaging.

**Invest in your confidence with the LA Splash Cosmetics Soft Liquid Matte Lipstick - LIP COUTURE (Poison Apple) today!**

# Vanilla by Body Fantasies, 3 Pack 8 oz Fragrance Body Spray for Women

Experience the delightful scent of Vanilla with the Body Fantasies Signature Vanilla by Parfums de Coeur. This Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women is a timeless classic that has garnered rave reviews from our satisfied customers.

## Features

- Brand: Parfums De Coeur
- Item Form: Spray

No stickiness!!', '✓Made of natural ingredients, no scalp irritation, environmentally friendly and no harm to your health', '✓Professional hair wax matte for men and women, gives all hair types the hold, control, and shine that it needs', '✓LIFETIME WARRANTY- Love them or we’ll buy them back from you, no questions asked!'] Description: ["Whether you're going to a fun party or cosplay at your next convention, this product is a fun and great way to test our various hair colors. Use your fingers to apply product at the scalp, pulling hairs together. Repeat several times in order to style to desired effect. ✓Apply to a section of hair for highlights or apply the wax on the entire head ✓Washes out easily with just warm water. ✓Awesome temporary hair color and wax, holds hair in place. Perect for everyday, concerts, parties, events, clubbing, cosplay, raves, and Halloween!"] Price: 7.48 Store: MOFAJANG Details: {"Package Information": "Jar", "Brand": "MOFAJANG", "Item Form": "Wax", "Hair Type": "All", "Unit Count": "4.23 Fl Oz", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.4 x 3 x 2 inches; 5.61 Ounces", "UPC": "732140593653", "Manufacturer": "Mofajang hair color"} Review Text: Doesn't smell bad. I bought white and it didn't cover up my dark brown beard very well. Works nicely. Thank you Works as advertised, but you need a lot to make your hair as white as the images they are showing as examples.

I have short black hair, so take that into consideration, as black is difficult to get a full white coverup.
But when styling my hair with regular wax, I use about 1/4 to 1/3 teaspoon for styling.

To get white coverage with this wax, I need to use 3-5 times that much of this product.

Also - it's cool to know that it's actually just zinc oxide they use for the white coloring - safe sunscreen mineral. The white product turns dark hair a shiny grey color, which is exactly what I was looking for. If you are looking to go grey and you have dark brown or black hair, I would recommend you try the white. This probably would not work on long hair. It looked awesome on the top of my hair (sides of my head are shaved with about 3 inches of hair on top). Great look for new year's parties, costume parties or just a week's worth of temporary hair changes. I would not use it long term but it's a fun short term product. It will get glitter on your pillow if you try and sleep with it in. Goes on wet; you have to use a large amount. It will dry and then you will be able to touch it, but otherwise it will get all over your hands and forehead. The good news is it's very easy to remove with one rinse of just water, both from skin and hair. Makes your hair very stiff and somewhat difficult to style, but I made it work by slicking it back with a comb. Not exactly like the viral videos, but I got lots of compliments and had fun!

This is just my experience with the product, please let me know if my review helped by clicking below! Love it. I have black hair with a few silver hairs at the temples, so I bought this to accentuate it. I'd planned to put s few more permanent silver streaks in my hair, but I'm happy that I bought this instead: it washes out easily if I don't quite get the effect I want. I was able to put in very natural silver streaks. The effect is subtle on darker hair, but it beautifully enhanced my gray temples.
The product arrived well ahead of time & was well packaged. It smells nice, and it easily washes out.
One caveat: it is water soluble. If you live in a hot or humid place, or you perspire easily, it could run a bit if your hair gets wet.
I'd definitely buy it again. I'm curious about the other colors. This product is SOLID. I got to try out what my hair would look like in the gray-ish color before actually dyeing it.

I've wanted this color for so long, but I have a tan/beige skin complexion which a lot of lighter colors don't suit, so I was apprehensive about doing it. I got to use this product to try it out and get some opinions and now that I know that I loved it and everyone else loved it, I can dye my hair without fear. That means this product was MORE than worth it.

Also when applying the cream, initially it makes my hair feel a bit stiff, as would any leave-in creme based products so that's not unreasonable to expect. But after a few minutes the stiff feeling was gone and my hair returned to its natural form and shape, which really allowed me to gauge how I looked with this colored hair.

Overall this is a solid 5/5 experience and I couldn't be happier.

My hair type is long thick black hair of asian origin. I know some people have been wondering if it works on <x> type of hair, so I thought i would include that information. Did not come close to working in my long dirty blonde hair. Maybe if you have dark shirt hair it would be better? Does not work at all Absolutely Horrendous. (-: This is by far the worst item I have ever purchased on amazon. I was under the impression that it would make my hair look white and be easy to work with, like the photos. oh no, no no no no. it was sticky, stuck into my hair like hair gel, looked wet/greasy, and was impossible to brush in. first I did a little bit at a time with no luck, and then a lot of it. Seriously felt like i just squirted elmer's glue into my hair. it is by the far the worst product I've ever put in my hair. even after 3 washes/conditions my hair is frizzy and I have a zillion split ends. really upset!
Pics - after & before!

# Mofajang Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud - Unleash Your Creativity!

Looking for a fun and exciting way to experiment with different hair colors without damaging your hair? Look no further than the Mofajang Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud! With its temporary and fantastic hair dye color and coverage, this product allows you to express your unique style and stand out from the crowd.

## Style and Mold Your Hair with Ease

The Mofajang Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud not only provides temporary color but also acts as a styling cream, allowing you to mold and shape your hair in any desired way. Say goodbye to sticky hair products as this wax is non-sticky and washes out easily with just warm water. It's time to let your hair shine and make a statement!

## Natural and Safe Ingredients

Formulated with natural ingredients, this hair wax is gentle on your scalp, ensuring there is no irritation or harm to your health. You can confidently use this product without worrying about any adverse effects. It's environmentally friendly and safe for daily use!

## Suitable for All Hair Types

Whether you have straight, curly, short, or long hair, the Mofajang Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud is designed to work for all hair types. It gives your hair the hold, control, and shine it needs to enhance your overall look.

## Try Out Different Colors

Available in 7 vibrant colors, you can quickly and easily change your hair color to match your mood or outfit. From bold and bright to subtle and sophisticated, there's a shade for every occasion. Be the life of the party, make a statement at cosplay events, or add some fun to your everyday look.

## Easy to Use and Remove

Using this hair wax is a breeze. Simply clean and dry your hair, take a good amount of wax onto your palm, and apply it to your hair, starting from the scalp and pulling the hairs together. Repeat until you achieve your desired effect. It washes out easily with just warm water, allowing you to experiment with new styles whenever you want.

## Let Your Hair Do the Talking

Get ready to turn heads and receive compliments with your new hair color and style. Stand out from the crowd and unleash your creativity with the Mofajang Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud. Perfect for everyday use, parties, events, cosplay, and Halloween, this product is a must-have in your hair product collection.

## Don't Miss Out!

Experience the convenience and versatility of the Mofajang Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud. With its temporary hair color and styling capabilities, this product gives you the freedom to express yourself. Try it out today and see the amazing results for yourself. Order now and let your hair do the talking!

# KIKO MILANO - Glow Fusion Powder Highlighter

The KIKO MILANO Glow Fusion Powder Highlighter is a must-have for anyone looking to achieve a flawless, radiant complexion. This buildable effect powder highlighter features a new sensory texture that is creamy and easy to blend, allowing for effortless application.

## Creamy and Easy to Blend

With its innovative formula, this highlighter creates a velvety touch on the face. The blend of softening ingredients ensures an exceptionally soft and gliding powder that leaves a long-lasting feeling of comfort. On contact with the skin, it gives a flawless finish with a soft focus effect, perfect for achieving a natural-looking glow.

## Optimum Color Release and Buildable Effect

The high concentration of pearls in this highlighter helps to create points of light, guaranteeing optimum color release. You can easily build up the intensity of the highlighter, allowing for versatility in your makeup looks. Whether you prefer a soft contour or a more pronounced effect, this highlighter has got you covered.

## Suitable for All Complexions

To cater to different skin tones, the KIKO MILANO Glow Fusion Powder Highlighter is available in three different shades. No matter your complexion, you'll find the perfect shade to enhance your features and achieve a radiant glow.

## Dermatologically Tested and Hypoallergenic

With KIKO MILANO's commitment to quality, this highlighter has undergone careful, in-depth clinical testing. It is hypoallergenic and formulated to minimize allergy risks. Additionally, it is non-comedogenic, ensuring it won't clog your pores.

Experience the transformative power of the KIKO MILANO Glow Fusion Powder Highlighter. Add it to your makeup routine today for a radiant and flawless complexion.

**Price:** $17.5  
**Store:** Kiko  
**Rating:** 4.2 (397 ratings)

*Note: Actual product packaging and materials may vary and contain more and/or different information than that shown on our website. We recommend that you always read labels, warnings, and directions before using or consuming a product. For additional information about a product, please contact the manufacturer.*

# Spider-Man Amazing Smile Set - Toothbrush Holder, Toothbrush & Rinse Cup

Looking for a fun and practical toothbrush set for your little superhero? Look no further than the Spider-Man Amazing Smile Set! This set includes a Spider-Man toothbrush, toothbrush holder, and rinse cup, all featuring your child's favorite web-slinging hero.

## Features

- Spider-Man Toothbrush: The Spider-Man toothbrush will make brushing time more exciting for your child. It features a colorful design and soft bristles for a gentle yet thorough clean.

- Toothbrush Holder: The toothbrush holder keeps your child's toothbrush organized and within easy reach. It is designed with the iconic Spider-Man logo to add a touch of superhero style to their bathroom.

- Rinse Cup: The rinse cup is perfect for rinsing and storing the toothbrush. With its Spider-Man design, it adds an extra element of fun to your child's oral care routine.

## Benefits

The Spider-Man Amazing Smile Set brings together functionality, style, and your child's favorite superhero for an excellent toothbrushing experience. Here are some benefits it offers:

1. Encourages Good Oral Hygiene: With the Spider-Man toothbrush, your child will be excited to brush their teeth. This set helps make oral hygiene a fun and enjoyable activity for young kids.

2. Organized Bathroom: The toothbrush holder keeps the bathroom counter neat and tidy by providing a dedicated spot for the toothbrush. No more searching for misplaced toothbrushes!

3. Motivates Consistent Brushing: The Spider-Man design of this set will motivate your child to brush their teeth regularly. It can turn brushing time into an exciting daily ritual.

## Customer Reviews

The Spider-Man Amazing Smile Set has received an average rating of 4.4 stars from 92 satisfied customers. Here's what some of them had to say:

- "My son loves his new toothbrush holder."
- "Goes great with my boys' décor and they love it."
- "Perfect for my 8-year-old's bathroom."
- "My son brushes his teeth with his sister just to use this."

## Order Your Spider-Man Amazing Smile Set Now!

Make toothbrushing time more enjoyable and keep your child's oral hygiene in check with the Spider-Man Amazing Smile Set. Click "Add to Cart" now and give your little superhero the gift of a healthy smile!

Our wide range of color selection ensures we have your skin tone. 30ml/ 1 fl oz'] Price: 27.0 Store: Aeroblend Details: {"Item Form": "Cream", "Color": "O35", "Skin Type": "All", "Finish Type": "Natural", "Recommended Uses For Product": "Face Makeup", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.57 x 1.3 x 1.22 inches; 2.08 Ounces", "UPC": "850732005787 850732005206", "Manufacturer": "Aeroblend Airbrush"} Review Text: Aeroblend is The Best airbrush foundation. It looks just like my natural skin when applied. I purchased my Aeroblend system in November, and it's Wonderful! Since November, I have tried Luminess, Belloccio, and Aeroblend foundations. I had hoped I would like Belloccio because it's half the price, but it could not compare to the Aeroblend Foundation. The Luminess was too sticky, like it never set. The Aeroblend looks Absolutely Flawless. It takes minutes to do my makeup now, and so many people have asked me about my skin. I am so glad I purchased my Aeroblend system! I ordered this for my 16 year old granddaughter and she LOVES it. She said her makeup is sooooo awesome with this that she hates to take it off. She had a luminess airbrush and it was difficult to clean and would put dots of makeup on her face instead of a nice smooth finish. This one is amazing. Large bottle. Great color match. Secure bottle. I'm 100% happy!
After reading the reviews I was excited to try this. WoW! I purchased the Luminous kit previously & at first was excited but the bottles were small and they always leaked (in shipping & in my cabinet). This color was a perfect match for my light (not pale) skin. I use with my Luminous air system and LOVE it! This will be my go to! I was use to the small bottle, and I managed to spill the liquid twice.........if your used to the small bottles do something that you don't make the same mistake I did twice. And so much bigger than the original sample bottles I had with my machine I purchased this system and the first container was great. This one is full of lumps and will not blend. Even after shaking for almost 10 minutes. It plugged up the tip and now I am unable to use the foundation. Seriously disappointed. This is the lightest, most long-wearing foundation I've ever used. Period. And with mature (52) skin which tends to be dry, I'm not left with unsightly creases at the end of the day either. I use the Aeroblend airbrush to apply this in the morning and it looks great literally all day long! Despite having sensitive skin, this makeup has not caused a single breakout to date. It also doesn't feel like I'm wearing a mask - goes on light and stays that way. Highly recommend. I have never ordered this brand so I thought i’d Get it a try especially for the price of the size bottle you get. I ordered two different colors since I wasn’t sure and this one N20 was a perfect match for my skin. You also use less of this than the Luminess I have always purchased. This is what I will use from now on. Great makeup but thinner than I’m used to so I had to adjust, will buy again, better price. I like to buy a very light and very dark in airbrush makeup so I can mix any shade in between. The problem with this product is it cant be back bubbled. It just created a bunch of bubbles. To mix it you have to mix in a separate container and then pour it into the airbrush. Sadly I bought a bunch of light when it was on sale around Christmas so Im stuck with it for now. Another big issue with this brand that I havent experienced with any other airbrush makeup is that it settles really bad and you have to shake it vigorously for quite a while before it mixes. I have never had a product that required this much shaking. The color is decent but tends to rub off easily. I have to be extra careful not to touch my face.

response:
# Aeroblend Airbrush Makeup Foundation (O35)

The Aeroblend Airbrush Makeup Foundation is a game-changer in the world of makeup. This water-based airbrush foundation is specifically designed for use with the Aeroblend airbrush systems, providing a flawless and natural-looking coverage that doesn't require frequent touch-ups. 

## Key Features
- Long-lasting Effect: With the Aeroblend foundation, you can enjoy up to 10 hours of wear. It is waterproof, and even sweat can't wipe it away, making it perfect for HD makeup.
- Safe for Your Skin: This foundation is free from parabens and silicone, ensuring that your skin is protected from harmful chemicals. It is also fragrance-free, suitable for even the most sensitive skin types.
- Applicable to All Skin Types: From dry to oily, the Aeroblend foundation works wonders for any skin type, providing a smooth and flawless finish.
- Botanical and Mineral Ingredients: Enriched with botanical and mineral ingredients like kaolin, lavender, and jojoba, this foundation hydrates and soothes your skin. The soft focus pigments not only provide excellent coverage but are also appropriate for even HD use.

## Flawless Coverage, All Day Long
The Aeroblend Airbrush Makeup Foundation is specially formulated to provide a natural finish and long-lasting coverage you've been dreaming of. It contains no fragrance, parabens, or petroleum-derived ingredients, making it suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive ones. 

## Find Your Perfect Match
With a wide range of color selections available, we've got your skin tone covered. Say goodbye to the days of struggling to find your perfect shade - the Aeroblend Airbrush Makeup Foundation has it all. 

## Customer Reviews
- "I have tried Luminess, Belloccio, and Aeroblend foundations, and Aeroblend is the best. It looks just like my natural skin when applied."
- "This makeup is so awesome that my 16-year-old granddaughter hates to take it off. It gives her a nice smooth finish, unlike her previous airbrush foundation."
- "Even after shaking for almost 10 minutes, this foundation plugged up the tip and I am unable to use it. Seriously disappointed."
- "This is the most long-wearing foundation I've ever used. It goes on light and stays that way all day long."
- "I will only use Aeroblend from now on. It's a great makeup at a better price."

## Get Your Aeroblend Airbrush Makeup Foundation Now!
Experience the flawless and long-lasting coverage that the Aeroblend Airbrush Makeup Foundation offers. Order yours today and achieve that perfect, natural look you've always desired.

# Traxxas TRA8073 Mirrors, side, black (left & right)/ retainers (2)/ body clips (4)

Upgrade your Traxxas TRX-4 with the sleek and stylish Traxxas TRA8073 Mirrors. Designed to enhance the aesthetic appeal of your RC vehicle, these black side mirrors are a must-have accessory. 

## Key Features and Specifications

- Premium Quality: Made from durable black plastic, these mirrors are built to withstand the demands of off-road adventures.
- Convenient Set: Each package includes one left mirror, one right mirror, two retainers, and four body clips, providing you with everything you need for a hassle-free installation.
- Easy Installation: These TRA8073 mirrors are designed for an exact fit, ensuring a seamless integration with your Traxxas TRX-4.
- Perfect Fitment: The mirrors are specially designed to fit the TRX-4, guaranteeing a secure and precise installation without the need for modifications.
- All-in-One Package: With the included retainers and body clips, you'll have all the necessary components to complete the installation effortlessly.

## Enhance the Look of Your RC Vehicle

## Customer Reviews

One customer mentioned, "I like the way it looks," praising the overall appearance of the mirrors. Another customer added, "Exact fit and comes with everything you need," highlighting the convenience of the package.

## Order Your Traxxas TRA8073 Mirrors Today!

Product ID: B07BSMFXZN Title: Lobe Wonder Invisible Earring Earlobe Support Patches (pack of 2) Average Rating: 4.6 Number of Ratings: 2101 Features: ['Each self adhesive oval patch is super-reinforced with a criss-cross network to strengthen and support ear lobes', 'Ear lobes will look natural not stretched and dragged down by the weight of heavy earrings'] Description: ['Lobe Wonder Ear Lobe Support Patches Lobe Wonder Support Patches work to repair the appearance of torn, damaged and stretched ear lobes instantly! Worn behind your ear lobe, these invisible patches are the perfect remedy to the problem of heavy pierced earrings tearing and s-t-r-e-t-c-hing your ear lobes. Each self adhesive oval patch is super-reinforced with a criss-cross network to strengthen and support ear lobes. Your ear lobes will look natural, not stretched and dragged down by the weight of heavy earrings. Lobe Wonder patches are "breathable" and the special medical adhesive doesn\'t irritate the skin. With Lobe Wonder, you\'ll be able to wear your chandelier earrings, hoops and favorite studs. And the best part? No more worry about tearing and stretching!'] Price: 11.99 Store: Lobe Wonder Details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "4.1 x 3.6 x 0.7 inches; 1.13 Ounces", "Item model number": "Lobe-Wonder", "Material Feature": "Compostable Warning", "Date First Available": "September 15, 2010", "Manufacturer": "Lobe Wonder"} Review Text: I have bought these before. They arrived on time and work great. I can wear my heavy earrings again. These are so great. I am able to wear hoops without my earlobe looking weird. Comfortable and eases the drag on the ear lobe when earrings are heavy. I’d be lost or need plastic surgery without lobe wonders! I haven’t been able to find the brand in stores since Claire’s shut down, my earrings were pulled out years ago and I never thought I’d be able to wear earrings again, lobe wonders are durable long lasting and reliable. However I recommend if wearing a heavy earring use two of the lobe wonders, I only were one as I normally only wear diamond studs but if I must were dangling earrings I use two. Also, even if you don’t have a situation where your ear lobes are completely split they truly help hold your earrings up without putting stress on your piercings. I have bought these for years. They are an excellent value at Amazon and work great. I LOVE THESE!!!! When I was in Jr. High (over 40 years ago) I had the hole in my pierced ear ripped & over the years it has gotten increasingly worse. I could never where stud earrings or small earrings because they would literally go through the hole in my ear until I discovered these about 6 years ago & I have used them ever since. These worked exactly as they are supposed to:) it does not work for big earrings as in the pisture it shows small earrings.tried two still did not work.stuck with the was
te of money don't pay to ship back,glad I bought the smaller package. They don't stick long...and they come off easily. They are a good size and are clear.
They just need more adhesicivness. I have a torn earlobe ( torn all the way to the end) I wouldn't be able to wear earrings without these! If you clean the back of your earlobe with rubbing alcohol beforehand it will make these stay on for about a week, maybe two. Love this product!!!!

# Lobe Wonder Invisible Earring Earlobe Support Patches (Pack of 2)

Having trouble with torn, damaged, or stretched ear lobes? Look no further than the Lobe Wonder Invisible Earring Earlobe Support Patches! These patches are designed to repair the appearance of torn and stretched ear lobes instantly, giving you the freedom to wear your favorite earrings without worries.

## Reinforced and Supportive

Each self-adhesive oval patch is super-reinforced with a criss-cross network, providing strength and support to your ear lobes. Say goodbye to the stretched and dragged-down look caused by heavy earrings. With Lobe Wonder, your ear lobes will look natural and won't be weighed down by the heaviness of your earrings.

## Comfortable and Breathable

Lobe Wonder patches are not only supportive but also comfortable to wear. The "breathable" patches are made with a special medical adhesive that doesn't irritate the skin. You can wear them all day without any discomfort or irritation.

## Perfect for All Earrings

# Emani All-In-One Vegan Eyebrow Cream

Create the perfect frame for your eyes with the Emani All-In-One Vegan Eyebrow Cream. This innovative product combines a brow powder, gel, pencil, and setting powder into one convenient formula, allowing you to transform your brows into works of art.

## Features

- **All-in-One Formula**: This 100% vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free formula gives your brows a fuller-looking finish. Say goodbye to the hassle of using multiple products to achieve your desired brow look.
- **Long-Lasting and Waterproof**: The waterproof formula ensures that your perfectly shaped brows stay in place all day long. Whether you're hitting the gym or braving the rainy weather, your brows will remain intact.
- **Ideal for All Skin Types**: This creamy, multitasking product is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. It won't clog pores or cause irritation, making it a safe and comfortable option for everyone.
- **Easy to Use**: The Emani All-In-One Vegan Eyebrow Cream glides smoothly on your brows, creating well-defined and sculpted eyebrows. Achieve a natural look or go bold – the choice is yours.

## Benefits

- **Convenience**: Say goodbye to the hassle of using multiple brow products. With this all-in-one formula, you can achieve your desired brow look with just one product, saving you time and effort.
- **Long-Lasting**: The Emani All-In-One Vegan Eyebrow Cream is designed to stay in place all day long. You won't have to worry about touch-ups throughout the day, ensuring that your brows look perfect from morning to night.
- **Versatility**: Whether you prefer a natural-looking brow or something more dramatic, this eyebrow cream has got you covered. Experiment with different styles and find the look that suits you best.
- **High-Quality Formula**: Emani is known for its high-quality, vegan, and cruelty-free products. With this eyebrow cream, you can trust that you're using a product that is not only good for you but also good for the planet.

## Customer Reviews

- "I like the texture, shade, and ease of using it! Excellent product!"
- "Love the product. Easy on and very natural."
- "This pomade is amazing! So happy with my purchase!"
- "This brow pomade lasts-both on the brows and in the container."

## Get the Emani All-In-One Vegan Eyebrow Cream today and transform your brows into works of art!

# Chelly Keratin Treatment Deep Cleansing Shampoo: Refresh and Revitalize Your Hair!

The Chelly Keratin Treatment Deep Cleansing Shampoo is the perfect solution for those looking to reset their hair and restore its natural beauty. With its deep-cleansing formula, this shampoo effectively removes dirt, hair product residue, and buildup from both your hair and scalp. Say goodbye to dull and damaged hair, and hello to refreshed, vibrant locks!

## Deeply Cleanses, without Irritation

Formulated with care, this shampoo is designed to deeply cleanse your hair without causing any irritation. It removes impurities, leaving your hair feeling fresh, clean, and revitalized. 

## pH-Balanced for Optimum Results

Our shampoo has a high pH, which helps open the cuticles, allowing treatments to deeply penetrate and absorb properly. When combined with the low pH of smoothing and conditioning treatments, it provides a perfect balance for your hair and scalp to effectively treat dull damaged hair. 

## Paraben-Free and Gentle on Your Hair

We care about your hair's health, which is why our Chelly Keratin Treatment Deep Cleansing Shampoo is paraben-free, phosphate-free, drying alcohol-free, and silicone-free. Rest assured that this shampoo is gentle on your hair, ensuring it feels soft, manageable, and healthy after each use.

## Made in the USA with Premium Quality Ingredients

Chelly takes great pride in ensuring that our products are made with the highest quality ingredients. Our Chelly Keratin Treatment Deep Cleansing Shampoo is proudly made in the USA, giving you peace of mind knowing that you are using a product that meets the highest standards.

Transform your hair and indulge in the luxury of salon-like results with the Chelly Keratin Treatment Deep Cleansing Shampoo. Order now and experience the difference it can make for your hair!

Price: $12.99  
Store: CHELLY

# Becca Be A Light Palette (Medium to Deep)

*Average Rating: 4.2 / Number of Ratings: 17*

The Becca Be A Light Palette in Medium to Deep is the perfect all-in-one face palette for achieving a soft, natural glow. 

## Features

- **Brighten**: This neutral peach shade highlights your complexion, giving you a radiant and luminous look.
- **Blur**: The warm sand shade minimizes the appearance of pores, lines, and blemishes, creating a smooth and flawless complexion.
- **Contour**: Create natural dimension with the warm bronze shade, sculpting your features for a defined and chiseled look.
- **Blush**: The warm copper shade with rose gold pearl adds a luminous flush to your cheeks, giving you a healthy and radiant appearance.

## Benefits

The Becca Be A Light Palette is formulated with their new Sheer Glow Filter Powder, designed to let your natural skin shine through. With Light Diffusing Technology, this palette acts as a real-life filter, visibly minimizing imperfections and evening out your skin tone for a perfecting veil and a soft, natural finish. 

This palette is perfect for daily use, allowing for natural contouring without the need for additional concealer or powder. The shades are specifically curated for medium to deep skin tones, providing a gorgeous and natural contour. Plus, it is non-comedogenic, so it won't clog your pores or cause breakouts. 

## Get Your Becca Be A Light Palette Now!

Experience the Becca Be A Light Palette and enhance your natural beauty with its silky and blendable formula. Create a soft, natural glow with the varying levels of pigment and pearl in each shade, and enjoy a flawless and radiant complexion. Don't miss out on this must-have face palette. Buy now and achieve a beautiful and natural glow every day!

*Price: $78.49*
*Store: BECCA*

Product ID: B07HXWG5SP Title: Paco Rabanne 1 ONE MILLION EDT 100ml 3.4oz Eau de Toilette Men NEW SEALED BOX Average Rating: 4.7 Number of Ratings: 3663 Features: [] Description: ['Paco Rabanne 1 ONE MILLION EDT 100ml 3.4oz Eau de Toilette Men NEW SEALED BOX'] Price: 63.49 Store: Paco Rabanne Details: {"Brand": "Paco Rabanne", "Item Form": "Spray", "Item Volume": "3.4 Fluid Ounces", "Fragrance Concentration": "Eau_de_toilette", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "6.4 x 2.9 x 2 inches; 1.92 Ounces", "Item model number": "LE", "Manufacturer": "Paco Rabanne"} Review Text: The One Million LUCKY is my favorite scent on my husband. He ran out and I missed the smell, so I ordered more. However... One of these things is not like the other. Or rather, one of these things is like both...

The left bottle is a genuine bottle of One Million Lucky, the center bottle is what I just received, and the right bottle is One Million.

The bottle I just received.... Notice the one on the left has the chrome/gold front and clear glass? The one on the right has a gold front and amber glass? Hm. The one in the center has the chrome/gold front.... But amber glass??? It also smells nothing like Lucky. It definitely smells more of the regular One Million.

I have reordered and only HOPE this is an isolated incident and I get the correct thing this next time.
-----
I rec'd the bottle I reordered today, and thankfully everything seems to be legit with it and I can resume sniffing my husband. Smells great.

I usually use 2 squirts, with Sauvage and Chanel. With Lucky I need 3 for the staying power.

I was worried about all the fakes online, but I took my bottle to Macys - 100% LIGIT.

3/4 hour projection then need to reapply, reason I gave 4 Stars but I totally love this fragrance! I bought this Cologne as a Christmas Gift for my Son; He chose the type of Cologne, but of course I wanted to get a good deal and not pay Department Store prices! I'm always worried about buying products like this online, but the Cologne seemed to be the real thing and he was very happy with it...so let's call it a good deal. Excellent perfume 100 percent authentic, fully recommended. we purchased the little one for traveling - and it is truly a great smelling mens cologne which we'd read about then ordered a tester on - then this purchase. Give it a try you won't be disappointed. Nice! smells good A lot of complaints Smells grest Great scent.

# Hairdresser Grooming Smock: Stylish and Functional

Introducing our Grey Hairdresser Grooming Smock, perfect for men and women in the grooming industry. This smock is not only stylish but also highly functional, providing optimum protection for your clothes while you work. 

## Features:

- **Comfortable and Light Weight**: Made from soft nylon material, our smock is designed to provide ultimate comfort throughout the day. It won't weigh you down, allowing you to move freely and work with ease.

- **Water-Repellent and Anti-Static**: The 245T density nylon material is not only water-repellent, but it also prevents hair from sticking to the fabric. Say goodbye to those annoying hair cling-ons!

- **Easy Snap Closures**: The smock features 6 easy snap closures on the front, allowing for quick and hassle-free removal. No more struggling with Velcro closures.

- **Convenient Pockets**: With two large front pockets, you can easily store and organize your necessary tools. No more searching for misplaced items during your grooming session.

- **Versatile Use**: Whether you're a dog groomer, hair stylist, nail technician, esthetician, or massage therapist, our smock is suitable for all. It's a must-have for professionals in the grooming industry.

## Customer Reviews:

- "I really like the material, easy clean, easy wash & dry. Excellent for grooming my dogs, hair slides off the material & clothes are totally protected."
- "Great fit, length, and like that you can roll the sleeves and secure them."
- "This smock is very comfortable and stylish. Keeps spray from soaking my clothes."
- "Comfortable and light. Smaller size than advertised, but does the job."

Don't compromise on style or functionality. Get our Grey Hairdresser Grooming Smock today and protect your clothes from any spills or hair mess. With its sleek design and practical features, it's the perfect addition to your grooming essentials.

# Amope PediMask Kit- 20 Minute Foot Mask

Your feet go through so much every day and have never failed you, isn’t it time you show them some love? Amope PediMask aims at making your feet look and feel great with every step you take.

## 20 Minutes to Rejuvenated and Soothes Feet

The Amope PediMask Kit is the perfect addition to your foot care routine, delivering healthy-looking feet in just 20 minutes. These sock masks will rejuvenate and soothe your heels, giving you baby smooth feet effortlessly.

## Enriched with Moisturizers and Macadamia Oils

Pamper your feet with the goodness of moisturizers and Macadamia Oil. The Amope PediMask provides long-lasting hydration, leaving your feet soft, smooth, and supple.

## Easy to Use, No Mess

Designed to stay in place, the foot mask ensures a mess-free experience and easy clean-up. Simply put on the sock mask, remove after 20 minutes, and massage in any remaining product for maximum benefits.

## Best Results with Amope Electronic Foot File

For optimal results, pair the Amope PediMask with the Amope Electronic Foot File. The combination of these two products will leave your feet feeling incredibly soft and smooth.

## Customer Reviews

- "My feet are so soft!"
- "Love the way the foot wrap feels on my feet!"
- "This product is great. I even bought a box for my sister and she loves it too!"
- "Not being able to get a pedi during this pandemic, this product is the next best thing to having beautiful feet!"

**Get your Amope PediMask Kit now and give your feet the pampering they deserve!**

# T Outliner Ceramic Replacement Cutter, GTX Blades

Maintain the optimal performance of your clippers with the T Outliner Ceramic Replacement Cutter. Designed as a replacement for Andis T-outliner and GTX blades, this cutter is a cost-effective solution to keep your clippers in top working order. 

## Features

- **Long-lasting**: Made from extra strong ceramic material, these replacement cutters are resistant to chipping and breaking. 
- **Affordable**: Replacing a defective or broken cutter is more economical than replacing the entire blade. 
- **Easy Installation**: These cutters are designed for hassle-free installation, allowing you to continue using your clippers without any interruptions.

By investing in the T Outliner Ceramic Replacement Cutter, you can enjoy the following benefits:

## Customer Reviews

Customers have praised the T Outliner Ceramic Replacement Cutter for its performance and affordability. Reviewers have found that it stays cooler longer than steel blades, ensuring a comfortable shaving experience. Although some users mentioned difficulties aligning the ceramic blades, they were overall satisfied with the closeness of the shave.

## Take Action Now!

Don't compromise on the quality of your clippers. Keep them in excellent condition with the T Outliner Ceramic Replacement Cutter. Click "Add to Cart" and experience the convenience and efficiency of these affordable replacement cutters today!

Review Text: Last just as long as salon nails at an affordable price (No photo) However I am wearing these to help me pick up documents and photos from my scanner screen. They help to keep the screen clear of finger smudges. Since we wash our hands frequently and do not use lotion or creams when working with photos these nails stay intact for at least 4 days.  After 4 days if you are not careful or wear rubber gloves that make your hands sweat they will become loose. I have reapplied the nails by removing the adhesive pad underneath and instead applied nail glue directly to them.  These nails seem to be stronger than the ones that I purchased at the store. They look better too. I'm not into "bling" on nails that I wear every day. I will buy these again! # Callus Pro Cordless Rechargeable Handheld Pedicure Tool
Say goodbye to tough, hard foot calluses with the Callus Pro Cordless Rechargeable Handheld Pedicure Tool. This innovative tool is designed to effortlessly remove calluses and dead skin layers, leaving your feet soft and smooth. 

## Features
- Includes 1 electric foot file, 1 adapter power supply, and 3 coarse grit disposable sanding discs
- Cordless and rechargeable lightweight handheld exfoliator
- Removes tough foot calluses for soft, smooth skin
- Pressure-sensitive button controls sanding speed from 16,000-19,000 RPM
- Uses disposable, replaceable sanding discs to exfoliate hard calluses

## Effortless and Gentle
The Callus Pro utilizes rotating sanding discs to gently and effectively remove calluses and dead skin layers. With its cordless design and multiple speed options, you have complete control over the angle, pressure, and speed, ensuring optimal results every time.

## Convenient and Easy to Use
This handheld pedicure tool is lightweight and portable, allowing you to take it anywhere. It includes disposable and easy-to-switch-out sanding discs, making it perfect for multiple users. The small handle fits comfortably in any adult hand, providing a secure grip for precise control.

## Rechargeable and Long-lasting
Charge the Callus Pro overnight for all-day use. Its rechargeable feature eliminates the need for batteries, saving you time and money. 

## Specifications
- Product dimensions: L 8 x W (head) 3 inches
- Power source: 1.6A, power consumption: 5W

## Customer Reviews
- *Highly recommend*: "I have had dry feet for years (psoriasis), and this is the quickest remedy to take care of that. Simple and effective."
- *Product defect issue*: "You pay over $100 for a product that doesn't work and they only give you a 30 Day Return! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT - WASTING YOUR MONEY."

## Get Soft, Smooth Feet Today!
Experience the benefits of the Callus Pro Cordless Rechargeable Handheld Pedicure Tool and enjoy soft, smooth feet effortlessly. Take control of your foot care routine and order now!

Applying the Ever Ego Italy Care BioStyling Mask is a breeze. After washing your hair with the BioStyling Shampoo, towel-dry your hair and apply the mask evenly to your scalp, hair shaft, and ends. Leave it on for a few minutes and rinse well. Experience the luxurious results with just a few simple steps.

response:
## BERON Rainbow Wigs Short Wavy Womens Wig

Looking for a fun and vibrant wig to amp up your Halloween party costume or cosplay? Look no further than the BERON Rainbow Wigs Short Wavy Womens Wig! With its stunning rainbow color, this synthetic wig is sure to make you the center of attention. 

### Premium Synthetic Fiber for Durability and Style

Crafted with premium heat-resistant synthetic fiber, this wig allows for easy styling. You can curl or straighten it with heat below 150°C (302°F) to create your desired look. The wavy texture and bangs add a touch of playfulness to your appearance, making it perfect for parties or events.

### Comfortable and Adjustable

The wig features an adjustable inner cap net, providing a secure and comfortable fit. It comes with two adjustable straps that allow you to customize the size according to your preference, ensuring a snug fit for heads of all sizes.

### Lightweight and Breathable

Made with a rose net cap, this wig is designed to be lightweight and breathable, ensuring maximum comfort even during extended wear. You can dance the night away without feeling weighed down.

### Easy to Maintain

To keep your wig looking its best, remember to care and maintain it regularly. Avoid frequent washes and use a mild shampoo when necessary. After washing, hang it up to dry naturally and avoid direct sunlight. With proper care, this wig will stay looking fabulous for many parties to come.

### Specifications

- Type of Hair: Premium heat-resistant synthetic fiber
- Color: Rainbow
- Weight: 230g (± 20g)/set
- Length: 35cm/14" (± 5cm/2")

Enhance your Halloween or cosplay costume with the BERON Rainbow Wigs Short Wavy Womens Wig. Get ready to turn heads and receive compliments galore. Order yours today and get ready to shine!

Craft the perfect baby bow with our premium nylon headbands from Cherubb! Our headbands are carefully designed to provide the perfect fit for newborns, toddlers, and even adults, making them the ideal choice for all ages. With a stretch capacity of up to 12 inches, these headbands will grow with your child, eliminating the need to constantly buy new ones as they outgrow them.

## Gentle on Sensitive Skin

We understand the importance of delicate and sensitive baby skin. That's why our premium nylon headbands are crafted with super soft and safe materials that won't leave any red marks or discomfort on your little one's head. You can rest easy knowing that our headbands provide the perfect balance between durability and comfort.

## Easy to Clean and Maintain

Cleaning and maintaining our headbands is a breeze. If they get dirty, simply hand wash them using warm soap and water, and they will be as good as new. No need to worry about complicated cleaning procedures or expensive cleaning products.

## Durable and Long-lasting

Our headbands are made from a high-quality custom nylon blend fabric that ensures they hold their shape and elasticity, even with continuous wear. Say goodbye to headbands that easily stretch out or get runs. With Cherubb, you can be confident in the longevity of your headbands.

## Bulk Pack of 100

Each set contains 100 nude color nylon headbands, making it the perfect choice for DIY craft projects, custom baby shower gifts, or even starting your own bow shop. Buying in bulk not only saves you money but also provides a large supply of headbands for all your creative endeavors.

**Price: $32.99**

At Cherubb, we prioritize customer satisfaction, which is why we offer a 100% money-back guarantee. If you are unhappy with your purchase for any reason, we will refund your entire order, no questions asked. Craft the perfect baby bow today with Cherubb's premium nylon headbands!

# Feneche Bee Venom Instant Lifting Complex

*Achieve Youthful and Radiant Eyes with Feneche Bee Venom Instant Lifting Complex*

The Feneche Bee Venom Instant Lifting Complex is a powerful firming product designed to boost blood circulation and regenerate eye skin cells. With its unique formula, it reduces the appearance of fine lines and improves your skin's collagen growing ability. 

## Ultra-Firm and Nourishing Formula

Our instant lifting complex is enriched with powerful botanicals that nourish and protect your skin. It delivers anti-inflammatory power to the skin around the eyes, preventing visible signs of aging. With its hydrating properties, it firms and tightens the eye zone, reducing puffiness, wrinkles, eye bags, and dark circles. 

## Gentle and Versatile

Suitable for all skin types, our Feneche Bee Venom Instant Lifting Complex is gentle, ophthalmologist and clinically tested on sensitive skin. It won't clog pores or irritate your skin. You can use it around the eyes, on the face, neck, chin, hands, arms, and more. It's perfect for beauty therapists, salons, home use, and travel. 

## Experience the Difference

Absorbed quickly by your skin, our lightweight complex won't leave any residue. It enhances collagen production, stimulating skin cell regeneration and refining your skin texture and tone instantly. With Cucumis Sativa (cucumber) fruit water, it improves skin radiance and reduces the appearance of fine lines. It's a natural moisturizing gift for the most sensitive skin. 

## Your Satisfaction Guaranteed

At Feneche, your satisfaction is our top priority. If you have any issues or are unsatisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact us. We will promptly address your complaints and fix any issues you may have. 

Take a step towards youthful and radiant eyes. Order your Feneche Bee Venom Instant Lifting Complex now and experience the incredible benefits this product has to offer!

Retail Price: $68.95
Store: FENECHE

With Jafra Adorisse Night Eau de Parfum, your nights will be filled with unforgettable moments. This exquisite perfume is designed to linger on your skin until dawn, ensuring you leave a lasting impression wherever you go.

## Trusted Brand

CANMAKE Powder Cheeks feature an innovative Oil-In-Base formula that combines the smoothness of oil with a moist and silky texture. The fresh moisturizing powder will leave your skin feeling hydrated and velvety-smooth. It effortlessly clings to your cheeks, ensuring long-lasting wear that keeps you looking soft and cute throughout the day.

### 8 Beautifying and Moisturizing Agents
Infused with a blend of 8 beautifying and moisturizing agents, such as hyaluronic acid, glycerin, and honey, this powder blush not only provides a beautiful pop of color but also nourishes your skin. Enjoy the benefits of a silky-smooth complexion that feels moisturized and revitalized.

### Versatile and Suitable for All Skin Tones
CANMAKE Powder Cheeks PW43 Coral Hologram is suitable for all skin tones. Its light coverage and matte finish ensure a natural look that complements any makeup style. Whether you prefer a subtle everyday look or a more glamorous evening appearance, this powder blush is a versatile addition to your beauty routine.

### Enjoy the Ultimate Luster
Indulge in the captivating glow of CANMAKE Powder Cheeks PW43 Coral Hologram. Its alluring light-polarizing pearl and oil-in-base formula will revitalize your cheeks, giving you a radiant and youthful appearance. Take your makeup game to the next level and experience the convenience of this pocket-sized powder blush!

# Kaleidoscope Therapeutic Shampoo + Conditioner + Leave in 8oz + Drops 2oz

**Price: $55.9**  
**Store: Kaleidoscope**  
**Average Rating: 4.5** (Based on 978 ratings)

## Description

Refresh and revitalize your hair with the Kaleidoscope Therapeutic Shampoo + Conditioner + Leave in + Drops set. This complete hair care system is infused with natural ingredients like Rosemary, Ginger, Jojoba Oil, and essential oils to cleanse, moisturize, and nourish your hair and scalp.

### Therapeutic Detox Shampoo

The Therapeutic Detox Shampoo thoroughly cleanses your hair without stripping it, thanks to its cool stimulating formula infused with Rosemary, Ginger, and Jojoba Oil. It removes build-up, restores the natural pH balance of your hair and scalp, and leaves them feeling purified.

### Nourishing Conditioner

The Nourishing Conditioner revitalizes and restores moisture to dry, damaged, and lifeless hair. Its nutrient-rich formula instantly smoothens, softens, and moisturizes your hair for visibly healthier results. Say goodbye to dry and dull hair!

### Miracle Drops

Kaleidoscope Miracle Drops are the secret to healthy and vibrant hair. This liquid gold hair and scalp oil is packed with essential oils that combat dry scalp, aid in hair growth, and provide a lightweight shine. Infused with cooling peppermint and nourishing aloe extracts, these Miracle Drops leave your scalp tingling and refreshed.

## Benefits

- Thoroughly cleanses and purifies hair
- Restores and maintains natural moisture balance
- Smoothens and softens hair
- Promotes hair growth and prevents breakage
- Leaves hair feeling refreshed and revitalized

## How to Use

For best results, use the Kaleidoscope Miracle Drops as part of a system, alongside the Kaleidoscope Moisture Silk Shampoo and Conditioner or the Kaleidoscope Therapeutic Shampoo and Conditioner.

## Customer Reviews

"I love the way my hair feels when using the shampoo, conditioner, leave-in conditioner, and miracle drops. My hair doesn't feel dry like with other popular products, and I have already started to see growth after only two weeks." - 5 stars

"This product is great for hair growth. I saw results in just two weeks of use. I've been using Kaleidoscope products for a while now, and I love the shampoo and conditioner. They smell really good, and the minty sensation on my scalp is refreshing. The conditioner milk with rice water is a nice addition." - 5 stars

"I had a flashback to wash day as a girl with the sulfur eight hair grease. Not a good memory. This stuff is loaded with chemicals and I will not be repurchasing." - 1 star

**Try the Kaleidoscope Therapeutic Shampoo + Conditioner + Leave in + Drops set today to experience healthier, revitalized hair!**

response:
# Salerm HI REPAIR Shampoo & Mask Conditioner DUO SET

The Salerm HI REPAIR Shampoo & Mask Conditioner DUO SET is a revolutionary hair care system designed specifically for damaged hair. With its advanced technology and nourishing formula, this duo set rejuvenates and repairs your hair, leaving it strong, full-bodied, and with a beautiful shine and softness.

## Features

- Rejuvenates and repairs your hair.
- Ideal for damaged hair.
- Provides more shine and softness.
- Delivers immediate results.

## Sequential Hair Care System

The Salerm HI REPAIR Shampoo is formulated with the latest technology developed by Salerm Cosmetics. It is a sequential hair care system that effectively restores the natural qualities of dehydrated hair by addressing water deficiencies, defects in the internal structure of the cortex, and lack of nutrients. This shampoo will leave your hair hydrated, nourished, and noticeably healthier.

## Restoring Natural Qualities

The accompanying Salerm HI REPAIR Mask Conditioner is also part of this sequential hair care system. It works in synergy with the shampoo to reconstruct your hair, providing immediate action and restoring its natural qualities. With its moisturizing and repairing properties, this mask will give your hair an incredible softness, shine, and manageability.

## Customer Reviews

Our customers absolutely love the Salerm HI REPAIR Shampoo & Mask Conditioner DUO SET. With an average rating of 4.5, this duo set has received glowing reviews from 88 satisfied customers. Here's what they have to say:

- "Muy buena calidad! It leaves the hair silky, shiny, and lasts a long time."
- "Good for my hair! I recommend it."
- "Both products smell super good. I leave the mask on overnight and mix it with whatever oil I can find under my bathroom sink. In the morning, my hair looks really good."
- "Excelente producto. I love it. It's worth it."

## Take Your Haircare to a New Level

Experience the rejuvenating and repairing power of the Salerm HI REPAIR Shampoo & Mask Conditioner DUO SET. Indulge in the convenience of this sequential hair care system and witness the immediate transformation of your damaged hair.

Make a smart investment in your hair's health and beauty. Order your Salerm HI REPAIR Shampoo & Mask Conditioner DUO SET now and enjoy the benefits of strong, full-bodied hair with an enviable shine and softness.

# VIROCHEMISTRY Pheromones For Women (Elixir)

## The Ultimate Attraction Perfume

Introducing VIROCHEMISTRY Pheromones For Women (Elixir), the elegantly crafted fragrance that combines the power of scientifically proven pheromones with a captivating scent, guaranteed to leave a lasting impression. 

## Scientifically Formulated

Our unique blend of human pheromones has been scientifically formulated and proven to attract men and stimulate their receptors. We have carefully selected the most effective scents and oils available to create an enticing perfume that appeals to his desires.

## Irresistible Scent, Unmatched Results

With hints of green mandarin, water jasmine, fiery ginger lily, salted vanilla, sandalwood, cashmere, and ambergris, "Elixir" offers a fantastic smelling experience that will captivate the senses. 

## Long-Lasting Effect

Our pheromone perfume features a powerful, long-lasting scent that works for over 35 hours. Apply it once and ensure ample time for the pheromones to work their magic, attracting men and giving you the competitive edge in any social situation.

## High-Quality and Safe

Our perfume is made with a silky smooth, moisturizing blend that enhances the absorption of pheromones. It is alcohol-free and uses a proprietary blend of natural oils and human-grade pheromones, protecting your skin while delivering an amazing scent.

## Customer Review

"I haven't had enough opportunities to experiment socially yet, but as far as fragrance goes, this stuff is great! It's fruity with a hint of suede & powder, bright but feminine. It has great lasting power. I am very active at work & it wasn't overpowering, but I could catch the scent throughout the day, so at least 8 hrs. Would definitely recommend!" - 4/5 Stars.

## Take Charge of Your Destiny

Don't miss out on the chance to enhance your allure and create unforgettable impressions. Click **Add to Cart** now and change your life with VIROCH

response:
# Counterfeit Blonde Clown White Makeup (Small 3.4 Ounces)

Are you a professional clown or a mime performer in need of high-quality white makeup? Look no further than Counterfeit Blonde Clown White Makeup! With an average rating of 4.2 from 1243 satisfied customers, this is the perfect white face paint for all your performance needs.

## Features:

- **Great Coverage and Easy to Remove:** Our Counterfeit Blonde Clown White Makeup offers excellent coverage and is easy to remove, making it perfect for both indoor and outdoor performances. It glides smoothly on the skin, ensuring a flawless finish.

- **Lanolin-Based Face Paint:** Our face paint is specially formulated with lanolin, a natural oil extracted from sheep. This helps prevent moisture loss, keeping your skin hydrated throughout your performance and avoiding any dryness or caking.

- **Maximum White Color:** Whether you need joker white face paint or full-body coverage, our Counterfeit Blonde Clown White Makeup provides the highest quality white color. It is the first choice of professional clowns and mimes worldwide.

- **Smooth and Easy to Work With:** Our makeup is specially formulated to be smooth and easy to work with, allowing you to create your desired look effortlessly. It can be applied using a sponge or applicator, offering versatility and convenience.

## Benefits:

- **Good Ingredients:** Our white face paint is mostly made of natural ingredients, making it suitable for long-term use. With the inclusion of lanolin, it hydrates the skin and prevents drying and caking.

- **Excellent Coverage and Easy Application:** The creamy consistency of our makeup ensures excellent coverage on the face or any area. It is buildable, allowing you to achieve the desired thickness. Additionally, it can be layered with other makeup for endless creative possibilities.

- **For All Ages:** Our white body paint contains natural compounds, making it generally safe for all ages and sensitive skin. However, we recommend conducting a skin patch test before use to ensure no negative reactions occur.

- **Various Applications:** Our white FX face paint is incredibly versatile and can be used for various Halloween characters such as vampires, Goths, zombies, skeletons, and evil clowns. It is also perfect for mime performers, allowing you to express your creativity and achieve the look you desire.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to enhance your performance and bring your characters to life with professional makeup and face paints. Get your Counterfeit Blonde Clown White Makeup from Narwhal Novelties today for just $6.95!

*Note: This makeup has a moisturizing feature, so avoid touching your face to preserve your makeup throughout your performance.*

*Washes off easily and provides great coverage. No itchiness and excellent value for money.*

*Buy now and unleash your creativity!*

# 2 Clinique Quickliner for Eyes Intense Eye Liner - Travel Size

The 2 Clinique Quickliner for Eyes Intense Eye Liner is a must-have beauty product for anyone looking to achieve stunning eyes effortlessly. With its compact and travel-friendly size, this eyeliner allows you to create the perfect eye look no matter where you are. 

## Smooth Application and Long-Lasting Results

Formulated with superior quality, this eyeliner glides on smoothly and stays put all day long. Say goodbye to smudged lines or raccoon eyes. The Clinique Quickliner provides a precise and long-lasting application, so you can confidently flaunt your eye makeup all day without worrying about touch-ups. 

## Convenient Travel Size

This package includes two travel-sized eyeliners, making it ideal for people on the go. The smaller size ensures that your eyeliner won't dry out before you can finish using it, and it easily fits into your purse or makeup bag. 

## Versatile and Gentle on Sensitive Eyes
