# AQUA POUR HOMME by Bvlgari Eau De Toilette Spray 5 oz / 150 ml (Men)

## Dive Into the Masculine Fragrance of the Sea

Experience the captivating power and beauty of the sea with AQVA pour Homme Eau de Toilette by Bvlgari. This aquatic, noble, and masculine fragrance is a celebration of the ocean, bringing a refreshing and invigorating scent to your day. With a perfect spherical flask design, the bottle itself reflects the merging shades of aquatic blue and green, capturing light and creating deep reflections.

## Unforgettable Fragrance That Lasts

Say goodbye to lackluster scents that disappear in an instant. AQUA POUR HOMME by Bvlgari is designed to leave a lasting impression. The scent is light and perfect for daytime wear, making it suitable for any occasion. With a longevity of 4-6 hours, this fragrance lingers on the skin and clothing, ensuring you smell great throughout the day.

## Make a Statement with Your Signature Scent

Indulge in the aroma that will turn heads and receive compliments wherever you go. AQUA POUR HOMME has been a favorite among fragrance enthusiasts, with its unique blend of aquatic notes that exude freshness and sophistication. This cologne smells so good that it has become a must-have for men who appreciate quality and style.

## Convenient Size for Everyday Use

This Eau de Toilette comes in a generous 5 oz / 150 ml spray bottle, providing you with a substantial amount of product to enjoy for months to come. The Bvlgari brand is renowned for its exceptional quality, ensuring that every spray is an experience in itself.

## Embrace the Power of the Sea with AQUA POUR HOMME

If you're looking to enhance your fragrance collection or find the perfect gift for a loved one, AQUA POUR HOMME is a fantastic choice. Order now and let the ecstasy of the sea wash over you, leaving you feeling refreshed, invigorated, and ready to conquer the day!

**Store:** BVLGARI

Product ID: B082245PK2 Title: Vaultz Locking Makeup Artist Case, Black White Stripe (VZ03755) Average Rating: 4.3 Number of Ratings: 1621 Features: ['Perfect for a large makeup collection', 'Built-in 14 brush holder in lid with cover; Customize space with 5 adjustable dividers', 'Convenient handle for easy carrying; Sturdy key lock', 'Removable, divided, upper tray for simple access to lower compartment', 'Hard-sided construction prevents items from being crushed'] Description: ['At Vaultz, "If it\'s Important to You, Lock It Up." The Vaultz Makeup Artist Case allows you to lock your personal and private items up in style. This durable and chic box is ideal for carrying makeup and other cosmetics on the go. The reliable key lock provides security, and the sturdy construction features steel corners, aluminum reinforcement, and a convenient handle for easy carrying. This makeup case features a built-in 14 brush holder in lid, a removable, divided, upper tray for simple access to lower compartment and 5 adjustable dividers to customize the space. This is a makeup case that you are sure to love. Black White Stripe.'] Price: 67.49 Store: Vaultz Details: {"Product Dimensions": "9.75 x 9.13 x 15.38 inches; 2.8 Pounds", "Item model number": "VZ03755", "UPC": "826030037553", "Manufacturer": "Ideastream Consumer Products, LLC"} Review Text: My boyfriend first got it and wasn’t very impressed. He started using it and now he uses it every day to make himself feel more secure about his belongings. Originally I left a bad review about it not locking, but I realized soon after that I just wasn't turning the key far enough because I thought the resistance I was meeting was the end of the lock turn.

After trying a few times I realize now it was my error in assuming the item was faulty and I am now correcting my review to rate it properly.

The Case is sturdy with a decent lock on it. I do wish it was a slightly different design as the lock although it does in fact lock it seems weak and anyone with any time on their hands could easily snap it probably with just a butter knife. Which I hope doesn't happen as I bought this item specifically to protect my make up from the greedy grubby hands of my own family since I had high end make up stolen from my current non locking case.

I do recommend this item for light protection of products and belongings but nothing more than that.

Cute design is definitely a selling feature. After spending literally hours searching Amazon (and target, and wal-mart, and ebay...) for the perfect train case to hold my cosmetics, I finally found it! It has all the features I was looking for: hard case, brush holders in the lid, and adjustable dividers. As a cherry on top, the case also has a lock on it, which is so handy if you have kids who want to play with your makeup or a teen that wants to "borrow" it.

This case features a simple, classic black fabric exterior and pretty pink lining. Its spacious interior will make you want to buy more cosmetics! Good value at $14/ea. I needed a soft bag or case that held its shape. So this met my needs. I found the internal pouches to be more of a nuisance than useful. If they were clear pouches, I may have used these. However the bulk of the pouch itself does take up valuable space. One side of the case has a mesh pocket which can easily hold small items. This is great for the nightstand or traveling. (Just don't leave it locked at the airport. TSA might have an uncomfortable conversation with you...but at least you'll have a funny story to tell when you get to your destination!) When I ordered this, I thought it was going to be a lot bigger than what it is. But over all it's a cute little makeup box. I store all of my lash collection in it I bought this to carry my medications in for to and from the doctor's office. The inside walls are removable making this perfect for what I needed it for. I would buy another is they had other patterns I liked Love it ! Came as described. I am very pleased and i will purchase another one of their styles. Worth it and came fast ! Plenty of room and does not weigh alot empty. Love this and use to lock up anything little hands shouldn't be able to get to, it seemed bigger then other medical cases that were for sale and it is really spacious.

# Vaultz Locking Makeup Artist Case

*Lock Your Belongings in Style*

The Vaultz Locking Makeup Artist Case allows you to securely store your personal and private items with style. This durable and chic box is perfect for carrying makeup and cosmetics on the go. With its reliable key lock and sturdy construction featuring steel corners and aluminum reinforcement, you can have peace of mind knowing that your items are safe and secure. 
 
## Features

- **Built-in Brush Holder**: The case features a built-in 14 brush holder in the lid with a cover, allowing you to easily organize and access your brushes.
- **Customizable Space**: The case includes 5 adjustable dividers, so you can customize the space to fit your specific needs.
- **Convenient Handle**: With a convenient handle, the case is easy to carry wherever you go.
- **Removable Upper Tray**: The case has a removable, divided upper tray, providing simple access to the lower compartment.
- **Hard-Sided Construction**: The hard-sided construction of the case prevents items from being crushed, keeping your makeup and cosmetics safe.

## Chic Design and Practicality

The Vaultz Locking Makeup Artist Case features a trendy Black and White Stripe design that adds a stylish touch to your collection. It is perfect for anyone who wants to protect their valuables, whether it's makeup from the prying hands of family members or medications when traveling. 

## Customer Reviews

Customers have praised this case for its functionality and design. They love the spacious interior, brush holders, and adjustable dividers that meet their storage needs. The lock on the case provides an added level of security, making it perfect for those who want to keep their makeup or other belongings safe. 

While some customers mentioned that the lock could be stronger, overall, they find the case to be suitable for light protection of products and belongings. The cute design is a definite selling feature that makes this case stand out from others on the market.

## **Get Your Vaultz Locking Makeup Artist Case today and secure your valuable items in style!**

Price: $67.49
Store: Vaultz

These performance accessories feature our New Balance dry and New Balance fresh technology and is your new go-to accessory for any activity.'] Price: 14.98 Store: New Balance Details: {"Item Package Dimensions L x W x H": "12.01 x 4.29 x 0.55 inches", "Package Weight": "0.04 Kilograms", "Brand Name": "New Balance", "Color": "Black", "Material": "Polyester", "Number of Items": "1", "Manufacturer": "Terramar Sports", "Size": "One Size", "Sport Type": "Cycling, Skiing, Climbing, Running", "Date First Available": "December 18, 2019", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Fabric Type": "polyester,polyester blend"} Review Text: The headband is not too thick. It is just right for an outdoor walk in colder weather. The size is right and it doesn’t feel tight or loose on the head. It covers the ears. I recommend it New Balance is a popular brand in our home. My husband & sons wear NB shoes because they're so comfortable. The same quality applies to this headband. It has a good stretch to fit larger heads, the seams are sewn in tight & neatly, and the material is soft. Another great product from New Balance! This New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband is super soft and stretchy.

I like that it is contoured to fit well around my ears and forehead. Great fabric that is soft and also breathable. It has a slight pattern to it that looks great. It is the perfect weight for colder weather without being bulky or uncomfortable. Moisture wicking and antimicrobial treatment to keep it smelling great too!

Quality product, by a quality company, at a very reasonable price. Pick one up today! This is a nice athletic headband/ear warmer. The black looks nice and the fabric is smooth and soft to touch, not at all irritating on the skin or face. It’s not very thick…So definitely more of an athletic style versus a cold-weather essentials style. I am able to wear it with my hair pulled back in a ponytail or with my hair down, and it definitely does a good job of keeping my ears sealed in from the wind and cold while outdoors walking my dog. I will say though that I have a pretty medium-sized head for a female, and while it fits me ok, I wouldn’t want it much tighter, so those with known larger heads may want to beware of a potentially tight fit. This is a great, lightweight headband. It's stretchy enough that it fits my head comfortably & my boyfriend's head as well. The fleece lining on the inside is a nice touch, it's warm but not so thick that you'd be unable to hear. This is perfect for those Fall/Winter months, especially if you don't want to wear a full hat. This headband fits perfectly. I'm in North Florida, so it still gets relatively cold here. I walk every day, so the colder weather can make it a little difficult. This headband is just the right about of thickness for weather in the 40-50 degree area. It does a great job of keeping my ears warm without overheating. The sleek black design goes great with any outfit as well. This will definitely keep my ears warm during the winter. I don't live in a very cold place, so when I say it keeps my ears warm that may not be the same for someone in snow. It's large and I wasn't a fan of wearing it with my hair down, but I would absolutely wear it with my hair up in a bun. Good fit. Great color. Not too warm so I would not recommend this to be worn on a winter run. This headband is great for when I go out on my daily runs! It’s lightweight and fits my head comfortably, it never falls or slips off while I’m running. It’s easy to take on and off and never stretches too big. The material feels nice, it also does a good job of wicking moisture and keeps dry from sweat while running. I like how the logo is reflective, that’s a nice touch. I wear it on all my runs, it’s convenient and comfy! I ordered this for my 16 yr old daughter to keep her ears warm while playing lacrosse since we are still getting snow!! But I ended up returning it because it was massive. It didn’t stay on her while being still (on me either) and there is absolutely no way it would have worked while running around on the field during practice. A bit disappointing since I bought the band and gloves to match since she is kind of weird about that kind of stuff.

response:
# New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband

Stay comfortable and stylish during your outdoor activities with the New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband. Engineered with comfort and performance in mind, this headband is your new go-to accessory for any activity.

## Ultimate Comfort and Performance

Made with our 360 Stretch Technology and the perfect polyester blend, the New Balance Grid Fleece Headband offers ultimate comfort every time you wear it. Its unique 3D stretch fabric blend allows for total freedom of movement, while quickly moving moisture away from the skin for fast drying. Stay dry and comfortable no matter how intense your workout gets.

## Perfect for Any Occasion

Whether you are skiing, running, biking, trekking, mountain climbing, or engaging in any other outdoor activity, this headband will keep your ears warm and protected in the winter. The New Balance Grid Fleece technology and reflective logo ensure that you stand out and stay safe, even in low-light conditions.

## Soft, Stretchy, and Breathable

The New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband is made with a soft and stretchy material that contours to fit well around your ears and forehead. The fabric is not only soft to the touch but also breathable, keeping you comfortable during even the most intense workouts. Its lightweight design makes it perfect for colder weather without being bulky or uncomfortable.

## Quality and Reliability

New Balance is a trusted brand known for its quality products, and this headband is no exception. The seams are sewn tightly and neatly, ensuring durability and long-lasting use. It is washer and dryer safe, allowing for easy cleaning and maintenance.

## Specifications

- Brand: New Balance
- Material: Polyester
- Size: One Size
- Color: Black

Invest in the New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband today and experience the ultimate comfort and performance it offers. Stay comfortable, protected, and stylish during your outdoor activities. Don't let the winter weather hold you back. Order now and take your workouts to the next level!

Product ID: B08378WVBJ Title: SSEN CLIPS (Large/ 8 clips) (Rainbow) Average Rating: 4.8 Number of Ratings: 36 Features: ['Sectioning Clips for Hair Stylists', 'No Stain and Discoloration', 'Able to use with Chemicals for Perm and Dye', 'Durable and long lasting', 'No Slip'] Description: ['Hair Clips for hairdressers'] Price: 35.99 Store: SSEN CLIPS Details: {"Brand": "SSEN CLIPS", "Hair Type": "All", "Color": "Rainbow", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Unit Count": "8.00 Count", "Manufacturer": "SSEN BEAUTY"} Review Text: Great for think hair Love these clips!! Strong hold and does not snag the hair. The owner stopped by my salon in Dallas to show us her clips and a few of us decided to buy some. I can not say enough great things about them. I have two different sizes and love both. Incredible quality, no hair pulling, easy for sectioning. Absolutely get them!!! I really like this clip. Very well made. Strong grip. Easy to open. It holds heavy thick hair very well, the design is nice. The clip is strong but not bulky. I received this as a sample from the maker and can recommend it! I am excited to buy more. I’ve been doing here 15 years and my family’s been in the industry for 92. I have never seen clips this high quality and they can hold the heaviest hair! Love love love thank you so much for this great product This product is awesome!! I tried so many different kinds and I finally got the best one. It holds my hair very tight despite my hair volume. And it never broke and very strong plastic and wire. I rarely leave a product review but this made me amazed and satisfied!! BEST clips I have ever used. The designer came by my salon and gave me one as a sample, I immediately ordered some! They hold so much hair and don’t slide!! I will never use another brand. Do not hesitate to order these! I have been styling hair since 1982. (That is a long time ago!) I have seen many new clips come and go but I have always had my clear and few favorite clips I would have success with.

I have always weaved hair color for many services. A sturdy clip that is secure when it is holding the hair, but inserts and retracts easily is a must. Especially clips need to NOT disturb the foil or pull the hair.

I have loved these SSEN clips since the first time I used them. They are truly the perfection of all hair clips. My search for the exact right clip is complete. All of the eight exciting colors of SSEN clips are welcome in my business anytime.

They sanitize easily and really are made well so they last and last.
I have never written a review for hair clips; however, I truly could not have a higher recommendation and opinion of these SSEN clips.

❤️☮️❤️
Kathleen

# Extra Long Silky Satin Bonnet Sleep Cap

Keep your braids and hair protected and stylish with the Extra Long Silky Satin Bonnet Sleep Cap. This cap is designed to provide comfort, security, and longevity for your braids and locs. Here's why you'll love it:

## Perfect Fit and Extended Length

No more worries about caps sliding off during the night or struggling to find a cap that fits your long braids or locs. The Extra Long Silky Satin Bonnet Sleep Cap is long enough to accommodate lower back-length braids and 24-inch locs. It fits securely without causing any discomfort, thanks to the perfect fit and the non-stretch band around the head.

## High-Quality Material and Craftsmanship

While many bonnets on the market are made with thin and easily degradable material, this bonnet is different. Crafted from 100% polyester satin, it boasts excellent quality, ensuring durability and performance. The stitching is strong, preventing rips and holes often caused by hair ornaments.

## Style and Comfort Combined

Not only does this cap provide practicality, but it also adds a touch of style to your bedtime routine. The silky satin material feels luxurious against your skin, and the black color exudes elegance.

## Convenient and Washable

The Extra Long Silky Satin Bonnet Sleep Cap is lightweight and travel-friendly. It easily fits in your bag, making it the perfect companion for vacations or sleepovers. And when it's time for a refresh, simply toss it in the washing machine and let it air dry.

Upgrade your haircare routine with the Extra Long Silky Satin Bonnet Sleep Cap and enjoy comfortable nights and well-protected braids and locs. Don't settle for less—choose quality and style. Order yours today and experience the difference!

# ORGUJA Doll Head for Hair Styling Mannequin Head with Hair

The ORGUJA Doll Head is a professional hairdressing training tool designed for braiding, cutting, styling, washing, and straightening. This 30-inch doll head is made of 100% synthetic fiber hair that has been chemically washed and disinfected, ensuring its cleanliness and durability. With its sleek, knot-free hair, it is easy to hold and work with.

## Key Features

- **Material**: Made of high-quality 100% synthetic fiber hair
- **Function**: Suitable for braiding, cutting, styling, washing, and straightening
- **Professional Set**: Includes styling head, DIY hair braid set, and a free clamp made of high-strength ABS material
- **Suitable for All Ages**: Perfect for hairdressers, hair stylists, barber shops, hair salons, and cosmetology school students
- **Giftable**: Ideal for anyone who enjoys trying new hairstyles

## Versatile and Convenient

Whether you are a professional hairdresser or a beginner learning the art of hair styling, this ORGUJA Doll Head is perfect for honing your skills. The long and sleek hair provides ample opportunities to experiment with various styles. The included clamp guarantees stability, ensuring a hassle-free experience.

## Exceptional Quality and Service

We take pride in the quality of our products, and we are committed to providing exceptional customer service. If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to us, and we will promptly assist you.

Unlock your creativity and improve your hairdressing skills with the ORGUJA Doll Head. Order now and start creating stunning hairstyles!

# 140 Pieces Dental Temporary Crown Front Teeth

![Dental Temporary Crown Front Teeth](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/61NgywUu2JL._AC_SL1500_.jpg)

Revamp your smile with confidence for Halloween makeup and any DIY project with the 140 Pieces Dental Temporary Crown Front Teeth. This comprehensive kit includes 140 crown material front teeth and 10g of tooth solid gel for all your needs. Receive a natural-looking finish with the teeth solid glue, which effectively covers irregularities, stains, missing teeth, and chipped teeth. Don't let dental imperfections hold you back from flashing your best smile!

## Easy Application and Portability

Applying the teeth solid glue is a breeze! Simply put 15 pieces of glue in boiling water, stir until transparent, let it cool for 5 seconds, and use it with the crown teeth. Adjust it to a suitable position, and you're good to go! The process is simple, quick, and portable, allowing you to carry it wherever you need it. 

## Be Confident in Your Smile

The Dental Temporary Crown Front Teeth come in a natural color that matches most teeth, ensuring a seamless fit. Say goodbye to embarrassment as these teeth blend seamlessly with your natural ones. Enjoy all your daily activities without worrying about your temporary dental fix.

## Safety Precautions

Please note that while wearing the temporary teeth sockets, avoid drinking hot beverages. Additionally, as the crowns are made for temporary bonding, avoid eating hard or sticky foods. For the safety of children, keep this product out of their reach to prevent accidental ingestion.

## Customer Reviews

- "This is a complete waste of money. Don't bother buying. Read the reviews first."
- "Saved me from total embarrassment while I waited for dental treatment."
- "Revamp your smile with confidence for Halloween makeup and any DIY project."

Don't miss out on this affordable temporary dental solution. Order your 140 Pieces Dental Temporary Crown Front Teeth today and experience a confident, picture-perfect smile!

**Price: $8.99**  
**Store: Nuanchu**

# Manicure Kit By Aoyuele Nail Clippers Set 13 in 1 Grooming Kit

The Manicure Kit By Aoyuele offers a comprehensive nail care solution, perfect for all your manicuring, pedicuring, and eyebrow shaping needs. With 13 high-quality stainless steel tools, this professional grooming kit is designed to enhance your overall grooming experience.

## Features

- **Versatile:** This 13-piece nail clipper set is ideal for manicuring, pedicuring, eyebrow shaping, anti-acne treatments, and exfoliating, making it a perfect all-in-one kit. Whether you're a man, woman, girl, boy, or senior, this kit will meet all your face, head, and foot care needs.

- **Durable and Rust-resistant:** Made with stainless steel, these nail clipping tools are not only durable but also rust-resistant. The edges of each tool have been polished repeatedly to offer a comfortable grip, while the blade maintains sharpness even after repetitive use.

- **Convenient Storage:** The kit comes with a PU-leather suitcase that is not only stylish but also portable. With just one press of a button, the case easily opens to reveal all your tools, ensuring their safety and preventing loss. Now you can be an elegant man or woman anywhere, anytime.

- **Hygienic and Easy to Clean:** The high-grade leather case is not only easy to clean but also helps maintain hygiene. For your health and well-being, it is recommended to use your own nail care kit as a separate tool for your fingers and toes.

- **Customer Satisfaction:** We are fully committed to providing you with the best product and experience possible. If you have any problems or questions, our dedicated support team is available to assist you promptly.

## Specifications

- **Material:** Stainless steel
- **Color:** Silver nail clippers, brown case
- **Case Size:** 6.1 L X 3.3 W X 0.8 H inches
- **Weight:** 8.5 oz
- **Package Included:** Nail Cleaner, Nail File, V-shaped Cuticle Trimmer, Cuticle Nipper, Pedicure Knife, Larger Nail Clipper, Medium Nail Clippers, Slanted Edge Nail Clippers, Eyebrow Tweezers, Eyebrow Scissors, Blackhead Acne Remover, Earwax Spoon, Extrusion Ring.

*Please note:*

1. To maintain the longevity of the tools, store the grooming kit in a dry environment when not in use.
2. Keep the kit away from children and use it under the guidance of adults, as the tools contain sharp, pointed edges.
3. Avoid using any tool on damaged skin areas.

Invest in the Manicure Kit By Aoyuele Nail Clippers Set 13 in 1 Grooming Kit, and enjoy a hassle-free and complete nail care experience. Order now and step up your grooming game today!

response:
# Crewmate Temporary Tattoos - Party-ready and Long-lasting

Add a touch of mystery and excitement to your next party or gathering with the Crewmate Temporary Tattoos. Perfect for fans of the popular spaceship sleuth video game, these skin-safe tattoos will make you feel like you're part of the action. 

## Party Ready and Convenient

With 28 unique designs including Imposter, Red is Sus, Crewmate, Trust No One, Sabotage, and more, this pack of temporary tattoos is perfect for any occasion. Each tattoo is individually printed, so there's no need for cutting. They are conveniently sized at 2" x 2", making them easy to share, drop in goodie bags, or use as prizes.

## Long-lasting and Waterproof

These premium quality tattoos are long-lasting and waterproof, ensuring they won't smear or fade, even during pool and beach parties. The fun doesn't stop there – these tattoos can also be used to decorate cups, balloons, and beach balls, adding an extra level of excitement to your event.

## Skin-safe and Made in the USA

Made with skin-safe ingredients right here in the USA, these temporary tattoos are easy to apply and remove. Simply follow the instructions provided – clean and dry your skin, remove the protective sheet, place the tattoo face down, hold a wet paper towel on top for 30 seconds, and then carefully peel off the paper. Your new artwork will last 5-7 days and can be effortlessly removed with baby oil or makeup remover.

## Satisfaction Guaranteed

With over 20 years of experience and more than 50 million tattoos sold, Fashiontats is a leading supplier of premium temporary tattoos in the USA. We take pride in providing high-quality products that bring joy to our customers. Buy American and support US jobs – your satisfaction is guaranteed.

Make your party unforgettable with the Crewmate Temporary Tattoos. Order now and become part of the crew!

Product ID: B08SSXQSVX Title: Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream - Peppermint scent - 2oz Average Rating: 4.3 Number of Ratings: 46 Features: ['Made with 99.999% pure silver and infused with peppermint, helps to soothe and hydrate dry, tired, and overworked feet', 'Infused with essential oils like peppermint, sweet almond, and cocoa butter for an invigorating and nourishing experience, cocoa and shea butters help to deeply moisturize and protect the skin', 'Peppermint oil provides a cool and soothing sensation, while sweet almond oil is rich in antioxidants and vitamins', 'Absorbs quickly, leaving feet feeling refreshed and revitalized, non-greasy formula that is suitable for daily use', 'Free from harsh chemicals and artificial fragrances, made in the USA with high-quality ingredients.'] Description: ['Colloidal Silver Foot Cream with Peppermint is a luxurious and moisturizing cream designed to hydrate and soothe the feet. Infused with colloidal silver and the refreshing scent of peppermint oil, this non-greasy formula quickly absorbs into the skin, leaving feet feeling soft and refreshed. The nourishing ingredients help to moisturize and protect the skin, while the peppermint aroma invigorates and soothes the senses. This foot cream is suitable for daily use and free of harsh chemicals or additives, making it a gentle and effective way to pamper your feet.'] Price: 14.99 Store: Silver Miracles Details: {"Brand": "Silver Miracles", "Scent": "Peppermint", "Item Form": "Cream", "Active Ingredients": "Argentum Metallicum", "Unit Count": "2.0 Ounce", "Package Dimensions": "2.3 x 2.3 x 2.2 inches; 3.21 Ounces", "UPC": "725022933210", "Manufacturer": "L&N Enterprises, LLC"} Review Text: According to the product label, the purpose of the Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream is to hydrate, lubricate, moisturize, and soothe dry skin, AND kill odor-causing bacteria. From what I can tell, it seems to do this, but not in a dramatic fashion. The ingredients include Almond Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Urea, Peppermint Oil, Menthol, and Colloidal Silver. As others have pointed out, the cream spreads easy enough but doesn't seem to absorb that well into the skin. Also, the dinky-sized jar only contains 2-ounces. So, you'll probably go through the bottle fairly quickly if you follow the instructions and apply liberally. It's a decent foot cream overall but seems a little pricey for the small amount you get. I use anti-fungal cream on my feet to keep the skin moist and lubricated, and cure or prevent fungal infections including athlete foot. Silver is naturally anti-bacterial and anti-fungal, so I got this small jar (2 oz). It has a faint minty fragrance.

You could use something like this anywhere on the body, of course, but it is quite greasy. A little goes a long way. After a shower, I apply it to my entire foot and ankle, paying attention to get it between the toes and around the nails, and then I put on clean socks.

It’s working for me. This is great on the winter heels, I apply it at night and use my moisturizing sock and over the course of a week have found my feet become softer with less flaky dead skin, it's very moisturizing and hydrating applying after a foot bath or a shower. My heels are really dry - what I could describe as 'hoof-y' - so I use creams/treatments to keep the skin from feeling uncomfortably tight and super rough. This foot cream is effective on making my heels feel more comfortable plus I'm using this cream on my entire feet. This cream has a peppermint scent which I find invigorating so it's good I use this in the morning before putting on my socks. I don't have any problem with foot odor so I cannot evaluate that. This is a thick cream that absorbs quite quickly on my poor dry feet. I apply, wait a minute or so, and then pull on my socks as I want the cream to soak into my feet and not my socks. My rating is 5 stars for I'm entirely happy with this foot cream, how it absorbs, and its effectiveness. [[VIDEOID:29f672525b29e6a29c81244cde21aa93]] Well packed Greasy stuff, not my cup of tea, but my wife she is OK with, so no waste here for this free for a review cream. Otherwise my wife says : IT WORKS! Returned item unopened . Ounces were small fir price . The Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream isn’t just for feet. The antibacterial priorities make it excellent for killing foot odor which is why it’s marketed for feet. But… also here on Amazon, you can purchase silver infused socks that last much longer than a jar of ointment to cure foot issues.

The silver properties are excellent for first aid as well and in my opinion make better use of the ointment (based on cost effectiveness for purpose). It’s good for minor skin irritations, cuts, abrasions and especially burns.

It came in handy initially as I managed to burn myself promptly after receiving it. It helped the burn heal much faster, while keeping infection at bay, than if I had just let nature take its course.

I learned about the healing properties of colloidal silver about 20 years ago when my daughter burned herself as a little girl. The ER doctor sent us home with colloidal silver cream and it fixed her right up.

I like to keep it on hand now for just such emergencies. Highly recommended. I'm very happy about its moisturizing effect. It's absorbed quickly so it doesn't make sheets or socks greasy. Nice subtle scent. Is very rich but easily absorbs into the skin without feeling too greasy. I use it just before bed and my feet feel soft and smooth the next morning.

Hope you found this review helpful! This jar of Colloidal Silver Foot Cream by Silver Miracles arrived with a double safety seal. A clear plastic seal outside and internally, under the lid, another seal.

It is white and the cream is easy to use and once applied is easy to massage into the skin.

I’m not exactly sure why this is Foot Cream, as it has many uses on the body.

My first exposure to this type of product occurred when I needed a remedy for poison ivy. While it is not intended for that, it can help with reducing the spread of poison ivy and did seem to help mine heal faster. I did rely mostly on drying lotions like Calamine, to stop the oozing.

You are instructed to first wash the affected area, then dry it, before applying this cream. So, it’s not really like a lot of other creams which you simply apply. I suppose you will still benefit from it if it is not washed, but the label was referencing feet, which can get really dirty. Wash hands after use.

This is a great cream for small cuts, rashes, insect bites and burns.

Recommended The foot cream is very moisturizing, rich and creamy.

I read the ingredients before I ordered and was maybe expecting a nice almond scent, since almond oil was one of the first ingredients but no it smells a bit more like minty something.

I do think the cream works very nice but the container is small and won’t last a real long time.

I ordered to use especially in the summer time when I am wearing sandals all the time and my feet get so dry .

response:
# Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream - Peppermint scent - 2oz

Revitalize and Soothe Your Feet with Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream. 

## Features

- Made with 99.999% pure silver and infused with peppermint, our foot cream is designed to soothe and hydrate dry, tired, and overworked feet.
- Infused with essential oils like peppermint, sweet almond, and cocoa butter, our foot cream offers an invigorating and nourishing experience.
- Peppermint oil provides a cool and soothing sensation, while sweet almond oil is rich in antioxidants and vitamins.
- The non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, leaving your feet feeling refreshed and revitalized.
- Our foot cream is free from harsh chemicals, artificial fragrances, and is made in the USA with high-quality ingredients.

## Benefits

Revive your feet with this luxurious and moisturizing foot cream. The colloidal silver-infused formula helps to hydrate and soothe dry skin, while the refreshing peppermint scent invigorates your senses. The nourishing ingredients, including sweet almond oil and cocoa butter, moisturize and protect your skin, leaving it feeling soft and refreshed. 

## Experience the Silver Miracles Difference

Our Colloidal Silver Foot Cream is suitable for daily use, and its non-greasy formula makes it convenient to apply at any time. Infused with natural essential oils, this foot cream provides a pampering experience that will leave you feeling refreshed and revitalized. 

## Try Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream today and treat your feet to the care they deserve!

Price: $14.99  
Store: Silver Miracles  
Average Rating: 4.3  
Number of Ratings: 46  

To make a purchase, visit [Silver Miracles](https://example.com)

# boqq Organic Gray Reverse Shampoo Bar: Reverse Gray Hair Naturally

Introducing the boqq 2 PCS Organic Gray Reverse Shampoo Bar, the ultimate solution for youthful and vivid hair. With its unique formulation and organic ingredients, this shampoo bar offers you a natural and safe way to reverse white and gray hair. 

## Features

- **100% organic and natural**: Crafted with pure plant ingredients, this shampoo bar is free from harsh chemical detergents and is safe for treated hair.

- **Promote hair growth**: By stimulating blood circulation in the scalp and nourishing hair follicles, this shampoo bar helps promote hair growth and improves gray hair, giving you beautiful and healthy-looking hair.
- **Washing and Conditioning**: This shampoo bar deeply nourishes and repairs damaged hair, while controlling oil production. It keeps your hair hydrated, firm, and soft, making it the perfect choice for both men and women.

## Benefits

Switching to the boqq Organic Gray Reverse Shampoo Bar offers numerous benefits:
- Naturally reverse white and gray hair without the use of harsh chemicals.
- Promote hair growth and improve the appearance of gray hair.
- Nourish and repair damaged hair, leaving it soft and light.
- Suitable for all hair types, including dry and chemically treated hair.
- Gentle formula makes it safe for men, women, teenagers, children, babies, pregnant women, and breastfeeding women.

## Customer Reviews

Customers have raved about the effectiveness and convenience of the boqq Organic Gray Reverse Shampoo Bar:
- "Easy to use and cleans your hair. It helps with hair growth and maintaining dark hair color."
- "Noticed new growth and increased thickness. My hairdresser also noticed how healthy my hair looked."
- "Great for traveling. It lasts a long time and suds up nicely."

Don't miss out on this incredible haircare solution. Get your boqq Organic Gray Reverse Shampoo Bar now and experience the transformation for yourself!

### Features:
- **Gentle on the Skin** - This bubble face mask contains soothing, nourishing ingredients, like Green Tea and Apple, to gently cleanse and clarify even the most sensitive skin.
- **Improves Skin Texture** - This clarifying foaming mask delivers a deep cleanse, minimizing fine lines and wrinkles for a glowing, even complexion.
- **Moisturizing** - BioMiracle's innovative Cupro sheet masks deliver and lock-in long-lasting hydration to tired, thirsty pores.
- **Reduce Dark Spots** - A carbonated bubble mask that helps to improve the skin's appearance, reducing the appearance of dark spots and gently cleansing away impurities.
- **Safe for All Skin Types** - With NO parabens and NO animal testing, you can feel good about putting BioMiracle bubble face masks on your skin.

### Description:
This foaming pixie sheet mask is infused with nourishing ingredients that help to reduce dark spots and clarify your complexion. BioMiracle's innovative Cupro sheet mask helps to increase the skin's absorption, locking in hydration and letting your skin reap the full benefits of this clarifying mask. The gentle carbonated bubble mask foams when applied to the face, deeply penetrating the skin with Green Tea and Apple for a facial sheet mask that clears away impurities as it delivers a more youthful complexion. Treat yourself to a gentle, hydrating green tea face mask designed to fix uneven skin tone as it relaxes and soothes, clearing away dirt and grime from your pores for brighter, glowing skin.

### Price: $5.99
### Store: BioMiracle

*Order your BioMiracle StarDust Pixie Bubble Mask today and experience the power of natural nourishing ingredients for a clear, even complexion.*

# DUDUWIG 20inch Long Half Black Half Pink Curly Fashion Wigs for Kid Girls

**Price: $19.99**

## Product Overview

Add a touch of vibrant style to your little girl's look with the DUDUWIG 20inch Long Half Black Half Pink Curly Fashion Wig. Specially designed for kids, this high-quality synthetic wig is perfect for cosplay, costume parties, Halloween, concerts, and birthdays. With its unique black and pink color combination, this wig will make your little one stand out from the crowd.

## Features and Benefits

- **Specially designed for kids:** This wig is fit for a head circumference of less than 21 inches. Please measure your child's head circumference before making a purchase to ensure the perfect fit.

- **High-quality material:** Made from heat-resistant synthetic fiber, this stylish wig looks natural, real, and is very pretty and fun. It's suitable for daily wear and various occasions, allowing your child to express their creativity.

- **Easy to use:** The wig is lightweight and easy to wear, making it comfortable for long hours of use. The package includes a wig cap for added convenience.

- **Vibrant black and pink color:** The black and pink color combination adds a playful and trendy touch to any outfit. Your child will love the cute and fun look this wig provides.

- **Expertly designed:** DUDUWIG is a new brand that focuses on kids' wigs. With a professional design team, we ensure that our wigs are of the highest quality and provide the best experience for your child.

## Care and Maintenance

To keep your DUDUWIG in optimal condition, follow these care instructions:

1. The wig doesn't need frequent washing, but regular care is recommended.
2. Before washing, smooth the wig and then wash it gently using mild shampoo.
3. Rinse thoroughly and towel blot to remove excess water.
4. Use a metal comb or oxhorn comb to style the wig and let it dry naturally.
5. Avoid using a plastic comb to prevent static electricity.
6. Minimal shedding and tangling are normal for synthetic hair wigs. Brush the wig into your desired style after it is dry.

To store the wig, place it on a wig stand or mannequin. You can also store it in a hair net and then place it in a plastic bag or a paper box. Keep the wig in a cool, dry space.

## Experience the Magic of DUDUWIG

Enhance your child's style with the DUDUWIG 20inch Long Half Black Half Pink Curly Fashion Wig. Our wigs are made with care, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable experience. Choose DUDUWIG and let your child express their unique personality with confidence.

**Add the DUDUWIG 20inch Long Half Black Half Pink Curly Fashion Wig to your cart now and let your child embrace their new style!**

Title: CHROM tooth polish uptight white, instant whitening paint for teeth (LAVISH LAVANDER)
Average Rating: 2.4
Number of Ratings: 13
Features: ['CHROM IS A TOOTH POLISH, JUST LIKE NAIL POLISH, THAT CAN BE APPLIED TO TEETH AND REMOVED IN A MATTER OF SECONDS, AND LASTS FOR UP TO 24 HOURS AT A TIME.', 'TO APPLY Mix pigment. Dry teeth. Paint Toothpolish.', 'THIS IS the more easy way to get a perfect white smile in seconds (You really gonna get a CELEBRITY PHOTO SMILE).', 'FD&C approved ingredients. Vegan and cruelty-free. 100% American made. Safe for most teeth.', 'Developed by dentists.']
Description: ['CHROM is a tooth polish, just like nail polish, that can be applied to teeth and removed in a matter of seconds, and lasts for up to 24 hours at a time. It has no taste', 'TO APPLY', '1. Mix it up. Shake the bottle hard to mix the settled pigments. If pigments are still settled after shaking, stir with a toothpick. Using the integrated brush to mix or agitate will cause unwanted fraying of the bristles.', '2. Dry teeth. Tuck cotton rolls between gums to keep mouth open. Wipe saliva off with cloth, tissue, or gauze. Teeth must be completely dry for Toothpolish to stick.', '3. Paint Toothpolish. Apply in thin layers. To avoid streaking, paint 1-3 strokes per tooth. It is important to allow at least 10 seconds dry time between layers. Polish is dry when hardened. Not dry = soft/jelly. Keep product clean. After polishing each tooth, wipe brush off on a disposable cloth or gauze before dipping it back into the bottle. Wiping brush, brush arm, and bottle edge with high-proof alcohol is also recommended. Do not leave brushes out too long since they will dry & harden.', '4. Fix it. Use a toothpick to remove excess polish from gums and gaps. Polish is easier to manipulate when wet. As with any technique, practice practice practice! Enjoy any drink while smiling wild. Toothpolish will last while eating soft foods only. Take Toothpolish with you to reapply after some meals, just like you do with lipstick.', 'TO REMOVE', 'Chip it off. Use your clean fingernail to chip off the polish. Or cover your finger with a cloth, tissue, or gauze. It is easiest to remove Toothpolish when polish is completely dry. To remove excess flakes, brush & floss teeth.', 'FAQ:', 'Toothpolish is intended for use as a cosmetic tooth coating. It is not permanent & does not alter the tooth in any way, only the color. It will not harm teeth or permanent dental work.']
Price: 27.99
Store: Genérico

# CHROM Tooth Polish Uptight White - Instant Whitening Paint for Teeth (Lavish Lavander)

Achieve a picture-perfect white smile in seconds with CHROM Tooth Polish Uptight White. This innovative tooth polish is just like nail polish for your teeth. It can be easily applied and removed in a matter of seconds, lasting up to 24 hours at a time. 

## Easy Application, Spectacular Results

Applying CHROM Tooth Polish is quick and hassle-free. Simply mix the pigment, dry your teeth, and paint on the tooth polish. The integrated brush allows for precise application, ensuring a streak-free finish. With just 1-3 strokes per tooth, you'll have a flawless smile. Plus, the polish dries quickly, leaving a hardened finish that won't smudge or transfer. 

## Safe and Convenient

CHROM Tooth Polish is developed by dentists and made with FD&C approved ingredients. It is vegan and cruelty-free, making it a guilt-free choice. The 100% American-made formula is safe for most teeth and will not harm dental work. 

## Stand Out with Confidence

The CHROM Tooth Polish in Lavish Lavander offers a unique shade that will make your smile stand out from the crowd. Its instant whitening effect will give you the confidence of a celebrity photo smile. 

## A Perfect Smile On-The-Go

Thanks to its lightweight and compact design, you can easily take CHROM Tooth Polish with you wherever you go. Enjoy any drink while smiling wide, as this tooth polish will last while eating soft foods. To maintain your dazzling smile, simply reapply after meals, just like you do with lipstick. 

Don't wait any longer to achieve the bright white smile you deserve. Order your CHROM Tooth Polish Uptight White in Lavish Lavander today and experience its transformative power firsthand!

Price: $27.99
Store: Genérico

*Note: Some users have reported issues with the product and customer service.

# African Traditional Wax Print Head wrap Scarf - Elevate Your Style

Introducing our African Traditional Wax Print Head wrap Scarf, a must-have accessory for those who want to make a bold and vibrant statement. Made from 100% premium African cotton fabric, our scarves are easy to tie and large enough for any style. The average size of 43*35 inches ensures versatility and allows for various custom packaging designs.

## Playful Colors and Patterns

Our headscarf features playful and delicate color patterns, making it the perfect addition to any outfit. Whether you choose to wear it on your neck as a scarf or as a package for the entire head, you'll surely find a style that suits your taste. From casual jeans and a T-shirt to a fancy cocktail dress, this head wrap pairs well with any outfit, adding a touch of elegance and sophistication.

## Superior Quality and Craftsmanship

Handmade with great attention to detail, our packaging is a work of art in itself. The fabric is dyed uniformly on both surfaces using African wax printing, ensuring that the colors won't fade over time. Despite being lightweight, the fabric is firm to hold any style you choose to wear, offering lasting comfort and ease of use.

## Versatile and Convenient

The African Traditional Wax Print Head wrap Scarf is not limited to traditional clothing; it can be effortlessly paired with Western outfits as well. Its extra length and width provide endless possibilities, allowing you to explore various ways to wear it. Our scarves are not only fashionable but also practical, allowing you to make a fashion statement while keeping your hair in place.

## Care Instructions and Satisfaction Guarantee

To ensure the longevity of your scarf, we recommend hand washing it in cold water with mild detergent or using a professional dry cleaning service. For drying, simply shake off excess water and hang it up to air dry. Our products come with a zero-risk 100% satisfaction guarantee. If any of our products don't meet your expectations, we offer a hassle-free refund within 30 days of purchase.

Elevate your style and embrace the rich heritage of African wax prints with our African Traditional Wax Print Head wrap Scarf. Add this versatile accessory to your cart now and experience the convenience and elegance it brings to your wardrobe!

# TIERRYMOON Gua Sha - Sculpting - Lymphatic Drainage

The TIERRYMOON Gua Sha is a must-have beauty tool for boosting radiance, enhancing complexion, and contouring your face. Loved by the VS ANGELS, this authentic Rose Quartz Gua Sha has been a well-kept Asian beauty secret for centuries.

## The Power of Rose Quartz

Made from 100% authentic and genuine Rose Quartz, this Gua Sha not only provides amazing beauty benefits but also emits vibrations of love, soothing energy, and happiness. Experience the centuries-old wisdom of Cleopatra and Egyptians, who used Rose Quartz for clearing the complexion and preventing wrinkles.

## Easy to Use and Visible Results

With a simple morning and night skincare routine, this Gua Sha is super easy to incorporate into your skincare regimen. Gently massage your face and neck in upward and outward motions. The deep massage not only helps with tone, firmness, and lifting but also prevents wrinkles and depuffs your skin. Feel the difference as the cooling and calming sensation leaves your skin revitalized and radiant.

## More Than Just a Beauty Tool

This Gua Sha is not limited to facial use; it also works wonders for your body. Move lymphatic fluids, radiate good energy, and promote a healthy flow. Its compact and lightweight design makes it perfect for travel, so you can enjoy its benefits wherever you go.

## Quality and Assurance

With Tierry Moon, you can trust that you're getting a top-quality product. Each Gua Sha is different and unique in shape, size, and color, ensuring that you receive one-of-a-kind beauty. Tierry Moon stands behind their product with a replacement warranty and a 100% money-back guarantee.

Don't miss out on the amazing benefits of the TIERRYMOON Gua Sha! Try it risk-free and experience the difference yourself. Order now and discover the secret to a radiant and sculpted complexion.

Price: $5.99
Store: Tierry Moon

*Note: Product color may vary as each Gua Sha is unique.*

# Funlovin Silk Hair Scarf Scrunchie Hair Ties

Make a stylish statement with our elegant Silk Hair Scarf Scrunchie Hair Ties. This set includes three premium quality scrunchies in a solid color satin ribbon design. 

## Upgrade Your Hair Game

1. **Good for Your Hair**: The scarf scrunchie's fabric and versatile design make it less likely to get caught in your hair and cause breakage. Say goodbye to hair damage and hello to healthy, beautiful hair.

2. **Versatility**: Our scrunchies can turn a bad hair day into a great hair day. Whether you want a playful high ponytail, a sophisticated low ponytail, or a boho-inspired messy bun, these scrunchies have got you covered.

3. **Pop of Color**: Add an extra stylish touch to any outfit. When wearing a multicolored ensemble, our beautiful scrunchies can create a standout look by making a color pop.

4. **Fashionable Accessories**: Scrunchies are not just hair ties, they are fashion accessories. You can wear them on your wrist as a colorful and trendy addition to your outfit.

5. **Never Lose Them**: Unlike elastic hair holders, our scrunchies are harder to lose thanks to their bright colors and larger size. Keep them all organized on a cheap binder ring for easy access.

## Adorable and Practical

Our cute floral scarf scrunchies are not only fashionable but also easy to match with any outfit. They effortlessly add flair to your hair without much effort. Plus, they make perfect gifts for friends!

### Product Details:
- Color: Silky Scarf Scrunchies
- Material: Satin, Ribbon
- Brand: Funlovin
- Hair Type: Curly
- Package Dimensions: 6.73 x 6.18 x 1.14 inches; 1.45 Ounces
- UPC: 770456871287

**Price: $5.99**

## Customer Reviews:

- *"All of them are so pretty. The material came out from the stitches after only one-time use."* - While some customers experienced issues with the material, many found the prints lovely and the price great.
- *"[The scrunchies] are stiff and kinda hard. Although the looks are good, these are not very flexible."* - Some buyers found the scrunchies to lack flexibility but loved the overall appearance.
- *"Cute hair accessories, next-day delivery was great. Beautiful and good quality. Even came with an extra scrunchie!"* - Many customers were delighted with the cute and high-quality scrunchies, as well as the bonus scrunchie and thoughtful thank-you note.
- *"These scrunchies are so cute. I was surprised to get a free scrunchie and the thank you note was a nice touch. I would buy from them again."* - Happy customers appreciated the cute design, the free gift, and expressed their intention to purchase more in different colors and styles.
- *"Good quality fabric. My granddaughter loves them. Very easy to use and they look amazing in my daughter’s hair! I will definitely be ordering more of these later on."* - Satisfied customers praised the scrunchies' fabric quality, ease of use, and how amazing they looked in their daughters' hair.

Improve your hairstyle with our stunning Silk Hair Scarf Scrunchie Hair Ties. Buy now and experience the difference they make in your hair routine!

# Belize Tropical Cabana Fragrance Set: Bring Paradise Home

Transform your daily self-care routine into a tropical escape with the Belize Tropical Cabana Fragrance Set. This exclusive Bath & Body Works collection combines a refreshing 8 fl oz. Fragrance Mist, a luxurious 10 fl oz. Shower Gel, and a nourishing 8 fl oz. Body Lotion. Indulge your senses and immerse yourself in the blissful aromas of a tropical paradise.

## Features
- Brand: Bath & Body Works
- Item Form: Gel
- Unit Count: 3.00 Count
- Number of Items: 1
- Item Volume: 8 Fluid Ounces
- UPC: 667554129719

## Escape to Paradise
Unleash the captivating scents of Belize Tropical Cabana that will transport you to a serene and exotic getaway. The fragrance mist, shower gel, and body lotion are carefully crafted to envelop your skin with a delightful blend of tropical fruits, luscious coconut, and sun-kissed vanilla. 

## Luxurious Self-Care

# 100% PURE Coconut Body Scrub - Exfoliating Deep Cleanse for Vibrant Radiant Skin

Achieve vibrant, radiant skin with the 100% PURE Coconut Body Scrub. This exceptional exfoliating scrub is designed to buff away flakes, bumps, and dry patches, revealing a deeply nourished body. With its unique blend of sea salts and nourishing oils, this scrub provides a deep cleanse that restores your skin's youthful glow.

## Key Features

- **Buff out the rough spots**: This bath and shower scrub is perfect for addressing flakes, bumps, and dry patches all over your body. Experience the magic of revealing a radiant, deeply nourished bod.

- **Restore that youthful glow**: The detoxifying crystals in this scrub gently exfoliate your skin, while fatty acids and vitamin E protect it from free radical damage. The addition of jojoba soothes dryness and chafing, leaving your skin smooth, comfortable, and super soft.

- **Mind-bending detoxification**: Treat your skin to a full-body rejuvenation with the help of sea salt and coconut. Let the tropical island-inspired scent transport your senses while effectively cleansing and nourishing your skin.

- **Give your skin some love**: Stimulate and remove the buildup of dead skin cells, and prep your skin to better absorb moisture from creams and lotions. This scrub has a non-greasy, plant-based antioxidant blend that provides optimal hydration.

- **Beauty doesn't get any cleaner**: Rest assured that our products prioritize both health and beauty. We use well-researched, natural, and organic ingredients that adhere to strict purity standards. Our cruelty-free products are made from ethically sourced ingredients without harsh toxins, heavy metals, or dyes. They are also gluten-free and vegan, proudly made in the USA.

## Customer Reviews

- "I love how this product smells and the exfoliating was great. Highly recommended!" - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

- "I love body scrubs, especially when they have an oil base that helps to fight winter dryness. This one has a wonderful oil base that coats and hydrates the skin. It also smells fantastic!" - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

- "This scrub works great and it's very moisturizing. The hydrating effect lasts long." - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Achieve beautifully vibrant, radiant skin with the 100% PURE Coconut Body Scrub. Order now and indulge in the ultimate deep cleanse and nourishment for your skin. Don't miss out on this opportunity to transform your skincare routine today!

# Women's Paddle Hair Brush Comb Set: Your Ultimate Hair Care Partner

## Experience Painless Detangling with our Women's Paddle Hair Brush Comb Set

Are you tired of painful hair combing and detangling? Say goodbye to that inconvenience and embrace our Women's Paddle Hair Brush Comb Set. With its painless soft plastic bristles, this brush not only helps remove knots and tangles but also massages the scalp and increases circulation, promoting hair growth. The brush's smooth cuticle layer effect will leave your hair shining! 

## Protect Your Hair while Enjoying Effortless Detangling

Our brush is designed with your hair's protection in mind. The ultra-soft bristles gently glide through tangles, knots, minimizing pain and reducing breakage by up to 45%. You'll definitely feel the difference, with 56% less effort required for detangling and 100% happier hair.

## Gentle on Wet and Dry Hair: Saves Time and Morning Struggles

No more tears or screaming during hair brushing! Our Women's Paddle Hair Brush Comb Set detangles hair in a quarter of the time compared to a regular hairbrush. Whether you're combing wet hair or dry hair, you'll experience the ultimate convenience of hassle-free mornings and bath times.

## Works on Various Hair Types: A Versatile Solution for Everyone

This brush is specially designed for all hair types. No matter if you have straight, curly, natural, thin, thick, kinky, frizzy hair, extensions, or even wigs, our Women's Paddle Hair Brush Comb Set is here to take care of all your detangling needs.

## The Perfect Gift Set: Share the Joy of Easy Haircare

Looking for the perfect gift for yourself or someone special? Our Women's Paddle Hair Brush Comb Set is a fantastic choice! No matter what hair style you have, this brush set is the ideal gift for yourself, your girlfriends, wife, roommate, mother, sisters, and more.

Ready to experience painless detangling and enjoy smoother, more manageable hair? Choose our Women's Paddle Hair Brush Comb Set and revolutionize your haircare routine. Click "Add to Cart" now and give your hair the care it deserves!

Price: $12.99
Store: Cilusar

response:
# Cobee Cat Dog Bath Brush

Give your furry friends a comfortable and enjoyable bath with the Cobee Cat Dog Bath Brush. This silicone grooming brush comb is designed to make bath time easier and more enjoyable for both you and your pets. With its innovative design and high-quality materials, this brush is a must-have for pet owners. 

## Soft Pet Massage & Bath Brush

The Cobee Cat Dog Bath Brush features a one-piece foam reservoir design that allows you to save time and shower gel. Simply dilute the pet shampoo beforehand, then press the top to dispense the perfect amount of foam to your pet's fur coat while showering. This not only saves shower gel but also makes it easier to create a rich lather and thoroughly clean your pet's fur.

## Quality Silicone Material

Made of food-grade silicone, this pet brush is safe, durable, and easy to clean. The high-temperature proof material ensures that the brush will withstand regular use without losing its shape or functionality. The silicone bristles provide a gentle and soothing massage for your pet's skin, removing dust, loosening hair, and leaving them feeling refreshed.

## Comfortable Massage Feelings

The Cobee Cat Dog Bath Brush is designed to provide your pet with a comfortable and relaxing bath experience. The shampoo dispensing design allows for quick and thorough washing, while the massage function improves blood circulation and stimulates your pet's senses. Your pet will love the soothing massages they receive during bath time.

## Portable Puppy Brush

This lightweight brush weighs only 80g and fits comfortably in your hand, making it easy to use and maneuver. Even when filled with shampoo, you will not feel any pressure, allowing you to better help your dog. Its compact size also makes it ideal for traveling and grooming on the go.

## Better Compatibility

Suitable for pets with various fur types, including short-haired, medium-haired, and long-haired pets such as dogs, cats, kittens, horses, and rabbits. 

Get the Cobee Cat Dog Bath Brush today and transform bath time into a bonding experience for you and your pets!

Price: $4.99

Store: COBEE

*(Note: The product is rated 3.2/5 based on 35 customer reviews.)*

# Introducing Maybelline Snapscara Washable Mascara 320 Black Cherry (Pack of 4)

Take your lashes to new heights with Maybelline Snapscara Washable Mascara in the stunning shade of Black Cherry. Designed for lasting impact, this pack includes 4 tubes of mascara, ensuring you always have beautiful lashes on hand. With an average rating of 4.4 from 22 satisfied customers, you can trust in the quality and effectiveness of this product.

## Vibrant Color and Lasting Wear

Enhance your natural beauty with the captivating Black Cherry shade. The rich, deep color adds a touch of drama to any look, allowing your eyes to stand out from the crowd. Say goodbye to dull, lifeless lashes and hello to a whole new level of intensity.

## Washable Formula for Easy Removal

Maybelline Snapscara Washable Mascara is designed with convenience in mind. It features a washable formula, ensuring effortless removal at the end of the day. No more tugging or pulling on your lashes, as this mascara effortlessly glides off with just a few swipes.

## Get Fuller Lashes without the Clumps

Achieve a full and volumized look without worrying about clumps. This mascara's unique formula coats each lash evenly, providing you with dramatic length and volume. Say hello to fluttery, luscious lashes that will turn heads wherever you go.

## Lightweight and Comfortable to Wear

Unlike some mascaras that feel heavy and uncomfortable, Maybelline Snapscara is lightweight and comfortable to wear. You'll forget you're even wearing mascara as it stays put throughout the day, without smudging or flaking.

## Unleash Your Inner Artist

Express your creativity with Maybelline Snapscara Washable Mascara. Experiment with different looks, whether you prefer a natural daytime look or a bold and dramatic evening style. The possibilities are endless with this versatile mascara.

## Experience the Maybelline Difference

Maybelline has been a trusted brand in the beauty industry for years, known for their commitment to quality and innovation. Don't miss out on the opportunity to enhance your lashes with Maybelline Snapscara Washable Mascara.

**Order now and take your lashes to new heights with Maybelline Snapscara Washable Mascara 320 Black Cherry (Pack of 4)!**

Share these with your beautiful girls！All designs are for girls, perfect designs, make every girl's more beautiful!!", "It is suitable for many occasions, not only as a gift for bridesmaids and brides, but also as a daily gift, teachers' day, Valentine's Day, boudoir's day, mother's day, etc. It is widely used and is a gift choice that you will not regret."] Price: 39.99 Store: Loanzeg Details: {"Color": "12pcs Sage Green", "Material": "Satin", "Item Form": "Scrunchie", "Brand": "Loanzeg", "Hair Type": "Sage", "Package Dimensions": "7.64 x 5.39 x 4.17 inches; 1.01 Pounds"} Review Text: This set of scrunchies and sunglasses for a bride and her bridesmaids is silly but fun. The scrunchies are made of a nice satin type fabric. The sunglasses don't actually offer much sun protection, but they are cute. I got the satin bridesmaid scrunchies in rose gold and I love the color. I got this for myself and my two daughters to match. For $6, you get 6 pieces of satin scrunchies. That’s a steal of a deal! The scrunchies are nice and durable. I used it for high ponytails for my girls (7yrs & 9yrs old) and it looks elegant. I love it! A cute set of bridal and bridesmaids hair ties and sunglasses for a bridal party. There were 5 rose gold hair ties and sunglasses for your bridal party and one white hair tie and sunglass for the bride. The hair ties comes in a satin material, but some of the thread was coming off on one of the hair ties. The sunglasses comes in a nice beautiful heart shaped but is a little uncomfortable to wear for a long period of time. These scrunchies hold tight and do not slide off. The satin cover keep the elastic from grabbing your hair. Pretty pink color and a special white one for the bride. Cute set. These make nice bridesmaids gift. I love these, these are so cute and would be great for a photo-op. They are great items to put into gift bags for your bridesmaids.

I think that these would be so great during the summer, and amazing if someone was having a beach wedding!
(Also, if you are having a girls weekend Bachelorette party, these would also be a great gift for those girls of yours, you all can wear them and match!!!! And then you can have the scrunchies for your wedding!!!)

I can see many opportunities for you and your girls to use these.

A little touch like this, can be fun and I love the heart glasses because they are so cute, but I also love the touch of humor on the scrunchies. The bridal party would love the fact that it says, "to have and to hold your hair back". It makes me smile, every time I read that! It adds abit a humor to it.

These scrunchies are extremely comfortable, my daughter usually hates scrunchies, they usually fall out of her hair easily but she seems to love these. As for the sunglasses, my daughter didn't care to much for it, she said it doesn't sit on her nose correctly but it seemed to look good on her. I actually love the sunglasses. It adds a special touch that we needed.

I would recommend these for a wedding on the beach or in the summer, or if you expect it to be a bright sunny day!

I would also recommend these as items to put into bridesmaids gift bags.

The quality seems to be exactly what I had expected and I am quite pleased.

I would like to note: You may not want go wear the sun glasses all day, but for a few hours here and there, it is quite cute and stylish.

These sun glasses and hair bows would also help coordinate your bridal party, without braking the bank. Little touches like this, really does make a difference.

(These are to be used for wedding next summer.) [[VIDEOID:60519bea0e911630c2af5aa31ddd34a9]] I DO RECOMMEND THIS SET TO EVERYONE! YOU HAVE TO SEE IT IN PERSON TO BELIEVE IT! GREAT FOR ALL TYPES OF GET TOGETHERS NOT JUST FOR WEDDING PARTIES! THE SCRUNCHIES ARE SO SATIN AND BEUTIFUL EVERYTHING IS PACKAGED SO VERY WELL. THE VALUE IS GREAT AND FAST SHIPPING FOR THIS ITEM!

PLEAE SEE PICTURE BELOW These are super cute and perfect for bridesmaids. This came in a set of six. Definitely make a good gift for any occasion or keep them for yourself. Pretty color! Worth buying! Cute rose gold color on the scrunchies. They don’t feel like the best quality but they don’t feel like they’ll fall apart quickly. My head is small so I typically have a hard time finding sunglasses that fit me securely. I can tell these glasses are on the larger side compared to other sunglasses I have tried on in stores and these slip off my head easily. However, this is a me problem and not the product so if you have a smaller head I would say these fit larger than expected. At $20, each item is $1.67 so I think this product is fairly priced. Overall, I think this is a cute set to gift bridesmaids and good if you’re not looking to spend a lot.

The scrunchies are made of a nice satin type fabric. The sunglasses don't actually offer much sun protection, but they are cute. I got the satin bridesmaid scrunchies in rose gold and I love the color. I got this for myself and my two daughters to match. For $6, you get 6 pieces of satin scrunchies. That’s a steal of a deal! The scrunchies are nice and durable. I used it for high ponytails for my girls (7yrs & 9yrs old) and it looks elegant. I love it! A cute set of bridal and bridesmaids hair ties and sunglasses for a bridal party. There were 5 rose gold hair ties and sunglasses for your bridal party and one white hair tie and sunglass for the bride. The hair ties comes in a satin material, but some of the thread was coming off on one of the hair ties. The sunglasses comes in a nice beautiful heart shaped but is a little uncomfortable to wear for a long period of time. These scrunchies hold tight and do not slide off. The satin cover keep the elastic from grabbing your hair. Pretty pink color and a special white one for the bride. Cute set. These make nice bridesmaids gift. I love these, these are so cute and would be great for a photo-op. They are great items to put into gift bags for your bridesmaids.

I think that these would be so great during the summer, and amazing if someone was having a beach wedding!
(Also, if you are having a girls weekend Bachelorette party, these would also be a great gift for those girls of yours, you all can wear them and match!!!! And then you can have the scrunchies for your wedding!!!)

I can see many opportunities for you and your girls to use these.

A little touch like this, can be fun and I love the heart glasses because they are so cute, but I also love the touch of humor on the scrunchies. The bridal party would love the fact that it says, "to have and to hold your hair back". It makes me smile, every time I read that! It adds abit a humor to it.

These scrunchies are extremely comfortable, my daughter usually hates scrunchies, they usually fall out of her hair easily but she seems to love these. As for the sunglasses, my daughter didn't care to much for it, she said it doesn't sit on her nose correctly but it seemed to look good on her. I actually love the sunglasses. It adds a special touch that we needed.

I would recommend these for a wedding on the beach or in the summer, or if you expect it to be a bright sunny day!

I would also recommend these as items to put into bridesmaids gift bags.

The quality seems to be exactly what I had expected and I am quite pleased.

I would like to note: You may not want go wear the sun glasses all day, but for a few hours here and there, it is quite cute and stylish.

These sun glasses and hair bows would also help coordinate your bridal party, without braking the bank. Little touches like this, really does make a difference.

(These are to be used for wedding next summer.) [[VIDEOID:60519bea0e911630c2af5aa31ddd34a9]] I DO RECOMMEND THIS SET TO EVERYONE! YOU HAVE TO SEE IT IN PERSON TO BELIEVE IT! GREAT FOR ALL TYPES OF GET TOGETHERS NOT JUST FOR WEDDING PARTIES! THE SCRUNCHIES ARE SO SATIN AND BEUTIFUL EVERYTHING IS PACKAGED SO VERY WELL. THE VALUE IS GREAT AND FAST SHIPPING FOR THIS ITEM!

PLEAE SEE PICTURE BELOW These are super cute and perfect for bridesmaids. This came in a set of six. Definitely make a good gift for any occasion or keep them for yourself. Pretty color! Worth buying! Cute rose gold color on the scrunchies. They don’t feel like the best quality but they don’t feel like they’ll fall apart quickly. My head is small so I typically have a hard time finding sunglasses that fit me securely. I can tell these glasses are on the larger side compared to other sunglasses I have tried on in stores and these slip off my head easily. However, this is a me problem and not the product so if you have a smaller head I would say these fit larger than expected. At $20, each item is $1.67 so I think this product is fairly priced. Overall, I think this is a cute set to gift bridesmaids and good if you’re not looking to spend a lot. '}]

# Loanzeg Satin Bridesmaid Scrunchies and Sunglasses Set

Add a touch of elegance and fun to your bridal party with the Loanzeg Satin Bridesmaid Scrunchies and Sunglasses Set. This set includes 12 satin hair scrunchies and 12 sunglasses, perfect as bachelorette party favors and bridesmaid gifts. With 1 scrunchie and sunglasses for yourself and 11 sets for your friends, everyone will feel special and coordinated on your big day.

## High-quality and Exquisite Design

The hair scrunchies in this set are made of durable and soft matte satin fabric. They not only hold tight and do not slide off but also add a beautiful touch to any hairstyle. Each scrunchie comes with an exquisite bronzing decorative card that reads "to have and to hold Your Hair Back," adding a touch of humor and charm to the set.

## Versatile and Stylish

These scrunchies can be used not only for weddings but also for various occasions such as teachers' day, Valentine's Day, and Mother's Day. Their beautiful satin texture and stretchable design make them versatile for creating fashionable hairstyles or wearing them as cute bracelets.

## A Gift to Cherish

Share these scrunchies and sunglasses with your beautiful girls and make every girl feel more beautiful. The set includes 5 rose gold hair scrunchies and sunglasses for your bridesmaids and one special white hair scrunchie and sunglass for the bride. The scrunchies come in a pretty pink color, while the sunglasses have a unique heart-shaped design. This set is a perfect addition to your bridal party or as a gift for your bridesmaids.

## Comfortable and Fun

The scrunchies are extremely comfortable to wear, and the satin cover keeps the elastic from grabbing your hair. They are perfect for creating elegant high ponytails or any other stylish hairstyle. Although the sunglasses may not be suitable for long periods, they add a special touch of style and humor to your bridal look.

## Get Your Loanzeg Satin Bridesmaid Scrunchies and Sunglasses Set Today!

This adorable and affordable set is perfect for weddings on the beach, summer events, or as a unique addition to bridesmaids' gift bags. The scrunchies and sunglasses will coordinate your bridal party effortlessly, making every occasion memorable. Don't miss out on this stylish and charming set. Order your Loanzeg Satin Bridesmaid Scrunchies and Sunglasses Set now and make your wedding day even more special!

Price: $39.99
Store: Loanzeg
Average Rating: 4.6 (96 ratings)

Review Text: This is great for a costume. Bought it for a God costume for my husband for a silly party we went to. Hair was full and thick enough to serve its purpose. We’ve done Santa for a few years now and this was the best looking of all!!! We borrowed a Santa costume from a friend for a work event and he had warned us that the wig and beard were more than a little rough looking, and he was right. After reading the reviews, this is the set we chose. The beard and the wig is what we used though it came with eyebrows, too, and both were fantastic. Our Santa had short hair, so we did not use a wig cap. The beard fit very well. Both items were easy to use, and of GREAT quality. # ANOGOL Wig Cap+Santa Claus Wig with Mustache

Enhance your Christmas costume with the ANOGOL Wig Cap+Santa Claus Wig with Mustache. This fabulous set includes 1 wig cap, 1 merry Christmas wig with beard, 1 pair of eyebrows, 1 Christmas hat, and 1 pair of glasses. Add an extra touch to your holiday outfit with this complete package.

## Adjustable and Comfortable

The ANOGOL Santa Claus wig is designed to fit all head circumferences. With 2 adjustable straps at the back of the cap, you can easily customize the size to ensure a comfortable and secure fit. The soft and breathable material structure makes it suitable for small, medium, and large head sizes. Say goodbye to worries about finding the right size.

## Perfect for Christmas Occasions

This white Santa Claus wig with beard is specifically designed for Christmas cosplay parties and costumes. Stand out and spread holiday cheer with this high-quality synthetic hair wig. Get ready to embody the spirit of Santa Claus and make your celebration unforgettable.

## Easy to Style

The white Santa wig with beard is made of high-quality heat-resistant synthetic fiber and is pre-styled to save you time and effort. Easily achieve the desired look without any hassle. Just put it on and you're ready to go!

## Exceptional Quality

The ANOGOL Wig Cap+Santa Claus Wig with Mustache is made to last. It has minimal shedding and features a full and thick hair design. Brush it lightly with a detangling brush, and the wig will stay intact, just like expensive doll hair. Enjoy the durability and high quality of this product.

Experience the magic of Christmas with the ANOGOL Wig Cap+Santa Claus Wig with Mustache. Get yours now and complete your festive ensemble!

*Note: Colors may slightly vary on different monitors.
