Product ID: B0BNKHNWDW Title: QTHAIR 613 Bundle Body Wave Human Hair 12A Grade Light Blonde Color Bundles 613 Color Body Weave Human hair Extensions 100g/Bundle 3-4bundles can be full head 8inch Brazilian Honey Blonde Bundles Hair Weave Average Rating: 4.3 Number of Ratings: 1445 Features: ["【Advantage】Our 613 Blonde Body Wave Human Hair Bundle is from Professional Hair Factory Supplier and Trustworthy Brand.It's Silky,Soft,Tight and Neat.No Tangle,No Shedding,No Smell, No Lices, Easy to Be Bleached and Takes Color Very Well to Show Your Charming Perfectly.", '【Raw Material】613 Human Hair Bundles, 100% Unprocessed Brazilian Virgin Hair Bundles, Cut from Young Girl Donors.Can Be Dyed, Permed,Curled and Restyled,Thick and Full, No Shedding and Tangle Free.', '【Hair Quality】 12A Grade Blonde Brazilian Body Wave Human Hair Bundle is Soft and Silky, Natural and Healthy, You Can Wear the Hair For a Long Time with Gorgeous Hair Style and Beautiful Lustrous Hair Color.', '【Length & Weight】 Our 613 Body Wave Bundle is True to Length & Full to Weight, each Bundle is 95+-gram, 3 Bundles for 8-16inch, 4 bundles for 18-26inch are Enough for A Full Head.', '【Fast Delivery】 613 Honey Blonde Human Hair Bundle is with Double Machine Weft,Tight and Neat,Tangle-free ,Minimal Shedding,No Chemical Treatment for Black Women.'] Description: ['Our factory specializes in all kinds of Human Hair products. We only sell 100% Real Human Hair.No shedding & No tangle, 100% Human hair Unprocessed Human Hair, super soft and smooth.', 'Advantage', ':Factory direct, no middle charge.', 'Quality', ':Natural Root-to-Tip hair only, 100% unprocessed human hair, dyeable, bleachable, can be ironed, permed, no shedding, no tangling.'] Price: 24.86 Store: QTHAIR Details: {"Brand": "QTHAIR", "Color": "#613 Color", "Material": "Human Hair", "Extension Length": "8 Inches", "Hair Type": "Wavy", "Package Dimensions": "11.73 x 6.85 x 1.38 inches; 1.6 Ounces", "Manufacturer": "QTHAIR"} Review Text: I purchased a 24inch bundle to add to a wig I ordered from a different company. The bundle arrived and was packaged very well. I co-washed it and added it to my wig. I love this hair! It blends very well with my wig too-No difference in quality- 5 stars! I would buy it again. [[VIDEOID:1934f0f67cabc674049e4dcdfc2b6e0f]] Lace is very dark and thin hair quality is not there u get what you pay for Holds body wave very well. I do a two strand pigtail twist and out my satin bonnet on at night. DON'T PUT ANY PRODUCTS ON IT!! Has a natural sheen. I just put 3 drops of Aragon oil on my hands rubbed together and ONLY applying to my natural hair (leave out).
This hair is extremely soft. Easily manageable, low tangles, and little to no shedding. I only use my fingers or a super soft boar paddle brush as needed. Manipulating the curl by combining and brushing too much may cause frizz and dryness. This is my first time buying real human hair but I know the stats and I did my research beforehand. If you are a first time buyer like me you won’t be disappointed with this company. I got my hair and was skeptical about it so I did the pull test and burn test. They both checked out and the hair has double wefts. I forgot to take a before picture but the hair looks just like the company demonstration. I washed the hair first with a co-wash cleanser and let it dry overnight. It doesn’t tangle bad or shed much. It curls well naturally or with heat. The middle picture was natural curls using twist with curling cream and Carol’s daughter mousse. The others were with a 1” curling wand on 330 degrees and coconut oil and Tresseme heat tamer spray. Coconut oil works excellent for this hair by the way. I recently washed my hair with it still on my head with sulfate free shampoo and conditioner. It’s hard to dry my hair underneath with a blow dryer but I still protect the weave like my own hair or better because it is very delicate. This hair is so soft and manageable I wish it were my own and I feel like this is how my hair should be. The hair is darker than I thought but I got used to it. It’s like a dark dark brown. I glad I found real human hair for a low price and 16, 18 and 20” was longer than I thought. I got a closure also because I am 10 weeks into needing a relaxer. The closure is ok but I wanted a more natural look but I still got the closure to look real. I’m in absolute aw of this hair. This is a real honest review and trust me, you won’t regret this purchase.
Update: I only lasted for 2 installments and the second one was pushing it. The bundle don’t have much hair ...... but my experience whit costumer service was the best in quality well is not 100% but is not bad either. So I may buy this hair again I've had it in for 3 weeks almost now. Love the hair. It did lose a bit of luster after washing. Didn't shed till the end of 2nd week.
I'd buy again. Many many many compliments.
I've had hair extensions done for the past 10 years. Don't sleep on this Amazon gem. This is by far the best hair I have ever had! I can't believe I found it on Amazon 🥰 I had a custom color and install, and even my stylist thought the hair was AMAZING and wanted to know where I got it from!! I will definitely order again, I'm looking forward to trying the other textures and etc that they have available. The “30 is beautiful! [[VIDEOID:4d146c1b7fcc651cebd9ccabd20fa377]] Hair is great for the price, doesn’t shed I recently order and won’t be ordering agin I got a very bad batch the shedding extremely bad , hair is everywhere and now is matted within two week, hair quality not the same from when I first started order from them

The bundle don’t have much hair ...... but my experience whit costumer service was the best in quality well is not 100% but is not bad either. So I may buy this hair again I've had it in for 3 weeks almost now. Love the hair. It did lose a bit of luster after washing. Didn't shed till the end of 2nd week.
I'd buy again. Many many many compliments.
I've had hair extensions done for the past 10 years. Don't sleep on this Amazon gem. This is by far the best hair I have ever had! I can't believe I found it on Amazon 🥰 I had a custom color and install, and even my stylist thought the hair was AMAZING and wanted to know where I got it from!! I will definitely order again, I'm looking forward to trying the other textures and etc that they have available. The “30 is beautiful! [[VIDEOID:4d146c1b7fcc651cebd9ccabd20fa377]] Hair is great for the price, doesn’t shed I recently order and won’t be ordering agin I got a very bad batch the shedding extremely bad , hair is everywhere and now is matted within two week, hair quality not the same from when I first started order from them '}]
response:
# QTHAIR 613 Bundle Body Wave Human Hair 

The QTHAIR 613 Bundle Body Wave Human Hair is a top-of-the-line, 12A grade blonde Brazilian body wave hair extension. Made from 100% unprocessed Brazilian virgin hair, this bundle is the perfect choice for those seeking soft, silky, and natural-looking hair. With its lightweight and comfortable feel, this bundle is guaranteed to enhance your look and boost your confidence.

## Trustworthy Brand, Professional Quality

Our 613 Blonde Body Wave Human Hair Bundle is sourced from a professional hair factory supplier and comes from a trustworthy brand. This ensures that you are getting a product that is of the highest quality. The hair is completely unprocessed and free from tangles, shedding, smell, and lice. It is easy to bleach and takes color exceptionally well, allowing you to achieve your desired look effortlessly.

## Thick, Full, and Natural

Made from 12A grade Brazilian body wave human hair, this bundle is soft and silky, giving you a natural and healthy look. It is thick and full, providing you with voluminous and lustrous hair that you can wear for a long time. With its beautiful honey blonde color, this bundle is sure to turn heads wherever you go.

## True to Length and Weight

Our 613 Body Wave Bundle is true to length, ensuring that you get the desired length you ordered. Each bundle weighs approximately 95 grams, providing you with a full head of hair. Whether you need 3 bundles for 8-16 inches or 4 bundles for 18-26 inches, this bundle will have you covered. 

## Fast Delivery and Easy Maintenance

With its double machine weft, this bundle is designed to be tangle-free and minimal shedding. It requires no chemical treatment, making it safe for black women. The hair is easy to maintain and can be styled in various ways to suit your preferences and create different looks.

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Get the QTHAIR 613 Bundle Body Wave Human Hair now and experience the difference it can make in your hair game!

*Price*: $24.86
*Store*: QTHAIR

Order now and transform your look with the QTHAIR 613 Bundle Body Wave Human Hair!

Product ID: B0BNWSR278 Title: Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish, Resilient Rose, 0.5 Fluid Ounce Average Rating: 4.4 Number of Ratings: 3940 Features: ['Nail Polish Made With Organic And All Natural Ingredients - Repairs And Strengthens Nails', 'Doctor Recommended. Cruelty Free And Vegan Friendly - Made In the USA', 'Contains Natrual Actives Such As Biotin, Tea-Tree Oil, Garlic Bulb Extract, Lavender, Wheat Protein And Vitamins', 'Quick Dry, Brilliant Shine, Long Wear, Prevents Breakage, Hydrates Nails', 'Dr. Recommended - Non Toxic - For Best Results: Wear With Basic Base Coat And Calming Clear Top Coat.'] Description: ['Available in a kaleidoscope of over 40 vibrant shades and\xa0enriched with nourishing natural actives like , tea-tree oil, garlic bulb extract, lavender, wheat protein and ,\xa0Dr.’s Remedy combines the best of beauty and science to\xa0create a non-toxic collection of polishes that are as gentle on nails as they are on the world around us.'] Price: 18.99 Store: Dr.'s Remedy Details: {"Brand": "Dr.'s Remedy", "Item Form": "Liquid", "Color": "Rose", "Type": "base", "Finish Type": "Glossy", "Special Feature": "Not Tested On Animals, Organic, Natural Ingredients, Formaldehyde-Free", "Number of Items": "1", "Liquid Volume": "0.5 Fluid Ounces", "Item Dimensions LxWxH": "0.98 x 0.98 x 2.76 inches", "Item Weight": "0.01 Kilograms", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "0.98 x 0.98 x 2.76 inches; 0.35 Ounces", "Item model number": "REM50", "UPC": "040232454752", "Manufacturer": "Dr.'s REMEDY", "Country of Origin": "USA"} Review Text: Wow! I was hesitating about ordering this product because of the price and after reading multiple reviews about different colors of the same polish that didn’t have application thick enough. There were no reviews on this color (authentic apricot) and I decided to give it a try. I must say that I’m very pleasantly surprised. The picture I attached was taken on the 4th day after application and this is ONLY 1 COAT! Usually, all nail polishes start peeling the same day, because I do a lot cooking/cleaning but this one holds so well, I’m just amazed. And I should say that with the clean ingredients list and such a strong application it’s worth the price. I felt like I had to leave this review to support the seller. Thank you to the company for making such good products! Great polish- helps your nails heal. Needed this for covering mail with fungal infection. Actually helped mail improve!
Great stuff- beautiful color! Very nice Needed anti-fungal protection. This polish has a true color, nice shine, dries fast, durable and is a good thickness. Took two coats but that's not unreasonable. I prefer that instead of overly thick polish. Kid of spendy but will buy again. Recommend! I am a nail color addict & feel happier with a bright on my nails. I am also health oriented & don't want to put toxic stuff on me. I was recovering from using the llght cure color gels. My nails were especially dry& peeling. I use all the supporting products with this. For me it stays on as well or better than other color brands, goes on smoothly with a pretty good shine to finish & dries quicker than others I've tried. It wears well. No smell.
I'm finally coming to terms with the idea that if a polish is stronger than a healthy fingernail it will damage a fingernail, healthy or not. I write that because in my eternal quest for chip free polish, I forgot to respect that a healthy fingernail is not supposed to be some diamond strong plate to be misused as a screwdriver! I need to wear gloves for any activity that's tough enough to damage a good, healthy fingernail.
As to specific color: it's a cream, medium, slighty warm, pink that's bright enough for toes but still not "fluorescent" or "beachy." I have fair olive skin tone & i I like it, dont know if it works yet This is a great product. My nails were thrashed, due to gel manicures. This saved them. Yes, its a little pricey, but its not just polish, its helps you regain and maintain the health of your nails Beautiful color TRUSTING TURQUOISE. The color deepens after it dries to a perfect Robins Egg color and sheen.

This bottle has Smooth application. Love the extra large curved brush. My last bottle of this brand didn’t have that and I never could get the color evenly applied on my big toes. Now that I see how well this color went on and dried, I think the other color I bought last year was old or defective because it would dry before I could finish the whole big toe and end up with streaks and smudges. This color Turquoise is beautiful for Spring. I love it!

I also love that I don’t worsen the nail fungus I have using this brand, it costs a lot but it’s worth it. It may even be improving it. Good quality nail polish, doesn’t chip, goes on easily, smooth. Has a wide brush easy to paint nails with this brush. Color is for everyday summer use. Visited my Podiatrist. He told me to stop always having polish on my toenails. Said my nails needed to breathe. When I pushed back he told me then I had to only use Dr.'s Remedy polish. I immediately bought both this polish and the base (to use as the base and top coat). I was surprised how well it went on and lasted. My new go-to brand for nail health.

## Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish, Resilient Rose

[![Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish, Resilient Rose](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/31mMMQGC5fL._AC_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BNWSR278)

The Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish in Resilient Rose is the perfect blend of beauty and science. Made with organic and all-natural ingredients, this nail polish repairs and strengthens your nails while providing a brilliant shine and long wear. 

### Features:

- Nail polish made with organic and all-natural ingredients
- Repairs and strengthens nails
- Quick-dry formula with a brilliant shine
- Prevents breakage and hydrates nails
- Includes natural actives like biotin, tea-tree oil, garlic bulb extract, lavender, wheat protein, and vitamins
- Doctor recommended, cruelty-free, and vegan-friendly
- Made in the USA

### Go Natural, Go Beautiful

With over 40 vibrant shades to choose from, Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish offers a wide variety of colors to suit everyone's style. The Resilient Rose shade is a beautiful and sophisticated hue that will complement any outfit or occasion. 

### Healthier Nails, Happy You

Unlike traditional nail polishes, Dr.'s Remedy is formulated with your nail health in mind. The enriching natural ingredients in this polish, such as biotin and lavender, work to repair and strengthen your nails, making them less prone to breakage. Plus, this non-toxic polish is doctor-recommended, ensuring that your nails are in safe hands.

### Long-lasting and Quick-drying

Say goodbye to smudged nails! The quick-dry formula of Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish ensures a fast and hassle-free application. Enjoy a brilliant, glossy finish that lasts for days, without the need for constant touch-ups.

### Your Nail Savior

Join thousands of satisfied customers who have experienced the benefits of Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish. According to one reviewer, "This polish holds so well, I'm just amazed. With the clean ingredients list and such a strong application, it's worth the price."

So why wait? Upgrade your nail polish collection with Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish in Resilient Rose and enjoy healthier, more beautiful nails today!

[Buy Now](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BNWSR278) and experience the Dr.'s Remedy difference.

Product ID: B0C5V83YMB Title: YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party) Average Rating: 3.6 Number of Ratings: 35 Features: ['PORTABLE TRAVEL SIZE -- Each YouClean collection has 3 tiny boxes (2 x 1 x 0.25 inches) (5 x 2.5 x 0.5 cm) which nicely fit in any purse/ wallet, handbag, pack-backs that come in handy everywhere and at any time. These portable soap sheets are small, light and zero-waste which makes them perfect for travel, hiking, camping, school trips and convenient at workplaces.', 'FOAMING, MOITURIZING & NOURISHING SKIN -- YouClean hand soap sheet quickly dissolves to create a foaming lather. It is made with high quality, all-natural plant-based ingredients, nourish and moisturize your skin with flower/fruit essential oils.', 'WONDERFUL AROMATHERAPY with ESSENTIAL OILS -- YouClean 8 scent collections will keep your wallet, handbag, pack backs, or pockets smell good all the time. We also have The Nonsense (unscented) which is suitable for professional working environments.', 'EASY-TO-USE -- Take out a YouClean soap sheet with dry hands. Add water and rub hands to form a lather. Rinse, dry and enjoy your clean hands. It is suitable for all skin types and whole body. It can be used as shampoo or body wash, if needed.', 'NO PLASTIC PACKAGING with 100% biodegradable paper packaging. We are fighting with the plastic waste by being part of the solution. GREEN EARTH IS OUR GOAL - KEEP YouClean IS YOUR MISSION!'] Description: ['Brand:', 'YouClean', 'Item Form:', 'Sheet', 'Formulation:', 'Concentrated plant-based soap', 'Scent:', 'Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)', 'Package Box Size:', '2 x 1 x 1.5 inch', 'www.shopyouclean.com', "We are changing our packaging. No more small plastic cases! Our new packaging is 100% biodegradable paper. All 300 sheets are tightly packed in 3 tiny paper boxes (100 sheets/box) which nicely fit in any purse/wallet, handbag, and kids' pack-backs. Check out our 9 scent collections: - Tea Party - Citrus Collection - Purple Heart - Pink Pamper - Red Passion - Blanca Elegance - Seaside Vacation - The Adventure - The Nonsense (unscented)"] Price: 13.87 Store: YouClean Details: {"Item Form": "Sheet", "Skin Type": "All", "Brand": "YouClean", "Scent": "Tea Party", "Material Type Free": "Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil) See more", "Product Dimensions": "2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces", "UPC": "609670421100", "Manufacturer": "YouClean"} Review Text: Now it definitely doesn’t get any more convenient than these handy YOUCLEAN Antibacterial Foaming Paper Hand Soap Sheets!

Each compact case holds 50 sheets which can be used while on the go with water! This set should have included 8pks, consisting of 400 sheets total. However, I only received 4 packs which consisted of just 200 sheets total.

Nevertheless, with the addition of water these sheets dissolve into hypoallergenic soap that actually lathers quite well. They’re mildly scented, compact, handy and they work to ensure “YOUCLEAN!” [[VIDEOID:5fbfb533f795c905ded71643a547b213]] I got these for a long trip with the kids and they are great! Small enough to fit literally anywhere, and as long as you have water you have soap to wash your hands on you! The toilet on our plane ran out of soap and we used these. We used these on the train. We used them waiting for the train after being on local transport. Just really awesome!! Very nice 4 little pockets for the soap sheet. Smell is mild, and it does generate decent bubbles when used. Minus one star is because I only got 4 packs when the description says 8. Unfortunately, I only got half of them, so I wasn't able to accurately review these. I got the lemon, tea tree, peach, and jasmine ones. Since I got the set mainly for the rose and coconut ones, I was definitely disappointed.

The four that I did receive do smell decent. The scent is pretty mild. In my opinion, of the ones that I got, the jasmine and the peach smell the best. They do provide some suds, but they definitely don't suds up as well as I had hoped. They are a good size for putting in your purse, backpack, or another bag, and they will work in a clean-up emergency. Even if I'd gotten all eight packages, I probably wouldn't get these again. Advertises 8 packs, you get 4....advertises 8 scents, you get 2 (3 packs all have the same scent). The product page states they are paraben-free, bleach-free, etc., however, no where on the page or any of the packages is there a list of ingredients. I'm still debating on whether or not I actually want to use them! However, as of right now, I do not recommend. These soap sheets are great for traveling. They are easily portable in their little travel cases and are convenient for on the go. The start dissolving immediately when you get them wet, but they did require a little rubbing to get them to dissolve completely, which is great since they help ensure a good job at washing your hands. Each color is a different scent, and most scents are nice. Of course, I like some better than others, but that's a matter of personal preference. One sheet was plenty for washing my hands. They are great for traveling and if you go somewhere that the soap ran out or just isn't available. I love that they help me stay clean while on the go. works just like soap! perfect for on the go, you can throw in your bag or purse I have been buying these little soap dispensers with soap sheets in them for a while now (cos of the pandemic) and this pack is probably the best value I’ve ever had. I’ve paid $5 for one filled dispenser, with a generic scent one time, and i still thought that was a great thing to have. With this pack of 8 different scents, for less than $16, you’re getting a package for less than $2.
To say they are handy is an understatement. They are a Godsend. I don’t know how often I’ve gone into a bathroom, and the soap dispenser is empty. I was recently camping, and their soap dispenser in the toilets was empty during our whole stay. One thoughtful camper, left a bar of soap in a clear plastic cup, but it was a bit grimy with hairs on it, and i didn’t want to use that. With these handy pocket, or purse sized dispensers, you have a fresh sheet of soap each time. And they lather up very easily, as soon as they get wet.
They are small enough to put into the smallest purse, even your wallet, or pocket, and you’ll never be caught it out the ability to wash your hands.
These will last a while, as I’m not planning on giving any away. I might offer a sheet here and there, but not a whole dispenser for goodness sake. I’ll tell them where they can get their own.
I’m currently using the Tea Tree and it’s very fresh. I do feel very clean after using these, and will continue to recommend them to my friends.
Great value pack. These tiny soaps are perfect for travel and I love them for camping.
Easy dissolve. Great packaging I really like these little soap sheets. I keep a pack in my purse and they have come in handy whenever there is no soap available. This is a must have during this Covid era and even more if you have kids. They find it to be so much fun and like washing their hands more when it's fun for them. The only thing is that the little envelope they come in is mislabeled and you only get 4 instead of 8. I did contact CS and they sent me another pack of 4 right away. So I hope this is fixed cause I am sure many people don't know that the can call and get their order corrected.

I’ve paid $5 for one filled dispenser, with a generic scent one time, and i still thought that was a great thing to have. With this pack of 8 different scents, for less than $16, you’re getting a package for less than $2.
To say they are handy is an understatement. They are a Godsend. I don’t know how often I’ve gone into a bathroom, and the soap dispenser is empty. I was recently camping, and their soap dispenser in the toilets was empty during our whole stay. One thoughtful camper, left a bar of soap in a clear plastic cup, but it was a bit grimy with hairs on it, and i didn’t want to use that. With these handy pocket, or purse sized dispensers, you have a fresh sheet of soap each time. And they lather up very easily, as soon as they get wet.
They are small enough to put into the smallest purse, even your wallet, or pocket, and you’ll never be caught it out the ability to wash your hands.
These will last a while, as I’m not planning on giving any away. I might offer a sheet here and there, but not a whole dispenser for goodness sake. I’ll tell them where they can get their own.
I’m currently using the Tea Tree and it’s very fresh. I do feel very clean after using these, and will continue to recommend them to my friends.
Great value pack. These tiny soaps are perfect for travel and I love them for camping.
Easy dissolve. Great packaging I really like these little soap sheets. I keep a pack in my purse and they have come in handy whenever there is no soap available. This is a must have during this Covid era and even more if you have kids. They find it to be so much fun and like washing their hands more when it's fun for them. The only thing is that the little envelope they come in is mislabeled and you only get 4 instead of 8. I did contact CS and they sent me another pack of 4 right away. So I hope this is fixed cause I am sure many people don't know that the can call and get their order corrected. '}]
response:
# YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets

Keep your hands clean and fresh no matter where you go with YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets. These compact and portable soap sheets are perfect for travel, hiking, camping, school trips, and even everyday use. 

## Portable and Convenient

Each YouClean collection comes with 3 tiny boxes that fit easily in any purse, wallet, handbag, or backpack. Measuring just 2 x 1 x 0.25 inches, these soap sheets are small, lightweight, and zero-waste. You can take them with you everywhere and at any time, ensuring that cleanliness is always within reach. 

## Foaming, Moisturizing, and Nourishing

YouClean hand soap sheets quickly dissolve to create a luxurious foaming lather. Made with high-quality, all-natural plant-based ingredients, these soap sheets nourish and moisturize your skin with the delightful scent of flower and fruit essential oils. 

## Wonderful Aromatherapy

With YouClean's 8 scent collections, including Tea Party, Citrus Collection, Purple Heart, and more, you can keep your wallet, handbag, backpack, or pockets smelling fresh all the time. We also offer The Nonsense collection, specially designed for professional working environments. 

## Easy-to-Use

Using YouClean soap sheets is a breeze. Simply take out a sheet with dry hands, add water, and rub your hands together to form a lather. Rinse, dry, and enjoy the benefits of clean and nourished skin. These soap sheets are suitable for all skin types and can even be used as shampoo or body wash if needed. 

## Environmentally Friendly

YouClean is committed to fighting plastic waste. That's why our soap sheets come in 100% biodegradable paper packaging. We believe in preserving our green Earth, and by choosing YouClean, you become part of the solution. 

Take cleanliness and convenience with you wherever you go. Don't miss out on the opportunity to experience the benefits of YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets. Order now and make cleanliness your mission!

[Shop now on YouClean](www.shopyouclean.com)

Product ID: B0C619KBLQ Title: Duke Cannon Supply Co. THICK High-Viscosity Body Wash for Men - Smells Like Old Glory - Tobacco, Cedarwood, Amber, 3.4 Fl Oz, Travel Size Mini Average Rating: 3.9 Number of Ratings: 12 Features: [] Description: ["Rich, sophisticated scent blends notes of tobacco, cedarwood, and amber body wash. Smells like Old Glory. Hard-working men require a shower of substance to accomplish a full day's work. That's why Duke Cannon's THICK is formulated with a noticeably higher viscosity and built to work effectively on your body, not spew down the shower drain."] Price: 6.0 Store: Duke Cannon Supply Co. Details: {"Item Form": "Gel", "Skin Type": "All", "Brand": "Duke Cannon Supply Co.", "Scent": "Cedarwood,Amber", "Age Range (Description)": "Youth", "Product Dimensions": "1.5 x 1.5 x 5 inches; 4.3 Ounces", "Item model number": "MINITHICKOLDGLORY", "UPC": "850008675799", "Manufacturer": "Duke Cannon"} Review Text: A little pricey but it smells great and feels great on your body I bought this wanting a sandalwood scented bodywash. I've used Naval Supremacy and a couple of others (mint scented one and citrus scented one), all to my delight. Well, I tested the smell in Target through my face mask. I definitely smelled the sandalwood, and couldn't detect much Tobacco scent. SO I figured I'd give it a try, assuming the tobacco component would be that sweet smell ("like raisins") I remember from growing up in Winston-Salem NC. Much to my disappointment, the first time I showered with this, I felt like I was smearing my spouse's ashtray all over my body. I don't know if this will grow on me, or if I'm Just going to be completely disgusted every time I use this product. Only $6 at Target in the store , smells mostly like leather in a good way, been using a small amount daily in the shower as body wash or shampoo and it’s Only half empty after 6 months, a little goes a long way. Has tiny amounts of grit in it for exfoliation. I love this stuff. Nice and thick Very thick. A little goes a long way. Smells amazing. Scent lasts for hours without being overpowering Everything was totally awesome You want to smell like the starring man in a romance movie but also smell like a character from road house? Look no farther! Jk but seriously I bought a whole case of this stuff because it’s that good, and I legitimately won’t use another body wash, ever. I hope they never stop making this. As most my reviews on body wash, I always state; hard water takes more soap then moderate to soft water, to lather. In this case, I can use very little, like maybe a bit less than a table spoon on my loofah (yes I do use one) and can lather this Greek bod from toes to head no problem.

The smell is there but for me, not very strong at all. I like the scent and whish it was a bit stronger. This is not a deodorant soap, so it does not leave a scent on the skin after drying off. Though it does clean very well and rinses off with ease. There is no after slime or weird tacky feeling. The soap does have beads in it, so if you are a hands and soap person, you will like that.

The scent is difficult to describe so I won't try..

This stuff will last a long time as it takes very little, for medium water, not hard or soft water, just in the middle, to lather and clean. Love this body wash. Has a great smell and leaves you feeling clean and refreshed. If you like a rustic, country, leather smell, with a bit of tobacco. This is it! It’s cruelty-free. Decent size and price point. Has Aloe-Vera.

It’s not Woke like other mainstream companies out there. They donate to to Veterans. While respecting and honoring what a real Man is.

# Duke Cannon Supply Co. THICK High-Viscosity Body Wash for Men

*Rich, sophisticated scent blends notes of tobacco, cedarwood, and amber body wash. Smells like Old Glory.*

Hard-working men require a shower of substance to accomplish a full day's work. That's why Duke Cannon's THICK High-Viscosity Body Wash is here to deliver. 

## Features

- Noticeably higher viscosity: Formulated to work effectively on your body, not spew down the shower drain.
- Rich, sophisticated scent: Blends notes of tobacco, cedarwood, and amber for a truly memorable olfactory experience.
- Compact travel size: Convenient 3.4 fl oz (100 ml) mini bottle, perfect for on-the-go.

## Benefits

- Cleanses effectively: The high-viscosity formula ensures that every wash leaves you feeling fresh and clean.
- Long-lasting: A little goes a long way, making the bottle last, even with daily use.
- Fragrant and refreshing: The rich, sophisticated scent lingers on your skin, keeping you smelling great throughout the day.
- Versatile: Can be used as a body wash or shampoo, providing ultimate convenience.
- Exfoliating: Contains tiny amounts of grit for gentle exfoliation, leaving your skin feeling smooth and revitalized.
- Cruelty-free: Duke Cannon is committed to cruelty-free practices and does not test on animals.
- Supports veterans: By purchasing this product, you're supporting a company that donates to veterans while honoring what a real man is.

## Customer Reviews

- "Nice and thick. A little goes a long way. Smells amazing. Scent lasts for hours without being overpowering."
- "Love this body wash. Has a great smell and leaves you feeling clean and refreshed."
- "If you like a rustic, country, leather smell, with a bit of tobacco, this is it!"
- "Decent size and price point. It's cruelty-free. Has Aloe-Vera."

Invest in Duke Cannon Supply Co. THICK High-Viscosity Body Wash for Men to experience the power of a richly scented, effective body wash that will leave you feeling clean, refreshed, and ready to take on the day.
